GE07mbh_05_u:1015: 05,021.017d*0122_01 duryodhanaḥ sahāmātyo vinaṅkṣayati na saṃśayaḥ 05,021.018 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,021.018a dhṛtarāṣṭras tato bhīṣmam anumānya prasādya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:1016: 05,021.018c avabhartsya ca rādheyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:1018: 05,021.019b*0123_01 duryodhanasamakṣaṃ ca pārthivānāṃ ca saṃnidhau 05,021.019b*0123_02 eṣa vakṣyati dharmātmā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 05,021.019b*0124_01 asmad dhitam idaṃ vākyaṃ bhīṣmeṇoktaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:1019: 05,021.019c pāṇḍavānāṃ hitaṃ caiva sarvasya jagatas tathā

GE07mbh_05_u:1021: 05,021.021a sa taṃ satkṛtya kauravyaḥ preṣayām āsa pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:1022: 05,021.021c sabhāmadhye samāhūya saṃjayaṃ vākyam abravīt 05,022.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,022.001a prāptān āhuḥ saṃjaya pāṇḍuputrān; upaplavye tān vijānīhi gatvā
GE07mbh_05_u:1023: 05,022.001c ajātaśatruṃ ca sabhājayethā; diṣṭyānagha grāmam upasthitas

GE07mbh_05_u:1034: 05,022.005c dhṛtyā caiva prajñayā cābhibhūya; dharmārthayogān prayatanti pārthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1035: 05,022.006a tyajanti mitreṣu dhanāni kāle; na saṃvāsāj jīryati maitram eṣām 05,022.006c yathārhamānārthakarā hi pārthās; teṣāṃ dveṣṭā nāsty
GE07mbh_05_u:1036: ājamīḍhasya pakṣe 05,022.007a anyatra pāpād viṣamān mandabuddher; duryodhanāt kṣudratarāc
GE07mbh_05_u:1038: 05,022.007c teṣāṃ hīme hīnasukhapriyāṇāṃ; mahātmanāṃ saṃjanayanti tejaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1041: 05,022.008a utthānavīryaḥ sukham edhamāno; duryodhanaḥ sukṛtaṃ manyate tat
GE07mbh_05_u:1042: 05,022.008c teṣāṃ bhāgaṃ yac ca manyeta bālaḥ; śakyaṃ hartuṃ jīvatāṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:1044: 05,022.009a yasyārjunaḥ padavīṃ keśavaś ca; vṛkodaraḥ sātyako 'jātaśatroḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1045: 05,022.009c mādrīputrau sṛñjayāś cāpi sarve; purā yuddhāt sādhu tasya pradānam 05,022.010a sa hy evaikaḥ pṛthivīṃ savyasācī; gāṇḍīvadhanvā praṇuded rathasthaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1046: 05,022.010c tathā viṣṇuḥ keśavo 'py apradhṛṣyo; lokatrayasyādhipatir mahātmā 05,022.011a tiṣṭheta kas tasya martyaḥ purastād; yaḥ sarvadeveṣu vareṇya
GE07mbh_05_u:1048: 05,022.011c parjanyaghoṣān pravapañ śaraughān; pataṃgasaṃghān iva śīghravegān
GE07mbh_05_u:1049: 05,022.012a diśaṃ hy udīcīm api cottarān kurūn; gāṇḍīvadhanvaikaratho jigāya 05,022.012c dhanaṃ caiṣām āharat savyasācī; senānugān balidāṃś caiva cakre
GE07mbh_05_u:1050: 05,022.013a yaś caiva devān khāṇḍave savyasācī; gāṇḍīvadhanvā prajigāya sendrān
GE07mbh_05_u:1051: 05,022.013c upāharat phalguno jātavedase; yaśo mānaṃ vardhayan pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_05_u:1052: 05,022.014a gadābhṛtāṃ nādya samo 'sti bhīmād; dhastyāroho nāsti samaś ca tasya 05,022.014c rathe 'rjunād āhur ahīnam enaṃ; bāhvor bale cāyutanāgavīryam
GE07mbh_05_u:1053: 05,022.015a suśikṣitaḥ kṛtavairas tarasvī; dahet kruddhas tarasā
GE07mbh_05_u:1055: 05,022.015c sadātyamarṣī balavān na śakyo; yuddhe jetuṃ vāsavenāpi sākṣāt
GE07mbh_05_u:1056: 05,022.016a sucetasau balinau śīghrahastau; suśikṣitau bhrātarau phalgunena
GE07mbh_05_u:1057: 05,022.016c śyenau yathā pakṣipūgān rujantau; mādrīputrau neha kurūn
GE07mbh_05_u:1059: 05,022.016d*0127_01 etad balaṃ pūrṇam asmākam evaṃ 05,022.016d*0127_02 yat sātvatāṃ nāsti tṛtīyam anyat 05,022.017a teṣāṃ madhye vartamānas tarasvī; dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pāṇḍavānām ihaikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1060: 05,022.017c sahāmātyaḥ somakānāṃ prabarhaḥ; saṃtyaktātmā pāṇḍavānāṃ jayāya
GE07mbh_05_u:1062: 05,022.017d*0128_02 yeṣāṃ sa syād agraṇīr vṛṣṇisiṃhaḥ 05,022.018a sahoṣitaś caritārtho vayaḥsthaḥ; śālveyānām adhipo vai virāṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1063: 05,022.018c saha putraiḥ pāṇḍavārthe ca śaśvad; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhakta iti
GE07mbh_05_u:1064: śrutaṃ me 05,022.019a avaruddhā balinaḥ kekayebhyo; maheṣvāsā bhrātaraḥ pañca santi
GE07mbh_05_u:1065: 05,022.019c kekayebhyo rājyam ākāṅkṣamāṇā; yuddhārthinaś cānuvasanti pārthān
GE07mbh_05_u:1066: 05,022.020a sarve ca vīrāḥ pṛthivīpatīnāṃ; samānītāḥ pāṇḍavārthe niviṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1067: 05,022.020c śūrān ahaṃ bhaktimataḥ śṛṇomi; prītyā yuktān saṃśritān
GE07mbh_05_u:1069: 05,022.021a giryāśrayā durganivāsinaś ca; yodhāḥ pṛthivyāṃ kulajā
GE07mbh_05_u:1071: 05,022.021c mlecchāś ca nānāyudhavīryavantaḥ; samāgatāḥ pāṇḍavārthe niviṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1072: 05,022.022a pāṇḍyaś ca rājāmita indrakalpo; yudhi pravīrair bahubhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1075: 05,022.023a astraṃ droṇād arjunād vāsudevāt; kṛpād bhīṣmād yena kṛtaṃ śṛṇomi 05,022.023c yaṃ taṃ kārṣṇipratimaṃ prāhur ekaṃ; sa sātyakiḥ pāṇḍavārthe
GE07mbh_05_u:1077: 05,022.024a apāśritāś cedikarūṣakāś ca; sarvotsāhair bhūmipālaiḥ sametāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1078: 05,022.024c teṣāṃ madhye sūryam ivātapantaṃ; śriyā vṛtaṃ cedipatiṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:1080: 05,022.025a astambhanīyaṃ yudhi manyamānaṃ; jyākarṣatāṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ pṛthivyām
GE07mbh_05_u:1081: 05,022.025c sarvotsāhaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ nihatya; prasahya kṛṣṇas tarasā
GE07mbh_05_u:1083: 05,022.026a yaśomānau vardhayan yādavānāṃ; purābhinac chiśupālaṃ samīke
GE07mbh_05_u:1084: 05,022.026c yasya sarve vardhayanti sma mānaṃ; karūṣarājapramukhā narendrāḥ 05,022.027a tam asahyaṃ keśavaṃ tatra matvā; sugrīvayuktena rathena kṛṣṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:1085: 05,022.027c saṃprādravaṃś cedipatiṃ vihāya; siṃhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudramṛgā
GE07mbh_05_u:1087: 05,022.028a yas taṃ pratīpas tarasā pratyudīyād; āśaṃsamāno dvairathe vāsudevam
GE07mbh_05_u:1088: 05,022.028c so 'śeta kṛṣṇena hataḥ parāsur; vātenevonmathitaḥ karṇikāraḥ 05,022.029a parākramaṃ me yad avedayanta; teṣām arthe saṃjaya keśavasya
GE07mbh_05_u:1089: 05,022.029c anusmaraṃs tasya karmāṇi viṣṇor; gāvalgaṇe nādhigacchāmi śāntim
GE07mbh_05_u:1090: 05,022.030a na jātu tāñ śatrur anyaḥ saheta; yeṣāṃ sa syād agraṇīr vṛṣṇisiṃhaḥ 05,022.030c pravepate me hṛdayaṃ bhayena; śrutvā kṛṣṇāv ekarathe sametau
GE07mbh_05_u:1091: 05,022.031a no ced gacchet saṃgaraṃ mandabuddhis; tābhyāṃ suto me
GE07mbh_05_u:1093: 05,022.031c no cet kurūn saṃjaya nirdahetām; indrāviṣṇū daityasenāṃ yathaiva
GE07mbh_05_u:1094: 05,022.031e mato hi me śakrasamo dhanaṃjayaḥ; sanātano vṛṣṇivīraś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:1097: 05,022.032c duryodhanena nikṛto manasvī; no cet kruddhaḥ pradahed dhārtarāṣṭrān 05,022.033a nāhaṃ tathā hy arjunād vāsudevād; bhīmād vāpi yamayor vā bibhemi 05,022.033c yathā rājñaḥ krodhadīptasya sūta; manyor ahaṃ bhītataraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1099: 05,022.034a alaṃ tapobrahmacaryeṇa yuktaḥ; saṃkalpo 'yaṃ mānasas tasya sidhyet
GE07mbh_05_u:1100: 05,022.034c tasya krodhaṃ saṃjayāhaṃ samīke; sthāne jānan bhṛśam asmy adya bhītaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1101: 05,022.035a sa gaccha śīghraṃ prahito rathena; pāñcālarājasya camūṃ paretya
GE07mbh_05_u:1102: 05,022.035c ajātaśatruṃ kuśalaṃ sma pṛccheḥ; punaḥ punaḥ prītiyuktaṃ vades tvam 05,022.036a janārdanaṃ cāpi sametya tāta; mahāmātraṃ vīryavatām udāram
GE07mbh_05_u:1103: 05,022.036c anāmayaṃ madvacanena pṛccher; dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ śāntim
GE07mbh_05_u:1105: 05,022.037a na tasya kiṃ cid vacanaṃ na kuryāt; kuntīputro vāsudevasya sūta
GE07mbh_05_u:1106: 05,022.037c priyaś caiṣām ātmasamaś ca kṛṣṇo; vidvāṃś caiṣāṃ karmaṇi
GE07mbh_05_u:1108: 05,022.038a samānīya pāṇḍavān sṛñjayāṃś ca; janārdanaṃ yuyudhānaṃ virāṭam
GE07mbh_05_u:1109: 05,022.038c anāmayaṃ madvacanena pṛccheḥ; sarvāṃs tathā draupadeyāṃś ca pañca 05,022.039a yad yat tatra prāptakālaṃ parebhyas; tvaṃ manyethā bhāratānāṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:1110: hitaṃ ca 05,022.039c tat tad bhāṣethāḥ saṃjaya rājamadhye; na mūrchayed yan na bhavec ca
GE07mbh_05_u:1111: 05,023.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,023.001a rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1112: 05,023.001c upaplavyaṃ yayau draṣṭuṃ pāṇḍavān amitaujasaḥ 05,023.002a sa tu rājānam āsādya dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_05_u:1114: 05,023.003a gāvalgaṇiḥ saṃjayaḥ sūtasūnur; ajātaśatrum avadat pratītaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:1117: 05,023.004c kaccid bhīmaḥ kuśalī pāṇḍavāgryo; dhanaṃjayas tau ca
GE07mbh_05_u:1119: 05,023.005a kaccit kṛṣṇā draupadī rājaputrī; satyavratā vīrapatnī saputrā

GE07mbh_05_u:1123: 05,023.006c anāmayaṃ pratijāne tavāhaṃ; sahānujaiḥ kuśalī cāsmi vidvan
GE07mbh_05_u:1124: 05,023.007a cirād idaṃ kuśalaṃ bhāratasya; śrutvā rājñaḥ kuruvṛddhasya
GE07mbh_05_u:1126: 05,023.007c manye sākṣād dṛṣṭam ahaṃ narendraṃ; dṛṣṭvaiva tvāṃ saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:1128: 05,023.008a pitāmaho naḥ sthaviro manasvī; mahāprājñaḥ sarvadharmopapannaḥ 05,023.008c sa kauravyaḥ kuśalī tāta bhīṣmo; yathāpūrvaṃ vṛttir apy asya kaccit 05,023.009a kaccid rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputro; vaicitravīryaḥ kuśalī mahātmā

GE07mbh_05_u:1140: 05,023.013c karṇo 'mātyaḥ kuśalī tāta kaccit; suyodhano yasya mando
GE07mbh_05_u:1142: 05,023.014a striyo vṛddhā bhāratānāṃ jananyo; mahānasyo dāsabhāryāś ca

GE07mbh_05_u:1146: 05,023.015c kaccid dāyān māmakān dhārtarāṣṭro; dvijātīnāṃ saṃjaya nopahanti
GE07mbh_05_u:1147: 05,023.016a kaccid rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputra; upekṣate brāhmaṇātikramān vai
GE07mbh_05_u:1148: 05,023.016c kaccin na hetor iva vartmabhūta; upekṣate teṣu sa nyūnavṛttim
GE07mbh_05_u:1149: 05,023.017a etaj jyotir uttamaṃ jīvaloke; śuklaṃ prajānāṃ vihitaṃ vidhātrā
GE07mbh_05_u:1150: 05,023.017c te cel lobhaṃ na niyacchanti mandāḥ; kṛtsno nāśo bhavitā
GE07mbh_05_u:1152: 05,023.018a kaccid rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputro; bubhūṣate vṛttim amātyavarge
GE07mbh_05_u:1153: 05,023.018c kaccin na bhedena jijīviṣanti; suhṛdrūpā durhṛdaś caikamitrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1154: 05,023.019a kaccin na pāpaṃ kathayanti tāta; te pāṇḍavānāṃ kuravaḥ sarva eva 05,023.019b*0130_01 droṇaḥ saputraś ca kṛpaś ca vīro
GE07mbh_05_u:1158: 05,023.019c kaccid dṛṣṭvā dasyusaṃghān sametān; smaranti pārthasya yudhāṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:1160: 05,023.020a maurvībhujāgraprahitān sma tāta; dodhūyamānena dhanurdhareṇa 05,023.020c gāṇḍīvamuktān stanayitnughoṣān; ajihmagān kaccid anusmaranti
GE07mbh_05_u:1161: 05,023.020d*0131_01 na taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaccid atra pratīpaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:1162: 05,023.020d*0131_02 gantā gṛhāñ jātu jagāma raṅgāt 05,023.021a na hy apaśyaṃ kaṃ cid ahaṃ pṛthivyāṃ; śrutaṃ samaṃ vādhikam
GE07mbh_05_u:1164: 05,023.021c yasyaikaṣaṣṭir niśitās tīkṣṇadhārāḥ; suvāsasaḥ saṃmato hastavāpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1165: 05,023.022a gadāpāṇir bhīmasenas tarasvī; pravepayañ śatrusaṃghān anīke
GE07mbh_05_u:1166: 05,023.022c nāgaḥ prabhinna iva naḍvalāsu; caṅkramyate kaccid enaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:1168: 05,023.023a mādrīputraḥ sahadevaḥ kaliṅgān; samāgatān ajayad dantakūre
GE07mbh_05_u:1169: 05,023.023c vāmenāsyan dakṣiṇenaiva yo vai; mahābalaṃ kaccid enaṃ smaranti
GE07mbh_05_u:1170: 05,023.024a udyann ayaṃ nakulaḥ preṣito vai; gāvalgaṇe saṃjaya paśyatas te
GE07mbh_05_u:1171: 05,023.024c diśaṃ pratīcīṃ vaśam ānayan me; mādrīsutaṃ kaccid enaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:1173: 05,023.025a abhyābhavo dvaitavane ya āsīd; durmantrite ghoṣayātrāgatānām 05,023.025c yatra mandāñ śatruvaśaṃ prayātān; amocayad bhīmaseno jayaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:1174: 05,023.026a ahaṃ paścād arjunam abhyarakṣaṃ; mādrīputrau bhīmasenaś ca

GE07mbh_05_u:1177: 05,023.027c sarvātmanā parijetuṃ vayaṃ cen; na śaknumo dhṛtarāṣṭrasya

GE07mbh_05_u:1234: 05,026.001 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 05,026.001a kāṃ nu vācaṃ saṃjaya me śṛṇoṣi; yuddhaiṣiṇīṃ yena

GE07mbh_05_u:2293: 05,036.043a anavāpyaṃ ca śokena śarīraṃ copatapyate 05,036.043c amitrāś ca prahṛṣyanti mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ 05,036.044a punar naro mriyate jāyate ca; punar naro hīyate vardhate punaḥ 05,036.044c punar naro yācati yācyate ca; punar naraḥ śocati śocyate punaḥ 05,036.045a sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca bhavābhavau ca; lābhālābhau maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ ca 05,036.045c paryāyaśaḥ sarvam iha spṛśanti; tasmād dhīro naiva hṛṣyen na śocet

GE07mbh_05_u:2301: 05,036.050a buddhyā bhayaṃ praṇudati tapasā vindate mahat

GE07mbh_05_u:2304: 05,036.052a svadhītasya suyuddhasya sukṛtasya ca karmaṇaḥ 05,036.052c tapasaś ca sutaptasya tasyānte sukham edhate
GE07mbh_05_u:2305: 05,036.053a svāstīrṇāni śayanāni prapannā; na vai bhinnā jātu nidrāṃ labhante
GE07mbh_05_u:2306: 05,036.053c na strīṣu rājan ratim āpnuvanti; na māgadhaiḥ stūyamānā na sūtaiḥ 05,036.054a na vai bhinnā jātu caranti dharmaṃ; na vai sukhaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:2307: prāpnuvantīha bhinnāḥ 05,036.054c na vai bhinnā gauravaṃ mānayanti; na vai bhinnāḥ praśamaṃ rocayanti 05,036.055a na vai teṣāṃ svadate pathyam uktaṃ; yogakṣemaṃ kalpate nota
GE07mbh_05_u:2309: 05,036.055c bhinnānāṃ vai manujendra parāyaṇaṃ; na vidyate kiṃ cid anyad vināśāt
GE07mbh_05_u:2310: 05,036.056a saṃbhāvyaṃ goṣu saṃpannaṃ saṃbhāvyaṃ brāhmaṇe tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2311: 05,036.056c saṃbhāvyaṃ strīṣu cāpalyaṃ saṃbhāvyaṃ jñātito bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:2312: 05,036.057a tantavo 'py āyatā nityaṃ tantavo bahulāḥ samāḥ 05,036.057c bahūn bahutvād āyāsān sahantīty upamā satām
GE07mbh_05_u:2313: 05,036.058a dhūmāyante vyapetāni jvalanti sahitāni ca 05,036.058c dhṛtarāṣṭrolmukānīva jñātayo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:2314: 05,036.059a brāhmaṇeṣu ca ye śūrāḥ strīṣu jñātiṣu goṣu ca 05,036.059c vṛntād iva phalaṃ pakvaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭra patanti te
GE07mbh_05_u:2315: 05,036.060a mahān apy ekajo vṛkṣo balavān supratiṣṭhitaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:2318: 05,036.062a evaṃ manuṣyam apy ekaṃ guṇair api samanvitam

GE07mbh_05_u:2323: 05,036.064c yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuñjīta ye ca syuḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:2325: 05,036.065a na manuṣye guṇaḥ kaś cid anyo dhanavatām api 05,036.065c anāturatvād bhadraṃ te mṛtakalpā hi rogiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2326: 05,036.066a avyādhijaṃ kaṭukaṃ śīrṣarogaṃ; pāpānubandhaṃ paruṣaṃ tīkṣṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:2328: 05,036.066c satāṃ peyaṃ yan na pibanty asanto; manyuṃ mahārāja piba
GE07mbh_05_u:2330: 05,036.067a rogārditā na phalāny ādriyante; na vai labhante viṣayeṣu tattvam 05,036.067c duḥkhopetā rogiṇo nityam eva; na budhyante dhanabhogān na saukhyam 05,036.068a purā hy ukto nākaros tvaṃ vaco me; dyūte jitāṃ draupadīṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:2331: prekṣya rājan 05,036.068c duryodhanaṃ vārayety akṣavatyāṃ; kitavatvaṃ paṇḍitā varjayanti

GE07mbh_05_u:2335: 05,036.070a dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ pāṇḍavān pālayantu; pāṇḍoḥ sutās tava putrāṃś ca pāntu
GE07mbh_05_u:2336: 05,036.070c ekārimitrāḥ kuravo hy ekamantrā; jīvantu rājan sukhinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2338: 05,036.071a meḍhībhūtaḥ kauravāṇāṃ tvam adya; tvayy ādhīnaṃ kurukulam
GE07mbh_05_u:2340: 05,036.071c pārthān bālān vanavāsaprataptān; gopāyasva svaṃ yaśas tāta rakṣan 05,036.072a saṃdhatsva tvaṃ kauravān pāṇḍuputrair; mā te 'ntaraṃ ripavaḥ prārthayantu 05,036.072c satye sthitās te naradeva sarve; duryodhanaṃ sthāpaya tvaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:2342: 05,037.001 vidura uvāca 05,037.001a saptadaśemān rājendra manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:2343: 05,037.001c vaicitravīrya puruṣān ākāśaṃ muṣṭibhir ghnataḥ 05,037.002a tān evendrasya hi dhanur anāmyaṃ namato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:2344: 05,037.002c atho marīcinaḥ pādān anāmyān namatas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:2345: 05,037.003a yaś cāśiṣyaṃ śāsati yaś ca kupyate; yaś cātivelaṃ bhajate
GE07mbh_05_u:2347: 05,037.003c striyaś ca yo 'rakṣati bhadram astu te; yaś cāyācyaṃ yācati
GE07mbh_05_u:2349: 05,037.004a yaś cābhijātaḥ prakaroty akāryaṃ; yaś cābalo balinā nityavairī
GE07mbh_05_u:2350: 05,037.004c aśraddadhānāya ca yo bravīti; yaś cākāmyaṃ kāmayate narendra
GE07mbh_05_u:2351: 05,037.005a vadhvā hāsaṃ śvaśuro yaś ca manyate; vadhvā vasann uta yo mānakāmaḥ 05,037.005c parakṣetre nirvapati yaś ca bījaṃ; striyaṃ ca yaḥ parivadate
GE07mbh_05_u:2353: 05,037.006a yaś caiva labdhvā na smarāmīty uvāca; dattvā ca yaḥ katthati yācyamānaḥ 05,037.006c yaś cāsataḥ sāntvam upāsatīha; ete 'nuyānty anilaṃ pāśahastāḥ 05,037.007a yasmin yathā vartate yo manuṣyas; tasmiṃs tathā vartitavyaṃ sa dharmaḥ 05,037.007c māyācāro māyayā vartitavyaḥ; sādhv ācāraḥ sādhunā pratyudeyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2354: 05,037.007d*0222_01 jarā rūpaṃ harati hi dhairyam āśā
GE07mbh_05_u:2358: 05,037.008 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,037.008a śatāyur uktaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvavedeṣu vai yadā
GE07mbh_05_u:2359: 05,037.008c nāpnoty atha ca tat sarvam āyuḥ keneha hetunā 05,037.009 vidura uvāca 05,037.009a ativādo 'timānaś ca tathātyāgo narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:2360: 05,037.009c krodhaś cātivivitsā ca mitradrohaś ca tāni ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:2361: 05,037.010a eta evāsayas tīkṣṇāḥ kṛntanty āyūṃṣi dehinām
GE07mbh_05_u:2362: 05,037.010c etāni mānavān ghnanti na mṛtyur bhadram astu te 05,037.011a viśvastasyaiti yo dārān yaś cāpi gurutalpagaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2363: 05,037.011c vṛṣalīpatir dvijo yaś ca pānapaś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:2364: 05,037.011d*0223_01 ādeśakṛd vṛttihantā dvijānāṃ preṣakaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2365: 05,037.012a śaraṇāgatahā caiva sarve brahmahaṇaiḥ samāḥ 05,037.012c etaiḥ sametya kartavyaṃ prāyaścittam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2367: 05,037.013c nānarthakṛt tyaktakaliḥ kṛtajñaḥ; satyo mṛduḥ svargam upaiti vidvān 05,037.014a sulabhāḥ puruṣā rājan satataṃ priyavādinaḥ 05,037.014c apriyasya tu pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:2373: 05,037.017d*0224_01 dyūtam etat purākalpe dṛṣṭaṃ vairakaraṃ nṛṇām

GE07mbh_05_u:2375: 05,037.018a uktaṃ mayā dyūtakāle 'pi rājan; naivaṃ yuktaṃ vacanaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:2377: 05,037.018c tadauṣadhaṃ pathyam ivāturasya; na rocate tava vaicitravīrya
GE07mbh_05_u:2378: 05,037.019a kākair imāṃś citrabarhān mayūrān; parājaiṣṭhāḥ pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2379: 05,037.019c hitvā siṃhān kroṣṭukān gūhamānaḥ; prāpte kāle śocitā tvaṃ narendra 05,037.020a yas tāta na krudhyati sarvakālaṃ; bhṛtyasya bhaktasya hite
GE07mbh_05_u:2381: 05,037.020c tasmin bhṛtyā bhartari viśvasanti; na cainam āpatsu
GE07mbh_05_u:2383: 05,037.021a na bhṛtyānāṃ vṛttisaṃrodhanena; bāhyaṃ janaṃ saṃjighṛkṣed
GE07mbh_05_u:2385: 05,037.021c tyajanti hy enam ucitāvaruddhāḥ; snigdhā hy amātyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2387: 05,037.022a kṛtyāni pūrvaṃ parisaṃkhyāya sarvāṇy; āyavyayāv anurūpāṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2389: 05,037.022c saṃgṛhṇīyād anurūpān sahāyān; sahāyasādhyāni hi duṣkarāṇi
GE07mbh_05_u:2390: 05,037.023a abhiprāyaṃ yo viditvā tu bhartuḥ; sarvāṇi kāryāṇi karoty
GE07mbh_05_u:2392: 05,037.023c vaktā hitānām anurakta āryaḥ; śaktijña ātmeva hi so 'nukampyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2393: 05,037.023d*0225_01 bāṇaḥ śākuniko mantrī ekākī stambhasevakaḥ 05,037.023d*0225_02 sadyorogī vivādī ca saptaitān sevakāṃs tyajet
GE07mbh_05_u:2394: 05,037.024a vākyaṃ tu yo nādriyate 'nuśiṣṭaḥ; pratyāha yaś cāpi
GE07mbh_05_u:2396: 05,037.024c prajñābhimānī pratikūlavādī; tyājyaḥ sa tādṛk tvarayaiva bhṛtyaḥ 05,037.025a astabdham aklībam adīrghasūtraṃ; sānukrośaṃ ślakṣṇam ahāryam
GE07mbh_05_u:2399: 05,037.026a na viśvāsāj jātu parasya gehaṃ; gacchen naraś cetayāno vikāle
GE07mbh_05_u:2400: 05,037.026c na catvare niśi tiṣṭhen nigūḍho; na rājanyāṃ yoṣitaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:2402: 05,037.027a na nihnavaṃ satragatasya gacchet; saṃsṛṣṭamantrasya kusaṃgatasya 05,037.027c na ca brūyān nāśvasāmi tvayīti; sakāraṇaṃ vyapadeśaṃ tu kuryāt
GE07mbh_05_u:2403: 05,037.028a ghṛṇī rājā puṃścalī rājabhṛtyaḥ; putro bhrātā vidhavā
GE07mbh_05_u:2405: 05,037.028c senājīvī coddhṛtabhakta eva; vyavahāre vai varjanīyāḥ syur ete 05,037.029a guṇā daśa snānaśīlaṃ bhajante; balaṃ rūpaṃ svaravarṇapraśuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2406: 05,037.029c sparśaś ca gandhaś ca viśuddhatā ca; śrīḥ saukumāryaṃ pravarāś
GE07mbh_05_u:2407: ca nāryaḥ 05,037.030a guṇāś ca ṣaṇmitabhuktaṃ bhajante; ārogyam āyuś ca sukhaṃ balaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2408: 05,037.030c anāvilaṃ cāsya bhaved apatyaṃ; na cainam ādyūna iti kṣipanti 05,037.031a akarmaśīlaṃ ca mahāśanaṃ ca; lokadviṣṭaṃ bahumāyaṃ nṛśaṃsam
GE07mbh_05_u:2409: 05,037.031c adeśakālajñam aniṣṭaveṣam; etān gṛhe na prativāsayīta
GE07mbh_05_u:2410: 05,037.032a kadaryam ākrośakam aśrutaṃ ca; varākasaṃbhūtam amānyamāninam 05,037.032c niṣṭhūriṇaṃ kṛtavairaṃ kṛtaghnam; etān bhṛśārto 'pi na jātu yācet
GE07mbh_05_u:2412: 05,037.033c vikṛṣṭarāgaṃ bahumāninaṃ cāpy; etān na seveta narādhamān ṣaṭ 05,037.034a sahāyabandhanā hy arthāḥ sahāyāś cārthabandhanāḥ 05,037.034c anyonyabandhanāv etau vinānyonyaṃ na sidhyataḥ 05,037.035a utpādya putrān anṛṇāṃś ca kṛtvā; vṛttiṃ ca tebhyo 'nuvidhāya
GE07mbh_05_u:2413: kāṃ cit 05,037.035c sthāne kumārīḥ pratipādya sarvā; araṇyasaṃstho munivad bubhūṣet
GE07mbh_05_u:2414: 05,037.036a hitaṃ yat sarvabhūtānām ātmanaś ca sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_05_u:2415: 05,037.036c tat kuryād īśvaro hy etan mūlaṃ dharmārthasiddhaye
GE07mbh_05_u:2416: 05,037.037a buddhiḥ prabhāvas tejaś ca sattvam utthānam eva ca 05,037.037c vyavasāyaś ca yasya syāt tasyāvṛttibhayaṃ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2417: 05,037.038a paśya doṣān pāṇḍavair vigrahe tvaṃ; yatra vyatherann api devāḥ saśakrāḥ 05,037.038c putrair vairaṃ nityam udvignavāso; yaśaḥpraṇāśo dviṣatāṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2419: 05,037.039a bhīṣmasya kopas tava cendrakalpa; droṇasya rājñaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2421: 05,037.039c utsādayel lokam imaṃ pravṛddhaḥ; śveto grahas tiryag ivāpatan khe 05,037.040a tava putraśataṃ caiva karṇaḥ pañca ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2423: 05,037.041a dhārtarāṣṭrā vanaṃ rājan vyāghrāḥ pāṇḍusutā matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2424: 05,037.041c mā vanaṃ chindhi savyāghraṃ mā vyāghrān nīnaśo vanāt 05,037.042a na syād vanam ṛte vyāghrān vyāghrā na syur ṛte vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:2425: 05,037.042c vanaṃ hi rakṣyate vyāghrair vyāghrān rakṣati kānanam
GE07mbh_05_u:2426: 05,037.043a na tathecchanty akalyāṇāḥ pareṣāṃ vedituṃ guṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:2427: 05,037.043c yathaiṣāṃ jñātum icchanti nairguṇyaṃ pāpacetasaḥ 05,037.044a arthasiddhiṃ parām icchan dharmam evāditaś caret
GE07mbh_05_u:2428: 05,037.044c na hi dharmād apaity arthaḥ svargalokād ivāmṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:2429: 05,037.045a yasyātmā virataḥ pāpāt kalyāṇe ca niveśitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2430: 05,037.045c tena sarvam idaṃ buddhaṃ prakṛtir vikṛtiś ca yā 05,037.046a yo dharmam arthaṃ kāmaṃ ca yathākālaṃ niṣevate
GE07mbh_05_u:2431: 05,037.046c dharmārthakāmasaṃyogaṃ so 'mutreha ca vindati 05,037.047a saṃniyacchati yo vegam utthitaṃ krodhaharṣayoḥ 05,037.047c sa śriyo bhājanaṃ rājan yaś cāpatsu na muhyati 05,037.048a balaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nityaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_05_u:2432: 05,037.048c yat tu bāhubalaṃ nāma kaniṣṭhaṃ balam ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:2433: 05,037.049a amātyalābho bhadraṃ te dvitīyaṃ balam ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:2434: 05,037.049c dhanalābhas tṛtīyaṃ tu balam āhur jigīṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2435: 05,037.050a yat tv asya sahajaṃ rājan pitṛpaitāmahaṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:2436: 05,037.050c abhijātabalaṃ nāma tac caturthaṃ balaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:2437: 05,037.051a yena tv etāni sarvāṇi saṃgṛhītāni bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:2438: 05,037.051c yad balānāṃ balaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tat prajñābalam ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:2441: 05,037.053a strīṣu rājasu sarpeṣu svādhyāye śatruseviṣu 05,037.053c bhoge cāyuṣi viśvāsaṃ kaḥ prājñaḥ kartum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:2442: 05,037.054a prajñāśareṇābhihatasya jantoś; cikitsakāḥ santi na cauṣadhāni
GE07mbh_05_u:2443: 05,037.054c na homamantrā na ca maṅgalāni; nātharvaṇā nāpy agadāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2445: 05,037.055a sarpaś cāgniś ca siṃhaś ca kulaputraś ca bhārata 05,037.055c nāvajñeyā manuṣyeṇa sarve te hy atitejasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2446: 05,037.056a agnis tejo mahal loke gūḍhas tiṣṭhati dāruṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:2447: 05,037.056c na copayuṅkte tad dāru yāvan no dīpyate paraiḥ 05,037.057a sa eva khalu dārubhyo yadā nirmathya dīpyate
GE07mbh_05_u:2448: 05,037.057c tadā tac ca vanaṃ cānyan nirdahaty āśu tejasā 05,037.058a evam eva kule jātāḥ pāvakopamatejasaḥ 05,037.058c kṣamāvanto nirākārāḥ kāṣṭhe 'gnir iva śerate 05,037.059a latādharmā tvaṃ saputraḥ śālāḥ pāṇḍusutā matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2449: 05,037.059c na latā vardhate jātu mahādrumam anāśritā
GE07mbh_05_u:2450: 05,037.060a vanaṃ rājaṃs tvaṃ saputro 'mbikeya; siṃhān vane pāṇḍavāṃs tāta viddhi 05,037.060c siṃhair vihīnaṃ hi vanaṃ vinaśyet; siṃhā vinaśyeyur ṛte vanena
GE07mbh_05_u:2451: 05,038.001 vidura uvāca 05,038.001a ūrdhvaṃ prāṇā hy utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavira āyati
GE07mbh_05_u:2453: 05,038.002a pīṭhaṃ dattvā sādhave 'bhyāgatāya; ānīyāpaḥ parinirṇijya pādau
GE07mbh_05_u:2454: 05,038.002c sukhaṃ pṛṣṭvā prativedyātmasaṃsthaṃ; tato dadyād annam avekṣya dhīraḥ 05,038.003a yasyodakaṃ madhuparkaṃ ca gāṃ ca; namantravit pratigṛhṇāti gehe
GE07mbh_05_u:2455: 05,038.003c lobhād bhayād arthakārpaṇyato vā; tasyānarthaṃ jīvitam āhur
GE07mbh_05_u:2457: 05,038.004a cikitsakaḥ śalyakartāvakīrṇī; stenaḥ krūro madyapo bhrūṇahā ca 05,038.004c senājīvī śrutivikrāyakaś ca; bhṛśaṃ priyo 'py atithir nodakārhaḥ 05,038.005a avikreyaṃ lavaṇaṃ pakvam annaṃ; dadhi kṣīraṃ madhu tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2458: 05,038.005c tilā māṃsaṃ mūlaphalāni śākaṃ; raktaṃ vāsaḥ sarvagandhā guḍaś ca 05,038.006a aroṣaṇo yaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcanaḥ; prahīṇaśoko gatasaṃdhivigrahaḥ 05,038.006c nindāpraśaṃsoparataḥ priyāpriye; carann udāsīnavad eṣa
GE07mbh_05_u:2460: 05,038.007a nīvāramūleṅgudaśākavṛttiḥ; susaṃyatātmāgnikāryeṣv acodyaḥ 05,038.007c vane vasann atithiṣv apramatto; dhuraṃdharaḥ puṇyakṛd eṣa
GE07mbh_05_u:2463: 05,038.008c dīrghau buddhimato bāhū yābhyāṃ hiṃsati hiṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2464: 05,038.009a na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste nātiviśvaset 05,038.009c viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati
GE07mbh_05_u:2465: 05,038.010a anīrṣyur guptadāraḥ syāt saṃvibhāgī priyaṃvadaḥ 05,038.010c ślakṣṇo madhuravāk strīṇāṃ na cāsāṃ vaśago bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:2466: 05,038.011a pūjanīyā mahābhāgāḥ puṇyāś ca gṛhadīptayaḥ 05,038.011c striyaḥ śriyo gṛhasyoktās tasmād rakṣyā viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2467: 05,038.012a pitur antaḥpuraṃ dadyān mātur dadyān mahānasam
GE07mbh_05_u:2468: 05,038.012c goṣu cātmasamaṃ dadyāt svayam eva kṛṣiṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_05_u:2469: 05,038.012e bhṛtyair vaṇijyācāraṃ ca putraiḥ seveta brāhmaṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:2470: 05,038.013a adbhyo 'gnir brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmano loham utthitam 05,038.013c teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu śāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:2471: 05,038.014a nityaṃ santaḥ kule jātāḥ pāvakopamatejasaḥ 05,038.014c kṣamāvanto nirākārāḥ kāṣṭhe 'gnir iva śerate 05,038.015a yasya mantraṃ na jānanti bāhyāś cābhyantarāś ca ye 05,038.015c sa rājā sarvataścakṣuś ciram aiśvaryam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:2472: 05,038.016a kariṣyan na prabhāṣeta kṛtāny eva ca darśayet
GE07mbh_05_u:2473: 05,038.016c dharmakāmārthakāryāṇi tathā mantro na bhidyate 05,038.017a giripṛṣṭham upāruhya prāsādaṃ vā rahogataḥ 05,038.017c araṇye niḥśalāke vā tatra mantro vidhīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:2474: 05,038.018a nāsuhṛt paramaṃ mantraṃ bhāratārhati veditum 05,038.018c apaṇḍito vāpi suhṛt paṇḍito vāpy anātmavān
GE07mbh_05_u:2475: 05,038.018d*0226_01 nāparīkṣya mahīpālaḥ kuryāt sacivam ātmanaḥ 05,038.018e amātye hy arthalipsā ca mantrarakṣaṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2476: 05,038.019a kṛtāni sarvakāryāṇi yasya vā pārṣadā viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2477: 05,038.019b*0227_01 dharme cārthe ca kāme ca sa rājā rājasattamaḥ 05,038.019c gūḍhamantrasya nṛpates tasya siddhir asaṃśayam 05,038.020a apraśastāni karmāṇi yo mohād anutiṣṭhati 05,038.020c sa teṣāṃ viparibhraṃśe bhraśyate jīvitād api
GE07mbh_05_u:2478: 05,038.021a karmaṇāṃ tu praśastānām anuṣṭhānaṃ sukhāvaham 05,038.021c teṣām evānanuṣṭhānaṃ paścāttāpakaraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:2479: 05,038.021d*0228_01 anadhītya yathā vedān na vipraḥ śrāddham arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:2480: 05,038.021d*0228_02 evam aśrutaṣāḍguṇyo na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:2481: 05,038.022a sthānavṛddhikṣayajñasya ṣāḍguṇyaviditātmanaḥ 05,038.022c anavajñātaśīlasya svādhīnā pṛthivī nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:2484: 05,038.024a nāmamātreṇa tuṣyeta chatreṇa ca mahīpatiḥ 05,038.024c bhṛtyebhyo visṛjed arthān naikaḥ sarvaharo bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:2485: 05,038.025a brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇaṃ veda bhartā veda striyaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:2486: 05,038.025c amātyaṃ nṛpatir veda rājā rājānam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2487: 05,038.026a na śatrur aṅkam āpanno moktavyo vadhyatāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2488: 05,038.026b*0229_01 nyag bhūtvā paryupāsīta vadhyaṃ hanyād bale sati
GE07mbh_05_u:2489: 05,038.026b*0230_01 ahanyamāno bhayakṛn na hatāj jāyate bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:2490: 05,038.026c ahatād dhi bhayaṃ tasmāj jāyate nacirād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:2491: 05,038.027a daivateṣu ca yatnena rājasu brāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2492: 05,038.027c niyantavyaḥ sadā krodho vṛddhabālātureṣu ca 05,038.028a nirarthaṃ kalahaṃ prājño varjayen mūḍhasevitam 05,038.028c kīrtiṃ ca labhate loke na cānarthena yujyate
GE07mbh_05_u:2493: 05,038.029a prasādo niṣphalo yasya krodhaś cāpi nirarthakaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2494: 05,038.029c na taṃ bhartāram icchanti ṣaṇḍhaṃ patim iva striyaḥ 05,038.030a na buddhir dhanalābhāya na jāḍyam asamṛddhaye
GE07mbh_05_u:2499: 05,038.032c anarthāḥ kṣipram āyānti vāgduṣṭaṃ krodhanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:2501: 05,038.033c āvartayanti bhūtāni samyak praṇihitā ca vāk
GE07mbh_05_u:2502: 05,038.034a avisaṃvādako dakṣaḥ kṛtajño matimān ṛjuḥ 05,038.034c api saṃkṣīṇakośo 'pi labhate parivāraṇam 05,038.035a dhṛtiḥ śamo damaḥ śaucaṃ kāruṇyaṃ vāg aniṣṭhurā
GE07mbh_05_u:2503: 05,038.035c mitrāṇāṃ cānabhidrohaḥ saptaitāḥ samidhaḥ śriyaḥ 05,038.036a asaṃvibhāgī duṣṭātmā kṛtaghno nirapatrapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2504: 05,038.036c tādṛṅ narādhamo loke varjanīyo narādhipa 05,038.037a na sa rātrau sukhaṃ śete sasarpa iva veśmani 05,038.037c yaḥ kopayati nirdoṣaṃ sadoṣo 'bhyantaraṃ janam
GE07mbh_05_u:2505: 05,038.038a yeṣu duṣṭeṣu doṣaḥ syād yogakṣemasya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:2506: 05,038.038c sadā prasādanaṃ teṣāṃ devatānām ivācaret 05,038.039a ye 'rthāḥ strīṣu samāsaktāḥ prathamotpatiteṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2507: 05,038.039c ye cānāryasamāsaktāḥ sarve te saṃśayaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2508: 05,038.040a yatra strī yatra kitavo yatra bālo 'nuśāsti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2509: 05,038.040c majjanti te 'vaśā deśā nadyām aśmaplavā iva
GE07mbh_05_u:2510: 05,038.041a prayojaneṣu ye saktā na viśeṣeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:2511: 05,038.041c tān ahaṃ paṇḍitān manye viśeṣā hi prasaṅginaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2512: 05,038.042a yaṃ praśaṃsanti kitavā yaṃ praśaṃsanti cāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2513: 05,038.042c yaṃ praśaṃsanti bandhakyo na sa jīvati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2514: 05,038.043a hitvā tān parameṣvāsān pāṇḍavān amitaujasaḥ 05,038.043c āhitaṃ bhārataiśvaryaṃ tvayā duryodhane mahat 05,038.044a taṃ drakṣyasi paribhraṣṭaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ nacirād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:2516: 05,039.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,039.001a anīśvaro 'yaṃ puruṣo bhavābhave; sūtraprotā dārumayīva
GE07mbh_05_u:2517: 05,039.001c dhātrā tu diṣṭasya vaśe kilāyaṃ; tasmād vada tvaṃ śravaṇe dhṛto 'ham
GE07mbh_05_u:2518: 05,039.002 vidura uvāca 05,039.002a aprāptakālaṃ vacanaṃ bṛhaspatir api bruvan 05,039.002c labhate buddhyavajñānam avamānaṃ ca bhārata 05,039.003a priyo bhavati dānena priyavādena cāparaḥ 05,039.003c mantraṃ mūlabalenānyo yaḥ priyaḥ priya eva saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2519: 05,039.004a dveṣyo na sādhur bhavati na medhāvī na paṇḍitaḥ 05,039.004c priye śubhāni karmāṇi dveṣye pāpāni bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:2521: 05,039.004d*0231_02 duryodhanaṃ tyaja putraṃ tvam ekam 05,039.004d*0231_03 tasya tyāgāt putraśatasya vṛddhir
GE07mbh_05_u:2523: 05,039.004d*0231_05 na vṛddhir bahumantavyā yā vṛddhiḥ kṣayam āvahet
GE07mbh_05_u:2524: 05,039.004d*0231_06 kṣayo 'pi bahumantavyo yaḥ kṣayo vṛddhim āvahet 05,039.005a na sa kṣayo mahārāja yaḥ kṣayo vṛddhim āvahet 05,039.005c kṣayaḥ sa tv iha mantavyo yaṃ labdhvā bahu nāśayet
GE07mbh_05_u:2525: 05,039.006a samṛddhā guṇataḥ ke cid bhavanti dhanato 'pare
GE07mbh_05_u:2526: 05,039.006c dhanavṛddhān guṇair hīnān dhṛtarāṣṭra vivarjayet 05,039.007 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,039.007a sarvaṃ tvam āyatīyuktaṃ bhāṣase prājñasaṃmatam 05,039.007c na cotsahe sutaṃ tyaktuṃ yato dharmas tato jayaḥ 05,039.008 vidura uvāca 05,039.008a svabhāvaguṇasaṃpanno na jātu vinayānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2527: 05,039.008c susūkṣmam api bhūtānām upamardaṃ prayokṣyate 05,039.009a parāpavādaniratāḥ paraduḥkhodayeṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:2529: 05,039.010a sadoṣaṃ darśanaṃ yeṣāṃ saṃvāse sumahad bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:2530: 05,039.010c arthādāne mahān doṣaḥ pradāne ca mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:2531: 05,039.010d*0232_01 ye vai bhedanaśīlās tu sakāmā nistrapāḥ śaṭhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2532: 05,039.011a ye pāpā iti vikhyātāḥ saṃvāse parigarhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:2533: 05,039.011c yuktāś cānyair mahādoṣair ye narās tān vivarjayet
GE07mbh_05_u:2534: 05,039.012a nivartamāne sauhārde prītir nīce praṇaśyati 05,039.012c yā caiva phalanirvṛttiḥ sauhṛde caiva yat sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:2535: 05,039.013a yatate cāpavādāya yatnam ārabhate kṣaye 05,039.013c alpe 'py apakṛte mohān na śāntim upagacchati 05,039.014a tādṛśaiḥ saṃgataṃ nīcair nṛśaṃsair akṛtātmabhiḥ 05,039.014c niśāmya nipuṇaṃ buddhyā vidvān dūrād vivarjayet
GE07mbh_05_u:2536: 05,039.015a yo jñātim anugṛhṇāti daridraṃ dīnam āturam
GE07mbh_05_u:2537: 05,039.015c sa putrapaśubhir vṛddhiṃ yaśaś cāvyayam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:2538: 05,039.016a jñātayo vardhanīyās tair ya icchanty ātmanaḥ śubham
GE07mbh_05_u:2539: 05,039.016c kulavṛddhiṃ ca rājendra tasmāt sādhu samācara
GE07mbh_05_u:2540: 05,039.017a śreyasā yokṣyase rājan kurvāṇo jñātisatkriyām 05,039.017c viguṇā hy api saṃrakṣyā jñātayo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:2541: 05,039.018a kiṃ punar guṇavantas te tvatprasādābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ 05,039.018c prasādaṃ kuru dīnānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:2542: 05,039.019a dīyantāṃ grāmakāḥ ke cit teṣāṃ vṛttyartham īśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:2543: 05,039.019c evaṃ loke yaśaḥprāpto bhaviṣyasi narādhipa 05,039.020a vṛddhena hi tvayā kāryaṃ putrāṇāṃ tāta rakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:2544: 05,039.020c mayā cāpi hitaṃ vācyaṃ viddhi māṃ tvaddhitaiṣiṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:2545: 05,039.021a jñātibhir vigrahas tāta na kartavyo bhavārthinā
GE07mbh_05_u:2546: 05,039.021c sukhāni saha bhojyāni jñātibhir bharatarṣabha 05,039.022a saṃbhojanaṃ saṃkathanaṃ saṃprītiś ca parasparam 05,039.022c jñātibhiḥ saha kāryāṇi na virodhaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:2547: 05,039.023a jñātayas tārayantīha jñātayo majjayanti ca 05,039.023c suvṛttās tārayantīha durvṛttā majjayanti ca 05,039.024a suvṛtto bhava rājendra pāṇḍavān prati mānada
GE07mbh_05_u:2548: 05,039.024c adharṣaṇīyaḥ śatrūṇāṃ tair vṛtas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:2549: 05,039.025a śrīmantaṃ jñātim āsādya yo jñātir avasīdati

GE07mbh_05_u:3146: 05,047.024c dāntair yuktaṃ sahadevo 'dhirūḍhaḥ; śirāṃsi rājñāṃ kṣepsyate
GE07mbh_05_u:3148: 05,047.025a mahābhaye saṃpravṛtte rathasthaṃ; vivartamānaṃ samare kṛtāstram
GE07mbh_05_u:3149: 05,047.025c sarvāṃ diśaṃ saṃpatantaṃ samīkṣya; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3151: 05,047.026a hrīniṣedho nipuṇaḥ satyavādī; mahābalaḥ sarvadharmopapannaḥ 05,047.026c gāndhārim ārcchaṃs tumule kṣiprakārī; kṣeptā janān sahadevas
GE07mbh_05_u:3153: 05,047.027a yadā draṣṭā draupadeyān maheṣūñ; śūrān kṛtāstrān rathayuddhakovidān
GE07mbh_05_u:3154: 05,047.027c āśīviṣān ghoraviṣān ivāyatas; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3156: 05,047.028a yadābhimanyuḥ paravīraghātī; śaraiḥ parān megha ivābhivarṣan
GE07mbh_05_u:3157: 05,047.028c vigāhitā kṛṣṇasamaḥ kṛtāstras; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3159: 05,047.029a yadā draṣṭā bālam abālavīryaṃ; dviṣaccamūṃ mṛtyum ivāpatantam
GE07mbh_05_u:3160: 05,047.029c saubhadram indrapratimaṃ kṛtāstraṃ; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3162: 05,047.030a prabhadrakāḥ śīghratarā yuvāno; viśāradāḥ siṃhasamānavīryāḥ 05,047.030c yadā kṣeptāro dhārtarāṣṭrān sasainyāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:3163: 05,047.031a vṛddhau virāṭadrupadau mahārathau; pṛthak camūbhyām abhivartamānau
GE07mbh_05_u:3164: 05,047.031c yadā draṣṭārau dhārtarāṣṭrān sasainyāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:3165: 05,047.032a yadā kṛtāstro drupadaḥ pracinvañ; śirāṃsi yūnāṃ samare
GE07mbh_05_u:3167: 05,047.032c kruddhaḥ śaraiś chetsyati cāpamuktais; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:3168: 05,047.033a yadā virāṭaḥ paravīraghātī; marmāntare śatrucamūṃ praveṣṭā
GE07mbh_05_u:3169: 05,047.033c matsyaiḥ sārdham anṛśaṃsarūpais; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3171: 05,047.034a jyeṣṭhaṃ mātsyānām anṛśaṃsarūpaṃ; virāṭaputraṃ rathinaṃ purastāt
GE07mbh_05_u:3172: 05,047.034c yadā draṣṭā daṃśitaṃ pāṇḍavārthe; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3174: 05,047.035a raṇe hate kauravāṇāṃ pravīre; śikhaṇḍinā sattame śaṃtanūje
GE07mbh_05_u:3175: 05,047.035c na jātu naḥ śatravo dhārayeyur; asaṃśayaṃ satyam etad bravīmi
GE07mbh_05_u:3176: 05,047.036a yadā śikhaṇḍī rathinaḥ pracinvan; bhīṣmaṃ rathenābhiyātā varūthī
GE07mbh_05_u:3177: 05,047.036c divyair hayair avamṛdnan rathaughāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:3178: 05,047.037a yadā draṣṭā sṛñjayānām anīke; dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ pramukhe rocamānam
GE07mbh_05_u:3179: 05,047.037c astraṃ yasmai guhyam uvāca dhīmān; droṇas tadā tapsyati
GE07mbh_05_u:3181: 05,047.038a yadā sa senāpatir aprameyaḥ; parābhavann iṣubhir dhārtarāṣṭrān
GE07mbh_05_u:3182: 05,047.038c droṇaṃ raṇe śatrusaho 'bhiyātā; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3184: 05,047.039a hrīmān manīṣī balavān manasvī; sa lakṣmīvān somakānāṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3186: 05,047.039c na jātu taṃ śatravo 'nye saheran; yeṣāṃ sa syād agraṇīr vṛṣṇisiṃhaḥ 05,047.040a brūyāc ca mā pravṛṇīṣveti loke; yuddhe 'dvitīyaṃ sacivaṃ rathastham 05,047.040c śiner naptāraṃ pravṛṇīma sātyakiṃ; mahābalaṃ vītabhayaṃ kṛtāstram
GE07mbh_05_u:3191: 05,047.041a yadā śinīnām adhipo mayoktaḥ; śaraiḥ parān megha iva pravarṣan 05,047.041c pracchādayiṣyañ śarajālena yodhāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3193: 05,047.042a yadā dhṛtiṃ kurute yotsyamānaḥ; sa dīrghabāhur dṛḍhadhanvā
GE07mbh_05_u:3195: 05,047.042c siṃhasyeva gandham āghrāya gāvaḥ; saṃveṣṭante śatravo 'smād
GE07mbh_05_u:3197: 05,047.043a sa dīrghabāhur dṛḍhadhanvā mahātmā; bhindyād girīn saṃharet
GE07mbh_05_u:3199: 05,047.043c astre kṛtī nipuṇaḥ kṣiprahasto; divi sthitaḥ sūrya ivābhibhāti
GE07mbh_05_u:3200: 05,047.044a citraḥ sūkṣmaḥ sukṛto yādavasya; astre yogo vṛṣṇisiṃhasya
GE07mbh_05_u:3202: 05,047.044c yathāvidhaṃ yogam āhuḥ praśastaṃ; sarvair guṇaiḥ sātyakis tair upetaḥ 05,047.045a hiraṇmayaṃ śvetahayaiś caturbhir; yadā yuktaṃ syandanaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3204: 05,047.045c draṣṭā yuddhe sātyaker vai suyodhanas; tadā tapsyaty akṛtātmā
GE07mbh_05_u:3205: sa mandaḥ 05,047.046a yadā rathaṃ hemamaṇiprakāśaṃ; śvetāśvayuktaṃ vānaraketum ugram
GE07mbh_05_u:3206: 05,047.046c draṣṭā raṇe saṃyataṃ keśavena; tadā tapsyaty akṛtātmā sa mandaḥ 05,047.047a yadā maurvyās talaniṣpeṣam ugraṃ; mahāśabdaṃ vajraniṣpeṣatulyam 05,047.047c vidhūyamānasya mahāraṇe mayā; gāṇḍīvasya śroṣyati mandabuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3207: 05,047.048a tadā mūḍho dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putras; taptā yuddhe durmatir
GE07mbh_05_u:3209: 05,047.048c dṛṣṭvā sainyaṃ bāṇavarṣāndhakāraṃ; prabhajyantaṃ gokulavad raṇāgre
GE07mbh_05_u:3210: 05,047.049a balāhakād uccarantīva vidyut; sahasraghnī dviṣatāṃ saṃgameṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:3212: 05,047.049c asthicchido marmabhido vamec charāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:3213: 05,047.050a yadā draṣṭā jyāmukhād bāṇasaṃghān; gāṇḍīvamuktān patataḥ śitāgrān
GE07mbh_05_u:3214: 05,047.050c nāgān hayān varmiṇaś cādadānāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3216: 05,047.051a yadā mandaḥ parabāṇān vimuktān; mameṣubhir hriyamāṇān pratīpam
GE07mbh_05_u:3217: 05,047.051c tiryag vidvāṃś chidyamānān kṣuraprais; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:3218: 05,047.052a yadā vipāṭhā madbhujavipramuktā; dvijāḥ phalānīva mahīruhāgrāt
GE07mbh_05_u:3219: 05,047.052c pracchettāra uttamāṅgāni yūnāṃ; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3221: 05,047.053a yadā draṣṭā patataḥ syandanebhyo; mahāgajebhyo 'śvagatāṃś ca yodhān 05,047.053c śarair hatān pātitāṃś caiva raṅge; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro
GE07mbh_05_u:3227: 05,047.054a padātisaṃghān rathasaṃghān samantād; vyāttānanaḥ kāla ivātateṣuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3228: 05,047.054c praṇotsyāmi jvalitair bāṇavarṣaiḥ; śatrūṃs tadā tapsyati
GE07mbh_05_u:3230: 05,047.055a sarvā diśaḥ saṃpatatā rathena; rajodhvastaṃ gāṇḍivenāpakṛttam 05,047.055c yadā draṣṭā svabalaṃ saṃpramūḍhaṃ; tadā paścāt tapsyati
GE07mbh_05_u:3232: 05,047.056a kāṃdigbhūtaṃ chinnagātraṃ visaṃjñaṃ; duryodhano drakṣyati sarvasainyam
GE07mbh_05_u:3235: 05,047.057c prajāpateḥ karma yathārdhaniṣṭhitaṃ; tadā dṛṣṭvā tapsyate
GE07mbh_05_u:3237: 05,047.058a yadā rathe gāṇḍivaṃ vāsudevaṃ; divyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3238: hayāṃś ca 05,047.058b*0316_01 yadā mūrvyāṃ mūlaniḥśeṣam ugraṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3241: 05,047.058c tūṇāv akṣayyau devadattaṃ ca māṃ ca; draṣṭā yuddhe dhārtarāṣṭraḥ sametān 05,047.059a udvartayan dasyusaṃghān sametān; pravartayan yugam anyad
GE07mbh_05_u:3243: 05,047.059c yadā dhakṣyāmy agnivat kauraveyāṃs; tadā taptā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3246: 05,047.060c darpasyānte vihite vepamānaḥ; paścān mandas tapsyati
GE07mbh_05_u:3248: 05,047.061a pūrvāhṇe māṃ kṛtajapyaṃ kadā cid; vipraḥ provācodakānte manojñam
GE07mbh_05_u:3249: 05,047.061c kartavyaṃ te duṣkaraṃ karma pārtha; yoddhavyaṃ te śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3251: 05,047.062a indro vā te harivān vajrahastaḥ; purastād yātu samare 'rīn
GE07mbh_05_u:3253: 05,047.062c sugrīvayuktena rathena vā te; paścāt kṛṣṇo rakṣatu vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3254: 05,047.063a vavre cāhaṃ vajrahastān mahendrād; asmin yuddhe vāsudevaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3256: 05,047.063c sa me labdho dasyuvadhāya kṛṣṇo; manye caitad vihitaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3257: daivatair me 05,047.064a ayudhyamāno manasāpi yasya; jayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ puruṣasyābhinandet
GE07mbh_05_u:3258: 05,047.064c dhruvaṃ sarvān so 'bhyatīyād amitrān; sendrān devān mānuṣe
GE07mbh_05_u:3259: nāsti cintā 05,047.065a sa bāhubhyāṃ sāgaram uttitīrṣen; mahodadhiṃ salilasyāprameyam 05,047.065c tejasvinaṃ kṛṣṇam atyantaśūraṃ; yuddhena yo vāsudevaṃ jigīṣet
GE07mbh_05_u:3260: 05,047.066a giriṃ ya iccheta talena bhettuṃ; śiloccayaṃ śvetam atipramāṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:3261: 05,047.066c tasyaiva pāṇiḥ sanakho viśīryen; na cāpi kiṃ cit sa gires tu kuryāt 05,047.067a agniṃ samiddhaṃ śamayed bhujābhyāṃ; candraṃ ca sūryaṃ ca nivārayeta 05,047.067c hared devānām amṛtaṃ prasahya; yuddhena yo vāsudevaṃ jigīṣet
GE07mbh_05_u:3262: 05,047.068a yo rukmiṇīm ekarathena bhojyām; utsādya rājñāṃ viṣayaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3264: 05,047.068c uvāha bhāryāṃ yaśasā jvalantīṃ; yasyāṃ jajñe raukmiṇeyo
GE07mbh_05_u:3266: 05,047.069a ayaṃ gāndhārāṃs tarasā saṃpramathya; jitvā putrān nagnajitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3268: 05,047.069c baddhaṃ mumoca vinadantaṃ prasahya; sudarśanīyaṃ devatānāṃ lalāmam
GE07mbh_05_u:3269: 05,047.070a ayaṃ kavāṭe nijaghāna pāṇḍyaṃ; tathā kaliṅgān dantakūre
GE07mbh_05_u:3271: 05,047.070c anena dagdhā varṣapūgān vināthā; vārāṇasī nagarī saṃbabhūva
GE07mbh_05_u:3272: 05,047.071a yaṃ sma yuddhe manyate 'nyair ajeyam; ekalavyaṃ nāma niṣādarājam
GE07mbh_05_u:3273: 05,047.071c vegeneva śailam abhihatya jambhaḥ; śete sa kṛṣṇena hataḥ parāsuḥ 05,047.072a tathograsenasya sutaṃ praduṣṭaṃ; vṛṣṇyandhakānāṃ madhyagāṃ tapantam
GE07mbh_05_u:3274: 05,047.072c apātayad baladevadvitīyo; hatvā dadau cograsenāya rājyam
GE07mbh_05_u:3275: 05,047.073a ayaṃ saubhaṃ yodhayām āsa khasthaṃ; vibhīṣaṇaṃ māyayā śālvarājam
GE07mbh_05_u:3276: 05,047.073c saubhadvāri pratyagṛhṇāc chataghnīṃ; dorbhyāṃ ka enaṃ viṣaheta martyaḥ 05,047.074a prāgjyotiṣaṃ nāma babhūva durgaṃ; puraṃ ghoram asurāṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:3278: 05,047.074c mahābalo narakas tatra bhaumo; jahārādityā maṇikuṇḍale śubhe
GE07mbh_05_u:3279: 05,047.075a na taṃ devāḥ saha śakreṇa sehire; samāgatā āharaṇāya bhītāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3280: 05,047.075c dṛṣṭvā ca te vikramaṃ keśavasya; balaṃ tathaivāstram avāraṇīyam
GE07mbh_05_u:3281: 05,047.076a jānanto 'sya prakṛtiṃ keśavasya; nyayojayan dasyuvadhāya kṛṣṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:3282: 05,047.076c sa tat karma pratiśuśrāva duṣkaram; aiśvaryavān siddhiṣu vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3283: 05,047.077a nirmocane ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi hatvā; saṃchidya pāśān sahasā
GE07mbh_05_u:3285: 05,047.077c muraṃ hatvā vinihatyaugharākṣasaṃ; nirmocanaṃ cāpi jagāma
GE07mbh_05_u:3287: 05,047.078a tatraiva tenāsya babhūva yuddhaṃ; mahābalenātibalasya viṣṇoḥ 05,047.078c śete sa kṛṣṇena hataḥ parāsur; vāteneva mathitaḥ karṇikāraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3288: 05,047.079a āhṛtya kṛṣṇo maṇikuṇḍale te; hatvā ca bhaumaṃ narakaṃ muraṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:3289: 05,047.079c śriyā vṛto yaśasā caiva dhīmān; pratyājagāmāpratimaprabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3290: 05,047.080a tasmai varān adadaṃs tatra devā; dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ karma raṇe kṛtaṃ tat
GE07mbh_05_u:3291: 05,047.080c śramaś ca te yudhyamānasya na syād; ākāśe vā apsu caiva kramaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_05_u:3292: 05,047.081a śastrāṇi gātre ca na te kramerann; ity eva kṛṣṇaś ca tataḥ kṛtārthaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3294: 05,047.082a tam asahyaṃ viṣṇum anantavīryam; āśaṃsate dhārtarāṣṭro balena
GE07mbh_05_u:3295: 05,047.082c yadā hy enaṃ tarkayate durātmā; tac cāpy ayaṃ sahate 'smān
GE07mbh_05_u:3297: 05,047.083a paryāgataṃ mama kṛṣṇasya caiva; yo manyate kalahaṃ saṃprayujya
GE07mbh_05_u:3298: 05,047.083c śakyaṃ hartuṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mamatvaṃ; tad veditā saṃyugaṃ tatra gatvā 05,047.084a namaskṛtvā śāṃtanavāya rājñe; droṇāyātho sahaputrāya caiva
GE07mbh_05_u:3301: 05,047.085a dharmeṇāstraṃ niyataṃ tasya manye; yo yotsyate pāṇḍavair
GE07mbh_05_u:3303: 05,047.085c mithyāglahe nirjitā vai nṛśaṃsaiḥ; saṃvatsarān dvādaśa pāṇḍuputrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3304: 05,047.086a avāpya kṛcchraṃ vihitaṃ hy araṇye; dīrghaṃ kālaṃ caikam
GE07mbh_05_u:3306: 05,047.086c te hy akasmāj jīvitaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ; na mṛṣyante dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3308: 05,047.087a te ced asmān yudhyamānāñ jayeyur; devair apīndrapramukhaiḥ sahāyaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3309: 05,047.087c dharmād adharmaś carito garīyān; iti dhruvaṃ nāsti kṛtaṃ na sādhu
GE07mbh_05_u:3310: 05,047.088a na ced imaṃ puruṣaṃ karmabaddhaṃ; na ced asmān manyate 'sau
GE07mbh_05_u:3313: 05,047.089a na ced idaṃ karma nareṣu baddhaṃ; na vidyate puruṣasya
GE07mbh_05_u:3315: 05,047.089c idaṃ ca tac cāpi samīkṣya nūnaṃ; parājayo dhārtarāṣṭrasya sādhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3316: 05,047.090a pratyakṣaṃ vaḥ kuravo yad bravīmi; yudhyamānā dhārtarāṣṭrā na
GE07mbh_05_u:3318: 05,047.090c anyatra yuddhāt kuravaḥ parīpsan; na yudhyatāṃ śeṣa ihāsti kaś cit
GE07mbh_05_u:3319: 05,047.091a hatvā tv ahaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān sakarṇān; rājyaṃ kurūṇām avajetā
GE07mbh_05_u:3321: 05,047.091c yad vaḥ kāryaṃ tat kurudhvaṃ yathāsvam; iṣṭān dārān ātmajāṃś
GE07mbh_05_u:3323: 05,047.092a apy evaṃ no brāhmaṇāḥ santi vṛddhā; bahuśrutāḥ śīlavantaḥ kulīnāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3324: 05,047.092c sāṃvatsarā jyotiṣi cāpi yuktā; nakṣatrayogeṣu ca niścayajñāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3325: 05,047.093a uccāvacaṃ daivayuktaṃ rahasyaṃ; divyāḥ praśnā mṛgacakrā
GE07mbh_05_u:3327: 05,047.093c kṣayaṃ mahāntaṃ kurusṛñjayānāṃ; nivedayante pāṇḍavānāṃ jayaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3329: 05,047.094a tathā hi no manyate 'jātaśatruḥ; saṃsiddhārtho dviṣatāṃ nigrahāya
GE07mbh_05_u:3330: 05,047.094c janārdanaś cāpy aparokṣavidyo; na saṃśayaṃ paśyati vṛṣṇisiṃhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3331: 05,047.095a ahaṃ ca jānāmi bhaviṣyarūpaṃ; paśyāmi buddhyā svayam
GE07mbh_05_u:3333: 05,047.095c dṛṣṭiś ca me na vyathate purāṇī; yudhyamānā dhārtarāṣṭrā na
GE07mbh_05_u:3335: 05,047.096a anālabdhaṃ jṛmbhati gāṇḍivaṃ dhanur; anālabdhā kampati me
GE07mbh_05_u:3337: 05,047.096c bāṇāś ca me tūṇamukhād visṛjya; muhur muhur gantum uśanti caiva 05,047.097a saikyaḥ kośān niḥsarati prasanno; hitveva jīrṇām uragas tvacaṃ svām 05,047.097c dhvaje vāco raudrarūpā vadanti; kadā ratho yokṣyate te kirīṭin 05,047.098a gomāyusaṃghāś ca vadanti rātrau; rakṣāṃsy atho niṣpatanty
GE07mbh_05_u:3339: 05,047.098c mṛgāḥ śṛgālāḥ śitikaṇṭhāś ca kākā; gṛdhrā baḍāś caiva
GE07mbh_05_u:3340: tarakṣavaś ca 05,047.099a suparṇapātāś ca patanti paścād; dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ śvetahayaprayuktam

GE07mbh_05_u:3488: 05,049.041f*0327_01 pāṇḍavān yo 'bhisaṃsṛtya āste yadukulodbhavaḥ 05,049.042a yaḥ saṃśrayaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ devānām iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3489: 05,049.042c tena vo vāsudevena pāṇḍavā abhyayuñjata 05,049.043a tathā cedipater bhrātā śarabho bharatarṣabha 05,049.043c karakarṣeṇa sahitas tābhyāṃ vas te 'bhyayuñjata
GE07mbh_05_u:3490: 05,049.044a jārāsaṃdhiḥ sahadevo jayatsenaś ca tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:3492: 05,049.044c drupadaś ca mahātejā balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3494: 05,049.045a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ prācyodīcyā mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3495: 05,049.045c śataśo yān apāśritya dharmarājo vyavasthitaḥ 05,050.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,050.001a sarva ete mahotsāhā ye tvayā parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3496: 05,050.001c ekatas tv eva te sarve sametā bhīma ekataḥ 05,050.002a bhīmasenād dhi me bhūyo bhayaṃ saṃjāyate mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:3497: 05,050.002c kruddhād amarṣaṇāt tāta vyāghrād iva mahāruroḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3498: 05,050.003a jāgarmi rātrayaḥ sarvā dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasan
GE07mbh_05_u:3499: 05,050.003c bhīto vṛkodarāt tāta siṃhāt paśur ivābalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3500: 05,050.004a na hi tasya mahābāhoḥ śakrapratimatejasaḥ 05,050.004c sainye 'smin pratipaśyāmi ya enaṃ viṣahed yudhi 05,050.005a amarṣaṇaś ca kaunteyo dṛḍhavairaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3503: 05,050.006c mandānāṃ mama putrāṇāṃ yuddhenāntaṃ kariṣyati 05,050.007a ūrugrāhagṛhītānāṃ gadāṃ bibhrad vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3504: 05,050.007c kurūṇām ṛṣabho yuddhe daṇḍapāṇir ivāntakaḥ 05,050.008a śaikyāyasamayīṃ ghorāṃ gadāṃ kāñcanabhūṣitām
GE07mbh_05_u:3506: 05,050.009a yathā rurūṇāṃ yūtheṣu siṃho jātabalaś caret
GE07mbh_05_u:3507: 05,050.009c māmakeṣu tathā bhīmo baleṣu vicariṣyati 05,050.010a sarveṣāṃ mama putrāṇāṃ sa ekaḥ krūravikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3508: 05,050.010c bahvāśī vipratīpaś ca bālye 'pi rabhasaḥ sadā 05,050.011a udvepate me hṛdayaṃ yadā duryodhanādayaḥ 05,050.011c bālye 'pi tena yudhyanto vāraṇeneva marditāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3509: 05,050.012a tasya vīryeṇa saṃkliṣṭā nityam eva sutā mama
GE07mbh_05_u:3510: 05,050.012b*0329_01 sa vai bhīmo mahāvīryaḥ kruddhaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3511: 05,050.012c sa eva hetur bhedasya bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3515: 05,050.014b*0330_01 maheśvarasamaṃ krodhe ko hanyād bhīmam āhave
GE07mbh_05_u:3516: 05,050.014c saṃjayācakṣva me śūraṃ bhīmasenam amarṣaṇam 05,050.015a atilābhaṃ tu manye 'haṃ yat tena ripughātinā
GE07mbh_05_u:3517: 05,050.015c tadaiva na hatāḥ sarve mama putrā manasvinā
GE07mbh_05_u:3518: 05,050.016a yena bhīmabalā yakṣā rākṣasāś ca samāhatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3520: 05,050.016c kathaṃ tasya raṇe vegaṃ mānuṣaḥ prasahiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:3521: 05,050.017a na sa jātu vaśe tasthau mama bālo 'pi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:3522: 05,050.017c kiṃ punar mama duṣputraiḥ kliṣṭaḥ saṃprati pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3523: 05,050.018a niṣṭhuraḥ sa ca naiṣṭhuryād bhajyed api na saṃnamet 05,050.018c tiryakprekṣī saṃhatabhrūḥ kathaṃ śāmyed vṛkodaraḥ 05,050.019a bṛhadaṃso 'pratibalo gauras tāla ivodgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3525: 05,050.020a javena vājino 'tyeti balenātyeti kuñjarān 05,050.020c avyaktajalpī madhvakṣo madhyamaḥ pāṇḍavo balī 05,050.021a iti bālye śrutaḥ pūrvaṃ mayā vyāsamukhāt purā
GE07mbh_05_u:3526: 05,050.021c rūpato vīryataś caiva yāthātathyena pāṇḍavaḥ 05,050.022a āyasena sa daṇḍena rathān nāgān hayān narān
GE07mbh_05_u:3527: 05,050.022c haniṣyati raṇe kruddho bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3529: 05,050.023c mama tāta pratīpāni kurvan pūrvaṃ vimānitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3530: 05,050.024a niṣkīrṇām āyasīṃ sthūlāṃ suparvāṃ kāñcanīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_05_u:3531: 05,050.024c śataghnīṃ śatanirhrādāṃ kathaṃ śakṣyanti me sutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3533: 05,050.025c bhīmasenamayaṃ durgaṃ tāta mandās titīrṣavaḥ 05,050.026a krośato me na śṛṇvanti bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3535: 05,050.027a saṃyugaṃ ye kariṣyanti nararūpeṇa vāyunā 05,050.027c niyataṃ coditā dhātrā siṃheneva mahāmṛgāḥ 05,050.028a śaikyāṃ tāta catuṣkiṣkuṃ ṣaḍasrim amitaujasam 05,050.028c prahitāṃ duḥkhasaṃsparśāṃ kathaṃ śakṣyanti me sutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3536: 05,050.029a gadāṃ bhrāmayatas tasya bhindato hastimastakān 05,050.029c sṛkkiṇī lelihānasya bāṣpam utsṛjato muhuḥ 05,050.030a uddiśya pātān patataḥ kurvato bhairavān ravān
GE07mbh_05_u:3537: 05,050.030c pratīpān patato mattān kuñjarān pratigarjataḥ 05,050.031a vigāhya rathamārgeṣu varān uddiśya nighnataḥ 05,050.031c agneḥ prajvalitasyeva api mucyeta me prajā
GE07mbh_05_u:3538: 05,050.032a vīthīṃ kurvan mahābāhur drāvayan mama vāhinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:3539: 05,050.032c nṛtyann iva gadāpāṇir yugāntaṃ darśayiṣyati 05,050.033a prabhinna iva mātaṅgaḥ prabhañjan puṣpitān drumān
GE07mbh_05_u:3540: 05,050.033c pravekṣyati raṇe senāṃ putrāṇāṃ me vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3541: 05,050.034a kurvan rathān vipuruṣān vidhvajān bhagnapuṣkarān 05,050.034c ārujan puruṣavyāghro rathinaḥ sādinas tathā 05,050.035a gaṅgāvega ivānūpāṃs tīrajān vividhān drumān 05,050.035c pravekṣyati mahāsenāṃ putrāṇāṃ mama saṃjaya 05,050.036a vaśaṃ nūnaṃ gamiṣyanti bhīmasenabalārditāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3542: 05,050.036c mama putrāś ca bhṛtyāś ca rājānaś caiva saṃjaya 05,050.037a yena rājā mahāvīryaḥ praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ purā 05,050.037c vāsudevasahāyena jarāsaṃdho nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3543: 05,050.038a kṛtsneyaṃ pṛthivī devī jarāsaṃdhena dhīmatā 05,050.038c māgadhendreṇa balinā vaśe kṛtvā pratāpitā 05,050.039a bhīṣmapratāpāt kuravo nayenāndhakavṛṣṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3544: 05,050.039c te na tasya vaśaṃ jagmuḥ kevalaṃ daivam eva vā
GE07mbh_05_u:3545: 05,050.040a sa gatvā pāṇḍuputreṇa tarasā bāhuśālinā 05,050.040c anāyudhena vīreṇa nihataḥ kiṃ tato 'dhikam
GE07mbh_05_u:3546: 05,050.041a dīrghakālena saṃsiktaṃ viṣam āśīviṣo yathā 05,050.041c sa mokṣyati raṇe tejaḥ putreṣu mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:3547: 05,050.042a mahendra iva vajreṇa dānavān devasattamaḥ 05,050.042c bhīmaseno gadāpāṇiḥ sūdayiṣyati me sutān 05,050.043a aviṣahyam anāvāryaṃ tīvravegaparākramam
GE07mbh_05_u:3550: 05,050.044c bāhubhyāṃ yudhyamānasya kas tiṣṭhed agrataḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:3551: 05,050.045a bhīṣmo droṇaś ca vipro 'yaṃ kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:3552: 05,050.045c jānanty ete yathaivāhaṃ vīryajñas tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3553: 05,050.046a āryavrataṃ tu jānantaḥ saṃgarān na bibhitsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3555: 05,050.047a balīyaḥ sarvato diṣṭaṃ puruṣasya viśeṣataḥ 05,050.047c paśyann api jayaṃ teṣāṃ na niyacchāmi yat sutān 05,050.048a te purāṇaṃ maheṣvāsā mārgam aindraṃ samāsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3556: 05,050.048c tyakṣyanti tumule prāṇān rakṣantaḥ pārthivaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3557: 05,050.049a yathaiṣāṃ māmakās tāta tathaiṣāṃ pāṇḍavā api
GE07mbh_05_u:3558: 05,050.049c pautrā bhīṣmasya śiṣyāś ca droṇasya ca kṛpasya ca 05,050.050a yat tv asmad āśrayaṃ kiṃ cid dattam iṣṭaṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:3559: 05,050.050c tasyāpacitim āryatvāt kartāraḥ sthavirās trayaḥ 05,050.051a ādadānasya śastraṃ hi kṣatradharmaṃ parīpsataḥ 05,050.051c nidhanaṃ brāhmaṇasyājau varam evāhur uttamam 05,050.052a sa vai śocāmi sarvān vai ye yuyutsanti pāṇḍavān 05,050.052c vikruṣṭaṃ vidureṇādau tad etad bhayam āgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:3560: 05,050.053a na tu manye vighātāya jñānaṃ duḥkhasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:3561: 05,050.053c bhavaty atibale hy etaj jñānam apy upaghātakam
GE07mbh_05_u:3562: 05,050.054a ṛṣayo hy api nirmuktāḥ paśyanto lokasaṃgrahān
GE07mbh_05_u:3563: 05,050.054c sukhe bhavanti sukhinas tathā duḥkhena duḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3564: 05,050.055a kiṃ punar yo 'ham āsaktas tatra tatra sahasradhā
GE07mbh_05_u:3565: 05,050.055c putreṣu rājyadāreṣu pautreṣv api ca bandhuṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:3566: 05,050.056a saṃśaye tu mahaty asmin kiṃ nu me kṣamam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:3567: 05,050.056c vināśaṃ hy eva paśyāmi kurūṇām anucintayan
GE07mbh_05_u:3568: 05,050.057a dyūtapramukham ābhāti kurūṇāṃ vyasanaṃ mahat 05,050.057c mandenaiśvaryakāmena lobhāt pāpam idaṃ kṛtam 05,050.058a manye paryāyadharmo 'yaṃ kālasyātyantagāminaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3569: 05,050.058c cakre pradhir ivāsakto nāsya śakyaṃ palāyitum
GE07mbh_05_u:3570: 05,050.059a kiṃ nu kāryaṃ kathaṃ kuryāṃ kva nu gacchāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:3571: 05,050.059c ete naśyanti kuravo mandāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3572: 05,050.060a avaśo 'haṃ purā tāta putrāṇāṃ nihate śate 05,050.060c śroṣyāmi ninadaṃ strīṇāṃ kathaṃ māṃ maraṇaṃ spṛśet
GE07mbh_05_u:3573: 05,050.061a yathā nidāghe jvalanaḥ samiddho; dahet kakṣaṃ vāyunā
GE07mbh_05_u:3575: 05,050.061c gadāhastaḥ pāṇḍavas tadvad eva; hantā madīyān sahito 'rjunena
GE07mbh_05_u:3576: 05,051.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,051.001a yasya vai nānṛtā vācaḥ pravṛttā anuśuśrumaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3577: 05,051.001c trailokyam api tasya syād yoddhā yasya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3578: 05,051.002a tasyaiva ca na paśyāmi yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3579: 05,051.002c aniśaṃ cintayāno 'pi yaḥ pratīyād rathena tam
GE07mbh_05_u:3581: 05,051.003c pratyetā na samaḥ kaś cid yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3582: 05,051.004a droṇakarṇau pratīyātāṃ yadi vīrau nararṣabhau 05,051.004b*0332_01 kṛtāstrau balināṃ śreṣṭhau samareṣv aparājitau 05,051.004c māhātmyāt saṃśayo loke na tv asti vijayo mama 05,051.005a ghṛṇī karṇaḥ pramādī ca ācāryaḥ sthaviro guruḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3583: 05,051.005c samartho balavān pārtho dṛḍhadhanvā jitaklamaḥ 05,051.005e bhavet sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ sarvaśo 'py aparājayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3584: 05,051.006a sarve hy astravidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve prāptā mahad yaśaḥ 05,051.006c api sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ tyajeyur na punar jayam
GE07mbh_05_u:3585: 05,051.006e vadhe nūnaṃ bhavec chāntis tayor vā phalgunasya vā 05,051.007a na tu jetārjunasyāsti hantā cāsya na vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:3586: 05,051.007c manyus tasya kathaṃ śāmyen mandān prati ya utthitaḥ 05,051.008a anye 'py astrāṇi jānanti jīyante ca jayanti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:3587: 05,051.008c ekāntavijayas tv eva śrūyate phalgunasya ha
GE07mbh_05_u:3589: 05,051.009c jigāya ca surān sarvān nāsya vedmi parājayam
GE07mbh_05_u:3590: 05,051.010a yasya yantā hṛṣīkeśaḥ śīlavṛttasamo yudhi 05,051.010c dhruvas tasya jayas tāta yathendrasya jayas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:3591: 05,051.011a kṛṣṇāv ekarathe yattāv adhijyaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3592: 05,051.011c yugapat trīṇi tejāṃsi sametāny anuśuśrumaḥ 05,051.012a naiva no 'sti dhanus tādṛṅ na yoddhā na ca sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3593: 05,051.012c tac ca mandā na jānanti duryodhanavaśānugāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3594: 05,051.013a śeṣayed aśanir dīpto nipatan mūrdhni saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:3595: 05,051.013c na tu śeṣaṃ śarāḥ kuryur astās tāta kirīṭinā 05,051.014a api cāsyann ivābhāti nighnann iva ca phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3596: 05,051.014c uddharann iva kāyebhyaḥ śirāṃsi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ 05,051.015a api bāṇamayaṃ tejaḥ pradīptam iva sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3597: 05,051.015c gāṇḍīveddhaṃ dahetājau putrāṇāṃ mama vāhinīm 05,051.016a api sā rathaghoṣeṇa bhayārtā savyasācinaḥ 05,051.016c vitrastā bahulā senā bhāratī pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_05_u:3598: 05,051.017a yathā kakṣaṃ dahaty agniḥ pravṛddhaḥ sarvataś caran
GE07mbh_05_u:3599: 05,051.017c mahārcir aniloddhūtas tadvad dhakṣyati māmakān 05,051.018a yadodvaman niśitān bāṇasaṃghān; sthātātatāyī samare kirīṭī
GE07mbh_05_u:3600: 05,051.018c sṛṣṭo 'ntakaḥ sarvaharo vidhātrā; yathā bhavet tadvad
GE07mbh_05_u:3602: 05,051.019a yadā hy abhīkṣṇaṃ subahūn prakārāñ; śrotāsmi tān āvasathe
GE07mbh_05_u:3604: 05,051.019c teṣāṃ samantāc ca tathā raṇāgre; kṣayaḥ kilāyaṃ bharatān
GE07mbh_05_u:3606: 05,052.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,052.001a yathaiva pāṇḍavāḥ sarve parākrāntā jigīṣavaḥ 05,052.001c tathaivābhisarās teṣāṃ tyaktātmāno jaye dhṛtāḥ 05,052.002a tvam eva hi parākrāntān ācakṣīthāḥ parān mama
GE07mbh_05_u:3607: 05,052.002c pāñcālān kekayān matsyān māgadhān vatsabhūmipān 05,052.003a yaś ca sendrān imāṃl lokān icchan kuryād vaśe balī
GE07mbh_05_u:3608: 05,052.003c sa śreṣṭho jagataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ jaye dhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3609: 05,052.004a samastām arjunād vidyāṃ sātyakiḥ kṣipram āptavān
GE07mbh_05_u:3610: 05,052.004c śaineyaḥ samare sthātā bījavat pravapañ śarān
GE07mbh_05_u:3611: 05,052.005a dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pāñcālyaḥ krūrakarmā mahārathaḥ 05,052.005c māmakeṣu raṇaṃ kartā baleṣu paramāstravit 05,052.006a yudhiṣṭhirasya ca krodhād arjunasya ca vikramāt
GE07mbh_05_u:3612: 05,052.006c yamābhyāṃ bhīmasenāc ca bhayaṃ me tāta jāyate
GE07mbh_05_u:3613: 05,052.007a amānuṣaṃ manuṣyendrair jālaṃ vitatam antarā 05,052.007c mama senāṃ haniṣyanti tataḥ krośāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:3614: 05,052.008a darśanīyo manasvī ca lakṣmīvān brahmavarcasī 05,052.008c medhāvī sukṛtaprajño dharmātmā pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3616: 05,052.009c bhrātṛbhiḥ śvaśuraiḥ putrair upapanno mahārathaiḥ 05,052.010a dhṛtyā ca puruṣavyāghro naibhṛtyena ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3617: 05,052.010c anṛśaṃso vadānyaś ca hrīmān satyaparākramaḥ 05,052.011a bahuśrutaḥ kṛtātmā ca vṛddhasevī jitendriyaḥ 05,052.011c taṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpannaṃ samiddham iva pāvakam 05,052.012a tapantam iva ko mandaḥ patiṣyati pataṃgavat
GE07mbh_05_u:3619: 05,052.013a tanur uccaḥ śikhī rājā śuddhajāmbūnadaprabhaḥ 05,052.013c mandānāṃ mama putrāṇāṃ yuddhenāntaṃ kariṣyati 05,052.014a tair ayuddhaṃ sādhu manye kuravas tan nibodhata
GE07mbh_05_u:3620: 05,052.014c yuddhe vināśaḥ kṛtsnasya kulasya bhavitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:3621: 05,052.015a eṣā me paramā śāntir yayā śāmyati me manaḥ 05,052.015c yadi tv ayuddham iṣṭaṃ vo vayaṃ śāntyai yatāmahe 05,052.016a na tu naḥ śikṣamāṇānām upekṣeta yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3622: 05,052.016c jugupsati hy adharmeṇa mām evoddiśya kāraṇam

GE07mbh_05_u:3770: 05,055.008c mahādhanāni divyāni mahānti ca laghūni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:3773: 05,055.009a sarvā diśo yojanamātram antaraṃ; sa tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca rurodha vai dhvajaḥ 05,055.009c na saṃsajjet tarubhiḥ saṃvṛto 'pi; tathā hi māyā vihitā bhauvanena 05,055.010a yathākāśe śakradhanuḥ prakāśate; na caikavarṇaṃ na ca vidma kiṃ nu tat
GE07mbh_05_u:3774: 05,055.010c tathā dhvajo vihito bhauvanena; bahvākāraṃ dṛśyate rūpam asya
GE07mbh_05_u:3775: 05,055.011a yathāgnidhūmo divam eti ruddhvā; varṇān bibhrat taijasaṃ tac charīram 05,055.011c tathā dhvajo vihito bhauvanena; na ced bhāro bhavitā nota rodhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3776: 05,055.012a śvetās tasmin vātavegāḥ sadaśvā; divyā yuktāś citrarathena
GE07mbh_05_u:3778: 05,055.012b*0342_01 bhuvy antarikṣe divi vā narendra 05,055.012b*0342_02 eṣāṃ gatir hīyate nātra sarvā 05,055.012c śataṃ yat tat pūryate nityakālaṃ; hataṃ hataṃ dattavaraṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3780: 05,055.013a tathā rājño dantavarṇā bṛhanto; rathe yuktā bhānti
GE07mbh_05_u:3782: 05,055.013c ṛśyaprakhyā bhīmasenasya vāhā; raṇe vāyos tulyavegā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3785: 05,055.014c bhrātur vīrasya svais turaṃgair viśiṣṭā; mudā yuktāḥ sahadevaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3787: 05,055.015a mādrīputraṃ nakulaṃ tv ājamīḍhaṃ; mahendradattā harayo vājimukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3788: 05,055.015c samā vāyor balavantas tarasvino; vahanti vīraṃ vṛtraśatruṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3790: 05,055.016a tulyāś caibhir vayasā vikrameṇa; javena caivāpratirūpāḥ sadaśvāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3791: 05,055.016c saubhadrādīn draupadeyān kumārān; vahanty aśvā devadattā
GE07mbh_05_u:3793: 05,056.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,056.001a kāṃs tatra saṃjayāpaśyaḥ pratyarthena samāgatān 05,056.001c ye yotsyante pāṇḍavārthe putrasya mama vāhinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:3794: 05,056.002 saṃjaya uvāca 05,056.002a mukhyam andhakavṛṣṇīnām apaśyaṃ kṛṣṇam āgatam 05,056.002c cekitānaṃ ca tatraiva yuyudhānaṃ ca sātyakim
GE07mbh_05_u:3795: 05,056.003a pṛthag akṣauhiṇībhyāṃ tau pāṇḍavān abhisaṃśritau 05,056.003c mahārathau samākhyātāv ubhau puruṣamāninau
GE07mbh_05_u:3796: 05,056.004a akṣauhiṇyātha pāñcālyo daśabhis tanayair vṛtaḥ 05,056.004c satyajitpramukhair vīrair dhṛṣṭadyumnapurogamaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3798: 05,056.005c upāyāt sarvasainyānāṃ praticchādya tadā vapuḥ 05,056.006a virāṭaḥ saha putrābhyāṃ śaṅkhenaivottareṇa ca 05,056.006c sūryadattādibhir vīrair madirāśvapurogamaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3799: 05,056.007a sahitaḥ pṛthivīpālo bhrātṛbhis tanayais tathā 05,056.007c akṣauhiṇyaiva sainyasya vṛtaḥ pārthaṃ samāśritaḥ 05,056.008a jārāsaṃdhir māgadhaś ca dhṛṣṭaketuś ca cedirāṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:3800: 05,056.008c pṛthak pṛthag anuprāptau pṛthag akṣauhiṇīvṛtau 05,056.009a kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca sarve lohitakadhvajāḥ 05,056.009c akṣauhiṇīparivṛtāḥ pāṇḍavān abhisaṃśritāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3801: 05,056.010a etān etāvatas tatra yān apaśyaṃ samāgatān
GE07mbh_05_u:3802: 05,056.010c ye pāṇḍavārthe yotsyanti dhārtarāṣṭrasya vāhinīm 05,056.011a yo veda mānuṣaṃ vyūhaṃ daivaṃ gāndharvam āsuram
GE07mbh_05_u:3803: 05,056.011c sa tasya senāpramukhe dhṛṣṭadyumno mahāmanāḥ 05,056.012a bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo rājan bhāgaḥ kḷptaḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3804: 05,056.012c taṃ virāṭo 'nu saṃyātā saha matsyaiḥ prahāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3805: 05,056.013a jyeṣṭhasya pāṇḍuputrasya bhāgo madrādhipo balī 05,056.013c tau tu tatrābruvan ke cid viṣamau no matāv iti
GE07mbh_05_u:3806: 05,056.014a duryodhanaḥ sahasutaḥ sārdhaṃ bhrātṛśatena ca 05,056.014c prācyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhīmasenasya bhāgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3807: 05,056.015a arjunasya tu bhāgena karṇo vaikartano mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3808: 05,056.015c aśvatthāmā vikarṇaś ca saindhavaś ca jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3809: 05,056.016a aśakyāś caiva ye ke cit pṛthivyāṃ śūramāninaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3810: 05,056.016c sarvāṃs tān arjunaḥ pārthaḥ kalpayām āsa bhāgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3811: 05,056.017a maheṣvāsā rājaputrā bhrātaraḥ pañca kekayāḥ 05,056.017c kekayān eva bhāgena kṛtvā yotsyanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:3812: 05,056.018a teṣām eva kṛto bhāgo mālavāḥ śālvakekayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3813: 05,056.018c trigartānāṃ ca dvau mukhyau yau tau saṃśaptakāv iti 05,056.019a duryodhanasutāḥ sarve tathā duḥśāsanasya ca 05,056.019c saubhadreṇa kṛto bhāgo rājā caiva bṛhadbalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3816: 05,056.021a cekitānaḥ somadattaṃ dvairathe yoddhum icchati 05,056.021c bhojaṃ tu kṛtavarmāṇaṃ yuyudhāno yuyutsati 05,056.022a sahadevas tu mādreyaḥ śūraḥ saṃkrandano yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:3817: 05,056.022c svam aṃśaṃ kalpayām āsa śyālaṃ te subalātmajam
GE07mbh_05_u:3818: 05,056.023a ulūkaṃ cāpi kaitavyaṃ ye ca sārasvatā gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3819: 05,056.023c nakulaḥ kalpayām āsa bhāgaṃ mādravatīsutaḥ 05,056.024a ye cānye pārthivā rājan pratyudyāsyanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:3820: 05,056.024c samāhvānena tāṃś cāpi pāṇḍuputrā akalpayan 05,056.025a evam eṣām anīkāni pravibhaktāni bhāgaśaḥ 05,056.025c yat te kāryaṃ saputrasya kriyatāṃ tad akālikam
GE07mbh_05_u:3821: 05,056.026 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,056.026a na santi sarve putrā me mūḍhā durdyūtadevinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3822: 05,056.026c yeṣāṃ yuddhaṃ balavatā bhīmena raṇamūrdhani 05,056.027a rājānaḥ pārthivāḥ sarve prokṣitāḥ kāladharmaṇā 05,056.027c gāṇḍīvāgniṃ pravekṣyanti pataṅgā iva pāvakam 05,056.028a vidrutāṃ vāhinīṃ manye kṛtavairair mahātmabhiḥ 05,056.028c tāṃ raṇe ke 'nuyāsyanti prabhagnāṃ pāṇḍavair yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:3823: 05,056.029a sarve hy atirathāḥ śūrāḥ kīrtimantaḥ pratāpinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3825: 05,056.030a yeṣāṃ yudhiṣṭhiro netā goptā ca madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3826: 05,056.030c yodhau ca pāṇḍavau vīrau savyasācivṛkodarau 05,056.031a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3827: 05,056.031c sātyakir drupadaś caiva dhṛṣṭadyumnasya cātmajaḥ 05,056.032a uttamaujāś ca pāñcālyo yudhāmanyuś ca durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3828: 05,056.032c śikhaṇḍī kṣatradevaś ca tathā vairāṭir uttaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3829: 05,056.032d*0343_01 tataḥ śvetas tu vairāṭiḥ ketumān vāhinīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3830: 05,056.033a kāśayaś cedayaś caiva matsyāḥ sarve ca sṛñjayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3831: 05,056.033c virāṭaputro babhrūś ca pāñcālāś ca prabhadrakāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3832: 05,056.034a yeṣām indro 'py akāmānāṃ na haret pṛthivīm imām 05,056.034c vīrāṇāṃ raṇadhīrāṇāṃ ye bhindyuḥ parvatān api
GE07mbh_05_u:3834: 05,056.035c krośato mama duṣputro yoddhum icchati saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:3835: 05,056.036 duryodhana uvāca 05,056.036a ubhau sva ekajātīyau tathobhau bhūmigocarau 05,056.036c atha kasmāt pāṇḍavānām ekato manyase jayam
GE07mbh_05_u:3836: 05,056.037a pitāmahaṃ ca droṇaṃ ca kṛpaṃ karṇaṃ ca durjayam 05,056.037c jayadrathaṃ somadattam aśvatthāmānam eva ca 05,056.038a sucetaso maheṣvāsān indro 'pi sahito 'maraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3837: 05,056.038c aśaktaḥ samare jetuṃ kiṃ punas tāta pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3838: 05,056.039a sarvā ca pṛthivī sṛṣṭā madarthe tāta pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:3839: 05,056.039c āryān dhṛtimataḥ śūrān agnikalpān prabādhitum 05,056.040a na māmakān pāṇḍavās te samarthāḥ prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:3840: 05,056.040c parākrānto hy ahaṃ pāṇḍūn saputrān yoddhum āhave
GE07mbh_05_u:3841: 05,056.041a matpriyaṃ pārthivāḥ sarve ye cikīrṣanti bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:3842: 05,056.041c te tān āvārayiṣyanti aiṇeyān iva tantunā
GE07mbh_05_u:3843: 05,056.042a mahatā rathavaṃśena śarajālaiś ca māmakaiḥ 05,056.042c abhidrutā bhaviṣyanti pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha 05,056.043 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,056.043a unmatta iva me putro vilapaty eṣa saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:3844: 05,056.043c na hi śakto yudhā jetuṃ dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_05_u:3845: 05,056.044a jānāti hi sadā bhīṣmaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ yaśasvinām
GE07mbh_05_u:3847: 05,056.045a yato nārocayam ahaṃ vigrahaṃ tair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3848: 05,056.045c kiṃ tu saṃjaya me brūhi punas teṣāṃ viceṣṭitam 05,056.046a kas tāṃs tarasvino bhūyaḥ saṃdīpayati pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:3849: 05,056.046c arciṣmato maheṣvāsān haviṣā pāvakān iva 05,056.047 saṃjaya uvāca 05,056.047a dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ sadaivaitān saṃdīpayati bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:3850: 05,056.047c yudhyadhvam iti mā bhaiṣṭa yuddhād bharatasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3851: 05,056.048a ye ke cit pārthivās tatra dhārtarāṣṭreṇa saṃvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3853: 05,056.049a tān sarvān āhave kruddhān sānubandhān samāgatān
GE07mbh_05_u:3854: 05,056.049c aham ekaḥ samādāsye timir matsyān ivaudakān
GE07mbh_05_u:3855: 05,056.050a bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ karṇaṃ drauṇiṃ śalyaṃ suyodhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:3856: 05,056.050c etāṃś cāpi nirotsyāmi veleva makarālayam 05,056.051a tathā bruvāṇaṃ dharmātmā prāha rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3857: 05,056.051c tava dhairyaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha 05,056.051e sarve samadhirūḍhāḥ sma saṃgrāmān naḥ samuddhara
GE07mbh_05_u:3858: 05,056.052a jānāmi tvāṃ mahābāho kṣatradharme vyavasthitam 05,056.052c samartham ekaṃ paryāptaṃ kauravāṇāṃ yuyutsatām 05,056.052e bhavatā yad vidhātavyaṃ tan naḥ śreyaḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:3859: 05,056.052e*0344_01 **** **** kauravāṇāṃ vinigrahe 05,056.052e*0344_02 purastād upayātānāṃ 05,056.053a saṃgrāmād apayātānāṃ bhagnānāṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:3860: 05,056.053c pauruṣaṃ darśayañ śūro yas tiṣṭhed agrataḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:3861: 05,056.053e krīṇīyāt taṃ sahasreṇa nītiman nāma tat padam
GE07mbh_05_u:3862: 05,056.054a sa tvaṃ śūraś ca vīraś ca vikrāntaś ca nararṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:3863: 05,056.054c bhayārtānāṃ paritrātā saṃyugeṣu na saṃśayaḥ 05,056.055a evaṃ bruvati kaunteye dharmātmani yudhiṣṭhire 05,056.055c dhṛṣṭadyumna uvācedaṃ māṃ vaco gatasādhvasaḥ 05,056.056a sarvāñ janapadān sūta yodhā duryodhanasya ye
GE07mbh_05_u:3864: 05,056.056c sabāhlīkān kurūn brūyāḥ prātipeyāñ śaradvataḥ 05,056.057a sūtaputraṃ tathā droṇaṃ sahaputraṃ jayadratham 05,056.057c duḥśāsanaṃ vikarṇaṃ ca tathā duryodhanaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:3865: 05,056.058a bhīṣmaṃ caiva brūhi gatvā tvam āśu; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ sādhunaivābhyupeta 05,056.058c mā vo vadhīd arjuno devaguptaḥ; kṣipraṃ yācadhvaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:3868: 05,056.059a naitādṛśo hi yodho 'sti pṛthivyām iha kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:3870: 05,056.060a devair hi saṃbhṛto divyo ratho gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3871: 05,056.060c na sa jeyo manuṣyeṇa mā sma kṛdhvaṃ mano yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:3872: 05,057.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,057.001a kṣatratejā brahmacārī kaumārād api pāṇḍavaḥ 05,057.001c tena saṃyugam eṣyanti mandā vilapato mama
GE07mbh_05_u:3874: 05,057.002c na hi yuddhaṃ praśaṃsanti sarvāvastham ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:3875: 05,057.003a alam ardhaṃ pṛthivyās te sahāmātyasya jīvitum
GE07mbh_05_u:3877: 05,057.004a etad dhi kuravaḥ sarve manyante dharmasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:3878: 05,057.004c yat tvaṃ praśāntim icchethāḥ pāṇḍuputrair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3879: 05,057.005a aṅgemāṃ samavekṣasva putra svām eva vāhinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:3880: 05,057.005c jāta eva tava srāvas tvaṃ tu mohān na budhyase
GE07mbh_05_u:3881: 05,057.006a na hy ahaṃ yuddham icchāmi naitad icchati bāhlikaḥ 05,057.006c na ca bhīṣmo na ca droṇo nāśvatthāmā na saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3882: 05,057.007a na somadatto na śalyo na kṛpo yuddham icchati 05,057.007c satyavrataḥ purumitro jayo bhūriśravās tathā 05,057.008a yeṣu saṃpratitiṣṭheyuḥ kuravaḥ pīḍitāḥ paraiḥ 05,057.008c te yuddhaṃ nābhinandanti tat tubhyaṃ tāta rocatām
GE07mbh_05_u:3883: 05,057.009a na tvaṃ karoṣi kāmena karṇaḥ kārayitā tava
GE07mbh_05_u:3884: 05,057.009c duḥśāsanaś ca pāpātmā śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3885: 05,057.010 duryodhana uvāca 05,057.010a nāhaṃ bhavati na droṇe nāśvatthāmni na saṃjaye
GE07mbh_05_u:3886: 05,057.010c na vikarṇe na kāmboje na kṛpe na ca bāhlike
GE07mbh_05_u:3887: 05,057.011a satyavrate purumitre bhūriśravasi vā punaḥ 05,057.011c anyeṣu vā tāvakeṣu bhāraṃ kṛtvā samāhvaye
GE07mbh_05_u:3888: 05,057.012a ahaṃ ca tāta karṇaś ca raṇayajñaṃ vitatya vai 05,057.012c yudhiṣṭhiraṃ paśuṃ kṛtvā dīkṣitau bharatarṣabha 05,057.013a ratho vedī sruvaḥ khaḍgo gadā sruk kavacaṃ sadaḥ 05,057.013c cāturhotraṃ ca dhuryā me śarā darbhā havir yaśaḥ 05,057.014a ātmayajñena nṛpate iṣṭvā vaivasvataṃ raṇe 05,057.014c vijitya svayam eṣyāvo hatāmitrau śriyā vṛtau
GE07mbh_05_u:3889: 05,057.015a ahaṃ ca tāta karṇaś ca bhrātā duḥśāsanaś ca me
GE07mbh_05_u:3890: 05,057.015c ete vayaṃ haniṣyāmaḥ pāṇḍavān samare trayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3891: 05,057.016a ahaṃ hi pāṇḍavān hatvā praśāstā pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:3892: 05,057.016c māṃ vā hatvā pāṇḍuputrā bhoktāraḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:3893: 05,057.017a tyaktaṃ me jīvitaṃ rājan dhanaṃ rājyaṃ ca pārthiva 05,057.017c na jātu pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ vaseyam aham acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:3894: 05,057.018a yāvad dhi sūcyās tīkṣṇāyā vidhyed agreṇa māriṣa
GE07mbh_05_u:3895: 05,057.018c tāvad apy aparityājyaṃ bhūmer naḥ pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:3896: 05,057.019 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,057.019a sarvān vas tāta śocāmi tyakto duryodhano mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:3897: 05,057.019c ye mandam anuyāsyadhvaṃ yāntaṃ vaivasvatakṣayam 05,057.020a rurūṇām iva yūtheṣu vyāghrāḥ praharatāṃ varāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3898: 05,057.020c varān varān haniṣyanti sametā yudhi pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3899: 05,057.021a pratīpam iva me bhāti yuyudhānena bhāratī
GE07mbh_05_u:3900: 05,057.021c vyastā sīmantinī trastā pramṛṣṭā dīrghabāhunā 05,057.022a saṃpūrṇaṃ pūrayan bhūyo balaṃ pārthasya mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3901: 05,057.022c śaineyaḥ samare sthātā bījavat pravapañ śarān
GE07mbh_05_u:3903: 05,057.023c taṃ sarve saṃśrayiṣyanti prākāram akutobhayam 05,057.024a yadā drakṣyasi bhīmena kuñjarān vinipātitān 05,057.024c viśīrṇadantān giryābhān bhinnakumbhān saśoṇitān
GE07mbh_05_u:3904: 05,057.025a tān abhiprekṣya saṃgrāme viśīrṇān iva parvatān
GE07mbh_05_u:3905: 05,057.025c bhīto bhīmasya saṃsparśāt smartāsi vacanasya me
GE07mbh_05_u:3907: 05,057.026c gatim agner iva prekṣya smartāsi vacanasya me
GE07mbh_05_u:3908: 05,057.027a mahad vo bhayam āgāmi na cec chāmyatha pāṇḍavaiḥ 05,057.027c gadayā bhīmasenena hatāḥ śamam upaiṣyatha 05,057.028a mahāvanam iva chinnaṃ yadā drakṣyasi pātitam
GE07mbh_05_u:3909: 05,057.028c balaṃ kurūṇāṃ saṃgrāme tadā smartāsi me vacaḥ
