GE07mbh_05_u:3911: 05,057.029c anubhāṣya mahārāja punaḥ papraccha saṃjayam 05,058.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,058.001a yad abrūtāṃ mahātmānau vāsudevadhanaṃjayau
GE07mbh_05_u:3912: 05,058.001c tan me brūhi mahāprājña śuśrūṣe vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:3913: 05,058.002 saṃjaya uvāca 05,058.002a śṛṇu rājan yathā dṛṣṭau mayā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
GE07mbh_05_u:3914: 05,058.002c ūcatuś cāpi yad vīrau tat te vakṣyāmi bhārata 05,058.003a pādāṅgulīr abhiprekṣan prayato 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3915: 05,058.003c śuddhāntaṃ prāviśaṃ rājann ākhyātuṃ naradevayoḥ 05,058.004a naivābhimanyur na yamau taṃ deśam abhiyānti vai
GE07mbh_05_u:3916: 05,058.004c yatra kṛṣṇau ca kṛṣṇā ca satyabhāmā ca bhāminī 05,058.005a ubhau madhvāsavakṣībāv ubhau candanarūṣitau
GE07mbh_05_u:3919: 05,058.006a naikaratnavicitraṃ tu kāñcanaṃ mahad āsanam 05,058.006c vividhāstaraṇāstīrṇaṃ yatrāsātām ariṃdamau
GE07mbh_05_u:3920: 05,058.006d*0347_01 satyāṅkam upadhānaṃ tu kṛtvā śete janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3922: 05,058.007c arjunasya ca kṛṣṇāyāṃ satyāyāṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3923: 05,058.008a kāñcanaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ tu pārtho me prādiśat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:3924: 05,058.008c tad ahaṃ pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā tato bhūmāv upāviśam
GE07mbh_05_u:3926: 05,058.009c pādapīṭhād apahṛtau tatrāpaśyam ahaṃ śubhau 05,058.009d*0348_01 na nūnaṃ kalmaṣaṃ kiṃ cin mama karmasu vidyate 05,058.009d*0348_02 strīratnābhyāṃ sametau yan mitho mām abhyabhāṣatām
GE07mbh_05_u:3927: 05,058.009d*0348_03 vismayo me mahān āsīd āstraṃ me bahu saṃgatam 05,058.009d*0348_04 hṛṣṭāni caiva romāṇi dṛṣṭvā tau sahitāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:3928: 05,058.010a śyāmau bṛhantau taruṇau śālaskandhāv ivodgatau 05,058.010c ekāsanagatau dṛṣṭvā bhayaṃ māṃ mahad āviśat
GE07mbh_05_u:3931: 05,058.011c saṃśrayād droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ karṇasya ca vikatthanāt 05,058.012a nideśasthāv imau yasya mānasas tasya setsyate
GE07mbh_05_u:3932: 05,058.012c saṃkalpo dharmarājasya niścayo me tadābhavat 05,058.013a satkṛtaś cānnapānābhyām ācchanno labdhasatkriyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3933: 05,058.013c añjaliṃ mūrdhni saṃdhāya tau saṃdeśam acodayam
GE07mbh_05_u:3934: 05,058.014a dhanurbāṇocitenaikapāṇinā śubhalakṣaṇam 05,058.014c pādam ānamayan pārthaḥ keśavaṃ samacodayat 05,058.015a indraketur ivotthāya sarvābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3936: 05,058.016a vācaṃ sa vadatāṃ śreṣṭho hlādinīṃ vacanakṣamām
GE07mbh_05_u:3939: 05,058.016d*0350_02 matimān matim āsthāya keśavaḥ saṃdadhe vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3941: 05,058.017c aśrauṣam aham iṣṭārthāṃ paścād dhṛdayaśoṣiṇīm 05,058.018 vāsudeva uvāca 05,058.018a saṃjayedaṃ vaco brūyā dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ manīṣiṇam 05,058.018c śṛṇvataḥ kurumukhyasya droṇasyāpi ca śṛṇvataḥ 05,058.018d*0351_01 āvayor vacanāt sūta jyeṣṭhān apy abhivādayan
GE07mbh_05_u:3942: 05,058.018d*0351_02 yavīyasaś ca kuśalaṃ paścāt pṛṣṭvaivam uttaram
GE07mbh_05_u:3943: 05,058.019a yajadhvaṃ vipulair yajñair viprebhyo datta dakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3944: 05,058.019c putrair dāraiś ca modadhvaṃ mahad vo bhayam āgatam 05,058.020a arthāṃs tyajata pātrebhyaḥ sutān prāpnuta kāmajān
GE07mbh_05_u:3945: 05,058.020c priyaṃ priyebhyaś carata rājā hi tvarate jaye
GE07mbh_05_u:3946: 05,058.021a ṛṇam etat pravṛddhaṃ me hṛdayān nāpasarpati
GE07mbh_05_u:3947: 05,058.021c yad govindeti cukrośa kṛṣṇā māṃ dūravāsinam
GE07mbh_05_u:3948: 05,058.022a tejomayaṃ durādharṣaṃ gāṇḍīvaṃ yasya kārmukam 05,058.022c maddvitīyena teneha vairaṃ vaḥ savyasācinā 05,058.022d*0352_01 kṛṣṇasya tad vacaḥ śrutvā bhayaṃ māṃ mahad āviśat 05,058.022d*0352_02 tava putrasya lobhaṃ tu vartamānaṃ pramṛśyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3949: 05,058.023a maddvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārthaṃ kaḥ prārthayitum icchati
GE07mbh_05_u:3950: 05,058.023c yo na kālaparīto vāpy api sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3951: 05,058.024a bāhubhyām udvahed bhūmiṃ dahet kruddha imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3952: 05,058.024c pātayet tridivād devān yo 'rjunaṃ samare jayet 05,058.025a devāsuramanuṣyeṣu yakṣagandharvabhogiṣu 05,058.025c na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ yuddhe pāṇḍavaṃ yo 'bhyayād raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:3953: 05,058.026a yat tad virāṭanagare śrūyate mahad adbhutam
GE07mbh_05_u:3954: 05,058.026c ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:3956: 05,058.027c bhagnāḥ palāyanta diśaḥ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:3957: 05,058.028a balaṃ vīryaṃ ca tejaś ca śīghratā laghuhastatā
GE07mbh_05_u:3958: 05,058.028c aviṣādaś ca dhairyaṃ ca pārthān nānyatra vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:3959: 05,058.029 saṃjaya uvāca 05,058.029a ity abravīd dhṛṣīkeśaḥ pārtham uddharṣayan girā
GE07mbh_05_u:3961: 05,058.030a keśavasya vacaḥ śrutvā kirīṭī śvetavāhanaḥ 05,058.030c arjunas tan mahad vākyam abravīl lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:3962: 05,059.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,059.001a saṃjayasya vacaḥ śrutvā prajñācakṣur nareśvaraḥ 05,059.001c tataḥ saṃkhyātum ārebhe tad vaco guṇadoṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3963: 05,059.002a prasaṃkhyāya ca saukṣmyeṇa guṇadoṣān vicakṣaṇaḥ 05,059.002c yathāvan matitattvena jayakāmaḥ sutān prati 05,059.003a balābale viniścitya yāthātathyena buddhimān
GE07mbh_05_u:3964: 05,059.003b*0353_01 yadā tu mene bhūyiṣṭhaṃ tad vaco guṇadoṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3965: 05,059.003b*0353_02 punar eva kurūṇāṃ ca pāṇḍavānāṃ ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_05_u:3966: 05,059.003c śaktiṃ saṃkhyātum ārebhe tadā vai manujādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3967: 05,059.004a devamānuṣayoḥ śaktyā tejasā caiva pāṇḍavān 05,059.004c kurūñ śaktyālpatarayā duryodhanam athābravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:3968: 05,059.005a duryodhaneyaṃ cintā me śaśvan nāpy upaśāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:3970: 05,059.005b*0354_02 adharme cāyaśasye ca kārye mahati dāruṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:3971: 05,059.005b*0354_03 pāṇḍavair vigrahas tāta sarvathā taṃ na rocaye
GE07mbh_05_u:3972: 05,059.005c satyaṃ hy etad ahaṃ manye pratyakṣaṃ nānumānataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3973: 05,059.006a ātmajeṣu paraṃ snehaṃ sarvabhūtāni kurvate 05,059.006c priyāṇi caiṣāṃ kurvanti yathāśakti hitāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:3975: 05,059.007c icchanti bahulaṃ santaḥ pratikartuṃ mahat priyam
GE07mbh_05_u:3976: 05,059.008a agniḥ sācivyakartā syāt khāṇḍave tat kṛtaṃ smaran
GE07mbh_05_u:3981: 05,059.010c rirakṣiṣantaḥ saṃrambhaṃ gamiṣyantīti me matiḥ 05,059.011a te devasahitāḥ pārthā na śakyāḥ prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:3983: 05,059.012a durāsadaṃ yasya divyaṃ gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:3984: 05,059.012c vāruṇau cākṣayau divyau śarapūrṇau maheṣudhī 05,059.013a vānaraś ca dhvajo divyo niḥsaṅgo dhūmavad gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3985: 05,059.013c rathaś ca caturantāyāṃ yasya nāsti samas tviṣā
GE07mbh_05_u:3986: 05,059.014a mahāmeghanibhaś cāpi nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate janaiḥ 05,059.014c mahāśanisamaḥ śabdaḥ śātravāṇāṃ bhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3987: 05,059.015a yaṃ cātimānuṣaṃ vīrye kṛtsno loko vyavasyati
GE07mbh_05_u:3988: 05,059.015c devānām api jetāraṃ yaṃ viduḥ pārthivā raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:3989: 05,059.016a śatāni pañca caiveṣūn udvapann iva dṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:3990: 05,059.016c nimeṣāntaramātreṇa muñcan dūraṃ ca pātayan 05,059.017a yam āha bhīṣmo droṇaś ca kṛpo drauṇis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:3991: 05,059.017c madrarājas tathā śalyo madhyasthā ye ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3994: 05,059.019a kṣipaty ekena vegena pañca bāṇaśatāni yaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3998: 05,059.021a ity evaṃ cintayan kṛtsnam ahorātrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:3999: 05,059.021c anidro niḥsukhaś cāsmi kurūṇāṃ śamacintayā 05,059.022a kṣayodayo 'yaṃ sumahān kurūṇāṃ pratyupasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4000: 05,059.022c asya cet kalahasyāntaḥ śamād anyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4001: 05,059.023a śamo me rocate nityaṃ pārthais tāta na vigrahaḥ 05,059.023c kurubhyo hi sadā manye pāṇḍavāñ śaktimattarān
GE07mbh_05_u:4002: 05,060.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,060.001a pitur etad vacaḥ śrutvā dhārtarāṣṭro 'tyamarṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4003: 05,060.001c ādhāya vipulaṃ krodhaṃ punar evedam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:4004: 05,060.002a aśakyā devasacivāḥ pārthāḥ syur iti yad bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:4005: 05,060.002c manyate tadbhayaṃ vyetu bhavato rājasattama 05,060.003a akāmadveṣasaṃyogād drohāl lobhāc ca bhārata 05,060.003c upekṣayā ca bhāvānāṃ devā devatvam āpnuvan
GE07mbh_05_u:4006: 05,060.004a iti dvaipāyano vyāso nāradaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4007: 05,060.004c jāmadagnyaś ca rāmo naḥ kathām akathayat purā
GE07mbh_05_u:4008: 05,060.005a naiva mānuṣavad devāḥ pravartante kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:4009: 05,060.005c kāmāl lobhād anukrośād dveṣāc ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:4010: 05,060.006a yadi hy agniś ca vāyuś ca dharma indro 'śvināv api
GE07mbh_05_u:4011: 05,060.006c kāmayogāt pravarteran na pārthā duḥkham āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4012: 05,060.007a tasmān na bhavatā cintā kāryaiṣā syāt kadā cana 05,060.007c daiveṣv apekṣakā hy ete śaśvad bhāveṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4013: 05,060.008a atha cet kāmasaṃyogād dveṣāl lobhāc ca lakṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4014: 05,060.008c deveṣu devaprāmāṇyaṃ naiva tad vikramiṣyati 05,060.009a mayābhimantritaḥ śaśvaj jātavedāḥ praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_05_u:4015: 05,060.009c didhakṣuḥ sakalāṃl lokān parikṣipya samantataḥ 05,060.010a yad vā paramakaṃ tejo yena yuktā divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4016: 05,060.010c mamāpy anupamaṃ bhūyo devebhyo viddhi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4017: 05,060.011a pradīryamāṇāṃ vasudhāṃ girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca 05,060.011c lokasya paśyato rājan sthāpayāmy abhimantraṇāt 05,060.012a cetanācetanasyāsya jaṅgamasthāvarasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4019: 05,060.013a aśmavarṣaṃ ca vāyuṃ ca śamayāmīha nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4020: 05,060.013c jagataḥ paśyato 'bhīkṣṇaṃ bhūtānām anukampayā 05,060.014a stambhitāsv apsu gacchanti mayā rathapadātayaḥ 05,060.014c devāsurāṇāṃ bhāvānām aham ekaḥ pravartitā 05,060.015a akṣauhiṇībhir yān deśān yāmi kāryeṇa kena cit
GE07mbh_05_u:4021: 05,060.015c tatrāpo me pravartante yatra yatrābhikāmaye 05,060.016a bhayāni viṣaye rājan vyālādīni na santi me
GE07mbh_05_u:4022: 05,060.016c mattaḥ suptāni bhūtāni na hiṃsanti bhayaṃkarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4024: 05,060.017c dharmiṣṭhāś ca prajāḥ sarvā ītayaś ca na santi me
GE07mbh_05_u:4025: 05,060.018a aśvināv atha vāyvagnī marudbhiḥ saha vṛtrahā
GE07mbh_05_u:4027: 05,060.019a yadi hy ete samarthāḥ syur maddviṣas trātum ojasā 05,060.019c na sma trayodaśa samāḥ pārthā duḥkham avāpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4028: 05,060.020a naiva devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ 05,060.020c śaktās trātuṃ mayā dviṣṭaṃ satyam etad bravīmi te 05,060.021a yad abhidhyāmy ahaṃ śaśvac chubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham 05,060.021c naitad vipannapūrvaṃ me mitreṣv ariṣu cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4029: 05,060.022a bhaviṣyatīdam iti vā yad bravīmi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:4030: 05,060.022c nānyathā bhūtapūrvaṃ tat satyavāg iti māṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4031: 05,060.023a lokasākṣikam etan me māhātmyaṃ dikṣu viśrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:4032: 05,060.023c āśvāsanārthaṃ bhavataḥ proktaṃ na ślāghayā nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:4033: 05,060.024a na hy ahaṃ ślāghano rājan bhūtapūrvaḥ kadā cana 05,060.024c asad ācaritaṃ hy etad yad ātmānaṃ praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_05_u:4034: 05,060.025a pāṇḍavāṃś caiva matsyāṃś ca pāñcālān kekayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:4035: 05,060.025c sātyakiṃ vāsudevaṃ ca śrotāsi vijitān mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:4036: 05,060.026a saritaḥ sāgaraṃ prāpya yathā naśyanti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4037: 05,060.026c tathaiva te vinaṅkṣyanti mām āsādya sahānvayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4038: 05,060.027a parā buddhiḥ paraṃ tejo vīryaṃ ca paramaṃ mayi 05,060.027c parā vidyā paro yogo mama tebhyo viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4039: 05,060.028a pitāmahaś ca droṇaś ca kṛpaḥ śalyaḥ śalas tathā 05,060.028c astreṣu yat prajānanti sarvaṃ tan mayi vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4040: 05,060.029a ity uktvā saṃjayaṃ bhūyaḥ paryapṛcchata bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4041: 05,060.029c jñātvā yuyutsuḥ kāryāṇi prāptakālam ariṃdama 05,061.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,061.001a tathā tu pṛcchantam atīva pārthān; vaicitravīryaṃ tam acintayitvā
GE07mbh_05_u:4042: 05,061.001c uvāca karṇo dhṛtarāṣṭraputraṃ; praharṣayan saṃsadi kauravāṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:4043: 05,061.002a mithyā pratijñāya mayā yad astraṃ; rāmād dhṛtaṃ brahmapuraṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:4046: 05,061.003a mahāparādhe hy api saṃnatena; maharṣiṇāhaṃ guruṇā ca śaptaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4047: 05,061.003c śaktaḥ pradagdhuṃ hy api tigmatejāḥ; sasāgarām apy avaniṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:4049: 05,061.004a prasāditaṃ hy asya mayā mano 'bhūc; chuśrūṣayā svena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4051: 05,061.004c tatas tad astraṃ mama sāvaśeṣaṃ; tasmāt samartho 'smi mamaiṣa bhāraḥ 05,061.005a nimeṣamātraṃ tam ṛṣiprasādam; avāpya pāñcālakarūṣamatsyān 05,061.005c nihatya pārthāṃś ca saputrapautrāṃl; lokān ahaṃ śastrajitān
GE07mbh_05_u:4053: 05,061.006a pitāmahas tiṣṭhatu te samīpe; droṇaś ca sarve ca narendramukhyāḥ 05,061.006c yathāpradhānena balena yātvā; pārthān haniṣyāmi mamaiṣa bhāraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4054: 05,061.007a evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam uvāca bhīṣmaḥ; kiṃ katthase kālaparītabuddhe
GE07mbh_05_u:4055: 05,061.007c na karṇa jānāsi yathā pradhāne; hate hatāḥ syur
GE07mbh_05_u:4057: 05,061.008a yat khāṇḍavaṃ dāhayatā kṛtaṃ hi; kṛṣṇadvitīyena dhanaṃjayena 05,061.008c śrutvaiva tat karma niyantum ātmā; śakyas tvayā vai saha bāndhavena 05,061.009a yāṃ cāpi śaktiṃ tridaśādhipas te; dadau mahātmā bhagavān
GE07mbh_05_u:4059: 05,061.009c bhasmīkṛtāṃ tāṃ patitāṃ viśīrṇāṃ; cakrāhatāṃ drakṣyasi keśavena
GE07mbh_05_u:4060: 05,061.010a yas te śaraḥ sarpamukho vibhāti; sadāgryamālyair mahitaḥ prayatnāt
GE07mbh_05_u:4061: 05,061.010c sa pāṇḍuputrābhihataḥ śaraughaiḥ; saha tvayā yāsyati karṇa nāśam 05,061.011a bāṇasya bhaumasya ca karṇa hantā; kirīṭinaṃ rakṣati vāsudevaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:4294: 05,070.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,070.001*0366_00 janamejaya uvāca 05,070.001*0366_01 prayāte saṃjaye sādhau pāṇḍavān prati vai tadā

GE07mbh_05_u:4315: 05,070.007c yathoktaṃ dūta ācaṣṭe vadhyaḥ syād anyathā bruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:4316: 05,070.008a apradānena rājyasya śāntim asmāsu mārgati 05,070.008c lubdhaḥ pāpena manasā carann asamam ātmanaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:4328: 05,070.018a kule jātasya vṛddhasya paravitteṣu gṛdhyataḥ 05,070.018c lobhaḥ prajñānam āhanti prajñā hanti hatā hriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:4329: 05,070.019a hrīr hatā bādhate dharmaṃ dharmo hanti hataḥ śriyam 05,070.019c śrīr hatā puruṣaṃ hanti puruṣasyāsvatā vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4330: 05,070.020a asvato hi nivartante jñātayaḥ suhṛdartvijaḥ 05,070.020c apuṣpād aphalād vṛkṣād yathā tāta patatriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4331: 05,070.021a etac ca maraṇaṃ tāta yad asmāt patitād iva 05,070.021c jñātayo vinivartante pretasattvād ivāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4332: 05,070.022a nātaḥ pāpīyasīṃ kāṃ cid avasthāṃ śambaro 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:4333: 05,070.022c yatra naivādya na prātar bhojanaṃ pratidṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4334: 05,070.023a dhanam āhuḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ dhane sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4335: 05,070.023c jīvanti dhanino loke mṛtā ye tv adhanā narāḥ 05,070.024a ye dhanād apakarṣanti naraṃ svabalam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4336: 05,070.024c te dharmam arthaṃ kāmaṃ ca pramathnanti naraṃ ca tam
GE07mbh_05_u:4337: 05,070.025a etām avasthāṃ prāpyaike maraṇaṃ vavrire janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4339: 05,070.026a unmādam eke puṣyanti yānty anye dviṣatāṃ vaśam
GE07mbh_05_u:4340: 05,070.026c dāsyam eke nigacchanti pareṣām arthahetunā 05,070.027a āpad evāsya maraṇāt puruṣasya garīyasī 05,070.027c śriyo vināśas tad dhy asya nimittaṃ dharmakāmayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4341: 05,070.028a yad asya dharmyaṃ maraṇaṃ śāśvataṃ lokavartma tat
GE07mbh_05_u:4342: 05,070.028c samantāt sarvabhūtānāṃ na tad atyeti kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:4343: 05,070.029a na tathā bādhyate kṛṣṇa prakṛtyā nirdhano janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4344: 05,070.029c yathā bhadrāṃ śriyaṃ prāpya tayā hīnaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4345: 05,070.030a sa tadātmāparādhena saṃprāpto vyasanaṃ mahat 05,070.030c sendrān garhayate devān nātmānaṃ ca kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:4346: 05,070.031a na cāsmin sarvaśāstrāṇi prataranti nigarhaṇām 05,070.031c so 'bhikrudhyati bhṛtyānāṃ suhṛdaś cābhyasūyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4347: 05,070.032a taṃ tadā manyur evaiti sa bhūyaḥ saṃpramuhyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4348: 05,070.032c sa mohavaśam āpannaḥ krūraṃ karma niṣevate
GE07mbh_05_u:4350: 05,070.033c saṃkaro narakāyaiva sā kāṣṭhā pāpakarmaṇām 05,070.034a na cet prabudhyate kṛṣṇa narakāyaiva gacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:4351: 05,070.034c tasya prabodhaḥ prajñaiva prajñācakṣur na riṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4352: 05,070.035a prajñālābhe hi puruṣaḥ śāstrāṇy evānvavekṣate 05,070.035c śāstranityaḥ punar dharmaṃ tasya hrīr aṅgam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:4353: 05,070.036a hrīmān hi pāpaṃ pradveṣṭi tasya śrīr abhivardhate
GE07mbh_05_u:4354: 05,070.036c śrīmān sa yāvad bhavati tāvad bhavati pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4356: 05,070.037c nādharme kurute buddhiṃ na ca pāpeṣu vartate
GE07mbh_05_u:4357: 05,070.038a ahrīko vā vimūḍho vā naiva strī na punaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:4358: 05,070.038c nāsyādhikāro dharme 'sti yathā śūdras tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4359: 05,070.039a hrīmān avati devāṃś ca pitṝn ātmānam eva ca 05,070.039c tenāmṛtatvaṃ vrajati sā kāṣṭhā puṇyakarmaṇām 05,070.040a tad idaṃ mayi te dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4360: 05,070.040c yathā rājyāt paribhraṣṭo vasāmi vasatīr imāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4361: 05,070.041a te vayaṃ na śriyaṃ hātum alaṃ nyāyena kena cit
GE07mbh_05_u:4362: 05,070.041c atra no yatamānānāṃ vadhaś ced api sādhu tat 05,070.042a tatra naḥ prathamaḥ kalpo yad vayaṃ te ca mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:4363: 05,070.042c praśāntāḥ samabhūtāś ca śriyaṃ tān aśnuvīmahi
GE07mbh_05_u:4365: 05,070.043c yad vayaṃ kauravān hatvā tāni rāṣṭrāṇy aśīmahi
GE07mbh_05_u:4366: 05,070.044a ye punaḥ syur asaṃbaddhā anāryāḥ kṛṣṇa śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4367: 05,070.044c teṣām apy avadhaḥ kāryaḥ kiṃ punar ye syur īdṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4368: 05,070.045a jñātayaś ca hi bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sahāyā guravaś ca naḥ 05,070.045c teṣāṃ vadho 'tipāpīyān kiṃ nu yuddhe 'sti śobhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:4370: 05,070.046c sa naḥ svadharmo 'dharmo vā vṛttir anyā vigarhitā
GE07mbh_05_u:4371: 05,070.047a śūdraḥ karoti śuśrūṣāṃ vaiśyā vipaṇijīvinaḥ 05,070.047c vayaṃ vadhena jīvāmaḥ kapālaṃ brāhmaṇair vṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:4372: 05,070.048a kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyaṃ hanti matsyo matsyena jīvati
GE07mbh_05_u:4373: 05,070.048c śvā śvānaṃ hanti dāśārha paśya dharmo yathāgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4374: 05,070.049a yuddhe kṛṣṇa kalir nityaṃ prāṇāḥ sīdanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:4375: 05,070.049c balaṃ tu nītimātrāya haṭhe jayaparājayau 05,070.050a nātmacchandena bhūtānāṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā 05,070.050c nāpy akāle sukhaṃ prāpyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vāpi yadūttama
GE07mbh_05_u:4376: 05,070.051a eko hy api bahūn hanti ghnanty ekaṃ bahavo 'py uta
GE07mbh_05_u:4377: 05,070.051c śūraṃ kāpuruṣo hanti ayaśasvī yaśasvinam 05,070.052a jayaś caivobhayor dṛṣṭa ubhayoś ca parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4379: 05,070.053a sarvathā vṛjinaṃ yuddhaṃ ko ghnan na pratihanyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4380: 05,070.053c hatasya ca hṛṣīkeśa samau jayaparājayau 05,070.054a parājayaś ca maraṇān manye naiva viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4381: 05,070.054c yasya syād vijayaḥ kṛṣṇa tasyāpy apacayo dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:4382: 05,070.055a antato dayitaṃ ghnanti ke cid apy apare janāḥ 05,070.055c tasyāṅga balahīnasya putrān bhrātṝn apaśyataḥ 05,070.055e nirvedo jīvite kṛṣṇa sarvataś copajāyate 05,070.056a ye hy eva vīrā hrīmanta āryāḥ karuṇavedinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4383: 05,070.056c ta eva yuddhe hanyante yavīyān mucyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4384: 05,070.057a hatvāpy anuśayo nityaṃ parān api janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4385: 05,070.057c anubandhaś ca pāpo 'tra śeṣaś cāpy avaśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4386: 05,070.058a śeṣo hi balam āsādya na śeṣam avaśeṣayet
GE07mbh_05_u:4388: 05,070.059a jayo vairaṃ prasṛjati duḥkham āste parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4389: 05,070.059c sukhaṃ praśāntaḥ svapiti hitvā jayaparājayau 05,070.060a jātavairaś ca puruṣo duḥkhaṃ svapiti nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:4390: 05,070.060c anirvṛtena manasā sasarpa iva veśmani 05,070.061a utsādayati yaḥ sarvaṃ yaśasā sa viyujyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4391: 05,070.061c akīrtiṃ sarvabhūteṣu śāśvatīṃ sa niyacchati 05,070.062a na hi vairāṇi śāmyanti dīrghakālakṛtāny api
GE07mbh_05_u:4392: 05,070.062c ākhyātāraś ca vidyante pumāṃś cotpadyate kule
GE07mbh_05_u:4393: 05,070.063a na cāpi vairaṃ vaireṇa keśava vyupaśāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4394: 05,070.063c haviṣāgnir yathā kṛṣṇa bhūya evābhivardhate 05,070.064a ato 'nyathā nāsti śāntir nityam antaram antataḥ 05,070.064c antaraṃ lipsamānānām ayaṃ doṣo nirantaraḥ 05,070.065a pauruṣeyo hi balavān ādhir hṛdayabādhanaḥ 05,070.065c tasya tyāgena vā śāntir nivṛttyā manaso 'pi vā
GE07mbh_05_u:4395: 05,070.066a atha vā mūlaghātena dviṣatāṃ madhusūdana 05,070.066c phalanirvṛttir iddhā syāt tan nṛśaṃsataraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:4396: 05,070.067a yā tu tyāgena śāntiḥ syāt tad ṛte vadha eva saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4397: 05,070.067c saṃśayāc ca samucchedād dviṣatām ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:4398: 05,070.068a na ca tyaktuṃ tad icchāmo na cecchāmaḥ kulakṣayam 05,070.068c atra yā praṇipātena śāntiḥ saiva garīyasī
GE07mbh_05_u:4400: 05,070.069c sāntve pratihate yuddhaṃ prasiddham aparākramam 05,070.070a pratighātena sāntvasya dāruṇaṃ saṃpravartate
GE07mbh_05_u:4401: 05,070.070c tac chunām iva gopāde paṇḍitair upalakṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4403: 05,070.071c dantadarśanam ārāvas tato yuddhaṃ pravartate 05,070.072a tatra yo balavān kṛṣṇa jitvā so 'tti tad āmiṣam 05,070.072c evam eva manuṣyeṣu viśeṣo nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:4404: 05,070.073a sarvathā tv etad ucitaṃ durbaleṣu balīyasām
GE07mbh_05_u:4405: 05,070.073c anādaro virodhaś ca praṇipātī hi durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4406: 05,070.074a pitā rājā ca vṛddhaś ca sarvathā mānam arhati 05,070.074c tasmān mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca dhṛtarāṣṭro janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4407: 05,070.075a putrasnehas tu balavān dhṛtarāṣṭrasya mādhava 05,070.075c sa putravaśam āpannaḥ praṇipātaṃ prahāsyati 05,070.076a tatra kiṃ manyase kṛṣṇa prāptakālam anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:4408: 05,070.076c katham arthāc ca dharmāc ca na hīyemahi mādhava 05,070.077a īdṛśe hy arthakṛcchre 'smin kam anyaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4409: 05,070.077c upasaṃpraṣṭum arhāmi tvām ṛte puruṣottama 05,070.078a priyaś ca priyakāmaś ca gatijñaḥ sarvakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:4410: 05,070.078c ko hi kṛṣṇāsti nas tvādṛk sarvaniścayavit suhṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:4411: 05,070.079 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,070.079a evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca dharmarājaṃ janārdanaḥ 05,070.079c ubhayor eva vām arthe yāsyāmi kurusaṃsadam
GE07mbh_05_u:4412: 05,070.080a śamaṃ tatra labheyaṃ ced yuṣmadartham ahāpayan
GE07mbh_05_u:4413: 05,070.080c puṇyaṃ me sumahad rājaṃś caritaṃ syān mahāphalam
GE07mbh_05_u:4415: 05,070.081c pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭrāṃś ca sarvāṃ ca pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:4416: 05,070.081d*0371_01 evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca dharmarājo janārdanam 05,070.081d*0371_02 bhrātṝṇāṃ samavetānāṃ sa kāle puruṣottamam 05,070.082 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 05,070.082a na mamaitan mataṃ kṛṣṇa yat tvaṃ yāyāḥ kurūn prati
GE07mbh_05_u:4417: 05,070.082c suyodhanaḥ sūktam api na kariṣyati te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4418: 05,070.082d*0372_01 suyodhanaś ca duṣṭātmā karṇaś ca sahasaubalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4420: 05,070.083c teṣāṃ madhyāvataraṇaṃ tava kṛṣṇa na rocaye
GE07mbh_05_u:4421: 05,070.084a na hi naḥ prīṇayed dravyaṃ na devatvaṃ kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:4422: 05,070.084c na ca sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ tava rodhena mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:4423: 05,070.085 bhagavān uvāca 05,070.085a jānāmy etāṃ mahārāja dhārtarāṣṭrasya pāpatām 05,070.085c avācyās tu bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvaloke mahīkṣitām 05,070.086a na cāpi mama paryāptāḥ sahitāḥ sarvapārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4424: 05,070.086c kruddhasya pramukhe sthātuṃ siṃhasyevetare mṛgāḥ 05,070.087a atha cet te pravarteran mayi kiṃ cid asāṃpratam 05,070.087c nirdaheyaṃ kurūn sarvān iti me dhīyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4425: 05,070.088a na jātu gamanaṃ tatra bhavet pārtha nirarthakam
GE07mbh_05_u:4426: 05,070.088c arthaprāptiḥ kadā cit syād antato vāpy avācyatā
GE07mbh_05_u:4427: 05,070.089 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 05,070.089a yat tubhyaṃ rocate kṛṣṇa svasti prāpnuhi kauravān
GE07mbh_05_u:4428: 05,070.089c kṛtārthaṃ svastimantaṃ tvāṃ drakṣyāmi punarāgatam 05,070.090a viṣvaksena kurūn gatvā bhāratāñ śamayeḥ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:4429: 05,070.090c yathā sarve sumanasaḥ saha syāmaḥ sucetasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4430: 05,070.091a bhrātā cāsi sakhā cāsi bībhatsor mama ca priyaḥ 05,070.091c sauhṛdenāviśaṅkyo 'si svasti prāpnuhi bhūtaye
GE07mbh_05_u:4431: 05,070.092a asmān vettha parān vettha vetthārthaṃ vettha bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4432: 05,070.092c yad yad asmaddhitaṃ kṛṣṇa tat tad vācyaḥ suyodhanaḥ 05,070.093a yad yad dharmeṇa saṃyuktam upapadyed dhitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4433: 05,070.093c tat tat keśava bhāṣethāḥ sāntvaṃ vā yadi vetarat 05,071.001 bhagavān uvāca 05,071.001a saṃjayasya śrutaṃ vākyaṃ bhavataś ca śrutaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:4434: 05,071.001c sarvaṃ jānāmy abhiprāyaṃ teṣāṃ ca bhavataś ca yaḥ 05,071.002a tava dharmāśritā buddhis teṣāṃ vairāśritā matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4435: 05,071.002c yad ayuddhena labhyeta tat te bahumataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:4436: 05,071.003a na ca tan naiṣṭhikaṃ karma kṣatriyasya viśāṃ pate 05,071.003c āhur āśramiṇaḥ sarve yad bhaikṣaṃ kṣatriyaś caret
GE07mbh_05_u:4437: 05,071.004a jayo vadho vā saṃgrāme dhātrā diṣṭaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4438: 05,071.004c svadharmaḥ kṣatriyasyaiṣa kārpaṇyaṃ na praśasyate 05,071.005a na hi kārpaṇyam āsthāya śakyā vṛttir yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_05_u:4439: 05,071.005c vikramasva mahābāho jahi śatrūn ariṃdama 05,071.006a atigṛddhāḥ kṛtasnehā dīrghakālaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:4441: 05,071.007a na paryāyo 'sti yat sāmyaṃ tvayi kuryur viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:4443: 05,071.008a yāvac ca mārdavenaitān rājann upacariṣyasi 05,071.008c tāvad ete hariṣyanti tava rājyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:4444: 05,071.009a nānukrośān na kārpaṇyān na ca dharmārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:4445: 05,071.009c alaṃ kartuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrās tava kāmam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:4446: 05,071.010a etad eva nimittaṃ te pāṇḍavās tu yathā tvayi 05,071.010c nānvatapyanta kaupīnaṃ tāvat kṛtvāpi duṣkaram 05,071.011a pitāmahasya droṇasya vidurasya ca dhīmataḥ 05,071.011b*0373_01 brāhmaṇānāṃ ca sādhūnāṃ rājñaś ca nagarasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4447: 05,071.011c paśyatāṃ kurumukhyānāṃ sarveṣām eva tattvataḥ 05,071.012a dānaśīlaṃ mṛduṃ dāntaṃ dharmakāmam anuvratam 05,071.012c yat tvām upadhinā rājan dyūtenāvañcayat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:4448: 05,071.012e na cāpatrapate pāpo nṛśaṃsas tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:4449: 05,071.013a tathāśīlasamācāre rājan mā praṇayaṃ kṛthāḥ 05,071.013c vadhyās te sarvalokasya kiṃ punas tava bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4450: 05,071.014a vāgbhis tv apratirūpābhir atudat sakanīyasam 05,071.014c ślāghamānaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ san bhāṣate bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:4451: 05,071.015a etāvat pāṇḍavānāṃ hi nāsti kiṃ cid iha svakam 05,071.015c nāmadheyaṃ ca gotraṃ ca tad apy eṣāṃ na śiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4452: 05,071.016a kālena mahatā caiṣāṃ bhaviṣyati parābhavaḥ 05,071.016c prakṛtiṃ te bhajiṣyanti naṣṭaprakṛtayo janāḥ 05,071.016d*0374_01 duḥśāsanena pāpena tadā dyūte pravartite 05,071.016d*0374_02 anāthavat tadā devī draupadī sudurātmanā 05,071.016d*0374_03 ākṛṣya keśe rudatī sabhāyāṃ rājasaṃsadi 05,071.016d*0374_04 bhīṣmadroṇapramukhato gaur iti vyāhṛtā muhuḥ 05,071.016d*0374_05 bhavatā vāritāḥ sarve bhrātaro bhīmavikramāḥ 05,071.016d*0374_06 dharmapāśanibaddhāś ca na kiṃ cit pratipedire
GE07mbh_05_u:4453: 05,071.017a etāś cānyāś ca paruṣā vācaḥ sa samudīrayan
GE07mbh_05_u:4454: 05,071.017c ślāghate jñātimadhye sma tvayi pravrajite vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:4455: 05,071.018a ye tatrāsan samānītās te dṛṣṭvā tvām anāgasam
GE07mbh_05_u:4456: 05,071.018c aśrukaṇṭhā rudantaś ca sabhāyām āsate tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:4457: 05,071.019a na cainam abhyanandaṃs te rājāno brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:4458: 05,071.019c sarve duryodhanaṃ tatra nindanti sma sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4459: 05,071.020a kulīnasya ca yā nindā vadhaś cāmitrakarśana
GE07mbh_05_u:4460: 05,071.020c mahāguṇo vadho rājan na tu nindā kujīvikā
GE07mbh_05_u:4461: 05,071.021a tadaiva nihato rājan yadaiva nirapatrapaḥ 05,071.021c ninditaś ca mahārāja pṛthivyāṃ sarvarājasu 05,071.022a īṣatkāryo vadhas tasya yasya cāritram īdṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:4463: 05,071.023a vadhyaḥ sarpa ivānāryaḥ sarvalokasya durmatiḥ 05,071.023c jahy enaṃ tvam amitraghna mā rājan vicikitsithāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4464: 05,071.024a sarvathā tvatkṣamaṃ caitad rocate ca mamānagha
GE07mbh_05_u:4465: 05,071.024c yat tvaṃ pitari bhīṣme ca praṇipātaṃ samācareḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4466: 05,071.025a ahaṃ tu sarvalokasya gatvā chetsyāmi saṃśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:4467: 05,071.025c yeṣām asti dvidhābhāvo rājan duryodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:4468: 05,071.026a madhye rājñām ahaṃ tatra prātipauruṣikān guṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:4469: 05,071.026c tava saṃkīrtayiṣyāmi ye ca tasya vyatikramāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4470: 05,071.027a bruvatas tatra me vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4472: 05,071.028a tvayi saṃpratipatsyante dharmātmā satyavāg iti 05,071.028c tasmiṃś cādhigamiṣyanti yathā lobhād avartata 05,071.029a garhayiṣyāmi caivainaṃ paurajānapadeṣv api
GE07mbh_05_u:4474: 05,071.030a śamaṃ ced yācamānas tvaṃ na dharmaṃ tatra lapsyase 05,071.030c kurūn vigarhayiṣyanti dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pārthivāḥ 05,071.031a tasmiṃl lokaparityakte kiṃ kāryam avaśiṣyate 05,071.031c hate duryodhane rājan yad anyat kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:4475: 05,071.032a yātvā cāhaṃ kurūn sarvān yuṣmadartham ahāpayan
GE07mbh_05_u:4476: 05,071.032c yatiṣye praśamaṃ kartuṃ lakṣayiṣye ca ceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4477: 05,071.033a kauravāṇāṃ pravṛttiṃ ca gatvā yuddhādhikārikām 05,071.033c niśāmya vinivartiṣye jayāya tava bhārata 05,071.034a sarvathā yuddham evāham āśaṃsāmi paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:4478: 05,071.034c nimittāni hi sarvāṇi tathā prādurbhavanti me
GE07mbh_05_u:4479: 05,071.035a mṛgāḥ śakuntāś ca vadanti ghoraṃ; hastyaśvamukhyeṣu niśāmukheṣu 05,071.035c ghorāṇi rūpāṇi tathaiva cāgnir; varṇān bahūn puṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4481: 05,071.035e manuṣyalokakṣapaṇo 'tha ghoro; no ced anuprāpta ihāntakaḥ syāt 05,071.036a śastrāṇi patraṃ kavacān rathāṃś ca; nāgān dhvajāṃś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4483: 05,071.036c yodhāś ca sarve kṛtaniśramās te; bhavantu hastyaśvaratheṣu yattāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4484: 05,071.036e sāṃgrāmikaṃ te yad upārjanīyaṃ; sarvaṃ samagraṃ kuru tan narendra 05,071.037a duryodhano na hy alam adya dātuṃ; jīvaṃs tavaitan nṛpate
GE07mbh_05_u:4485: kathaṃ cit 05,071.037c yat te purastād abhavat samṛddhaṃ; dyūte hṛtaṃ pāṇḍavamukhya
GE07mbh_05_u:4487: 05,072.001 bhīmasena uvāca 05,072.001a yathā yathaiva śāntiḥ syāt kurūṇāṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4488: 05,072.001c tathā tathaiva bhāṣethā mā sma yuddhena bhīṣayeḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4490: 05,072.002c nograṃ duryodhano vācyaḥ sāmnaivainaṃ samācareḥ 05,072.003a prakṛtyā pāpasattvaś ca tulyacetāś ca dasyubhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4491: 05,072.003c aiśvaryamadamattaś ca kṛtavairaś ca pāṇḍavaiḥ 05,072.004a adīrghadarśī niṣṭhūrī kṣeptā krūraparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4492: 05,072.004c dīrghamanyur aneyaś ca pāpātmā nikṛtipriyaḥ 05,072.005a mriyetāpi na bhajyeta naiva jahyāt svakaṃ matam
GE07mbh_05_u:4493: 05,072.005c tādṛśena śamaṃ kṛṣṇa manye paramaduṣkaram 05,072.006a suhṛdām apy avācīnas tyaktadharmaḥ priyānṛtaḥ 05,072.006c pratihanty eva suhṛdāṃ vācaś caiva manāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4494: 05,072.007a sa manyuvaśam āpannaḥ svabhāvaṃ duṣṭam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4495: 05,072.007c svabhāvāt pāpam anveti tṛṇais tunna ivoragaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4496: 05,072.008a duryodhano hi yat senaḥ sarvathā viditas tava
GE07mbh_05_u:4497: 05,072.008c yacchīlo yatsvabhāvaś ca yadbalo yatparākramaḥ 05,072.009a purā prasannāḥ kuravaḥ sahaputrās tathā vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:4502: 05,072.011c ye samuccicchidur jñātīn suhṛdaś ca sabāndhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:4503: 05,072.012a asurāṇāṃ samṛddhānāṃ jvalatām iva tejasā 05,072.012c paryāyakāle dharmasya prāpte balir ajāyata 05,072.013a haihayānām udāvarto nīpānāṃ janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4504: 05,072.013c bahulas tālajaṅghānāṃ kṛmīṇām uddhato vasuḥ 05,072.014a ajabinduḥ suvīrāṇāṃ surāṣṭrāṇāṃ kuśarddhikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4505: 05,072.014c arkajaś ca balīhānāṃ cīnānāṃ dhautamūlakaḥ 05,072.015a hayagrīvo videhānāṃ varapraś ca mahaujasām 05,072.015c bāhuḥ sundaravegānāṃ dīptākṣāṇāṃ purūravāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4508: 05,072.017a śamaś ca nandivegānām ity ete kulapāṃsanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4509: 05,072.017c yugānte kṛṣṇa saṃbhūtāḥ kuleṣu puruṣādhamāḥ 05,072.018a apy ayaṃ naḥ kurūṇāṃ syād yugānte kālasaṃbhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4511: 05,072.019a tasmān mṛdu śanair enaṃ brūyā dharmārthasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4513: 05,072.020a api duryodhanaṃ kṛṣṇa sarve vayam adhaścarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4514: 05,072.020c nīcair bhūtvānuyāsyāmo mā sma no bharatā naśan
GE07mbh_05_u:4515: 05,072.021a apy udāsīnavṛttiḥ syād yathā naḥ kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:4516: 05,072.021c vāsudeva tathā kāryaṃ na kurūn anayaḥ spṛśet
GE07mbh_05_u:4517: 05,072.022a vācyaḥ pitāmaho vṛddho ye ca kṛṣṇa sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4518: 05,072.022c bhrātṝṇām astu saubhrātraṃ dhārtarāṣṭraḥ praśāmyatām 05,072.023a aham etad bravīmy evaṃ rājā caiva praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_05_u:4519: 05,072.023c arjuno naiva yuddhārthī bhūyasī hi dayārjune
GE07mbh_05_u:4520: 05,073.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,073.001a etac chrutvā mahābāhuḥ keśavaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:4522: 05,073.002a girer iva laghutvaṃ tac chītatvam iva pāvake
GE07mbh_05_u:4523: 05,073.002c matvā rāmānujaḥ śauriḥ śārṅgadhanvā vṛkodaram 05,073.003a saṃtejayaṃs tadā vāgbhir mātariśveva pāvakam 05,073.003c uvāca bhīmam āsīnaṃ kṛpayābhipariplutam
GE07mbh_05_u:4524: 05,073.004a tvam anyadā bhīmasena yuddham eva praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_05_u:4526: 05,073.005a na ca svapiṣi jāgarṣi nyubjaḥ śeṣe paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:4527: 05,073.005c ghorām aśāntāṃ ruśatīṃ sadā vācaṃ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_05_u:4528: 05,073.006a niḥśvasann agnivarṇena saṃtaptaḥ svena manyunā 05,073.006c apraśāntamanā bhīma sadhūma iva pāvakaḥ 05,073.007a ekānte niṣṭanañ śeṣe bhārārta iva durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4529: 05,073.007c api tvāṃ ke cid unmattaṃ manyante 'tadvido janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4530: 05,073.008a ārujya vṛkṣān nirmūlān gajaḥ paribhujann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:4531: 05,073.008c nighnan padbhiḥ kṣitiṃ bhīma niṣṭanan paridhāvasi
GE07mbh_05_u:4533: 05,073.009c nānyaṃ niśi divā vāpi kadā cid abhinandasi
GE07mbh_05_u:4534: 05,073.010a akasmāt smayamānaś ca rahasy āsse rudann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:4535: 05,073.010c jānvor mūrdhānam ādhāya ciram āsse pramīlitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4536: 05,073.011a bhrukuṭiṃ ca punaḥ kurvann oṣṭhau ca vilihann iva 05,073.011c abhīkṣṇaṃ dṛśyase bhīma sarvaṃ tan manyukāritam
GE07mbh_05_u:4537: 05,073.012a yathā purastāt savitā dṛśyate śukram uccaran
GE07mbh_05_u:4538: 05,073.012c yathā ca paścān nirmukto dhruvaṃ paryeti raśmivān
GE07mbh_05_u:4539: 05,073.013a tathā satyaṃ bravīmy etan nāsti tasya vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4541: 05,073.014a iti sma madhye bhrātṝṇāṃ satyenālabhase gadām
GE07mbh_05_u:4542: 05,073.014c tasya te praśame buddhir dhīyate 'dya paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:4544: 05,073.015c paśyasīvāpratīpāni kiṃ tvāṃ bhīr bhīma vindati
GE07mbh_05_u:4545: 05,073.016a aho pārtha nimittāni viparītāni paśyasi 05,073.016c svapnānte jāgarānte ca tasmāt praśamam icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:4546: 05,073.017a aho nāśaṃsase kiṃ cit puṃstvaṃ klība ivātmani
GE07mbh_05_u:4548: 05,073.018a udvepate te hṛdayaṃ manas te praviṣīdati
GE07mbh_05_u:4550: 05,073.019a anityaṃ kila martyasya cittaṃ pārtha calācalam
GE07mbh_05_u:4552: 05,073.020a tavaiṣā vikṛtā buddhir gavāṃ vāg iva mānuṣī
GE07mbh_05_u:4553: 05,073.020c manāṃsi pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ majjayaty aplavān iva 05,073.021a idaṃ me mahad āścaryaṃ parvatasyeva sarpaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:4555: 05,073.022a sa dṛṣṭvā svāni karmāṇi kule janma ca bhārata 05,073.022c uttiṣṭhasva viṣādaṃ mā kṛthā vīra sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:4556: 05,073.023a na caitad anurūpaṃ te yat te glānir ariṃdama 05,073.023c yad ojasā na labhate kṣatriyo na tad aśnute 05,074.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,074.001a tathokto vāsudevena nityamanyur amarṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4560: 05,074.003a vettha dāśārha sattvaṃ me dīrghakālaṃ sahoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4561: 05,074.003c uta vā māṃ na jānāsi plavan hrada ivālpavaḥ 05,074.003e tasmād apratirūpābhir vāgbhir māṃ tvaṃ samarchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:4562: 05,074.004a kathaṃ hi bhīmasenaṃ māṃ jānan kaś cana mādhava 05,074.004c brūyād apratirūpāṇi yathā māṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:4563: 05,074.005a tasmād idaṃ pravakṣyāmi vacanaṃ vṛṣṇinandana 05,074.005c ātmanaḥ pauruṣaṃ caiva balaṃ ca na samaṃ paraiḥ 05,074.006a sarvathā nāryakarmaitat praśaṃsā svayam ātmanaḥ 05,074.006c ativādāpaviddhas tu vakṣyāmi balam ātmanaḥ 05,074.007a paśyeme rodasī kṛṣṇa yayor āsann imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4564: 05,074.007c acale cāpy anante ca pratiṣṭhe sarvamātarau
GE07mbh_05_u:4565: 05,074.008a yadīme sahasā kruddhe sameyātāṃ śile iva
GE07mbh_05_u:4566: 05,074.008c aham ete nigṛhṇīyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ sacarācare 05,074.009a paśyaitad antaraṃ bāhvor mahāparighayor iva 05,074.009c ya etat prāpya mucyeta na taṃ paśyāmi pūruṣam 05,074.010a himavāṃś ca samudraś ca vajrī ca balabhit svayam 05,074.010c mayābhipannaṃ trāyeran balam āsthāya na trayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4567: 05,074.011a yudhyeyaṃ kṣatriyān sarvān pāṇḍaveṣv ātatāyinaḥ 05,074.011c adhaḥ pādatalenaitān adhiṣṭhāsyāmi bhūtale
GE07mbh_05_u:4568: 05,074.012a na hi tvaṃ nābhijānāsi mama vikramam acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:4569: 05,074.012c yathā mayā vinirjitya rājāno vaśagāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4570: 05,074.013a atha cen māṃ na jānāsi sūryasyevodyataḥ prabhām
GE07mbh_05_u:4571: 05,074.013c vigāḍhe yudhi saṃbādhe vetsyase māṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4572: 05,074.014a kiṃ mātyavākṣīḥ paruṣair vraṇaṃ sūcyā ivānagha
GE07mbh_05_u:4573: 05,074.014c yathāmati bravīmy etad viddhi mām adhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4575: 05,074.015c mayā praṇunnān mātaṅgān rathinaḥ sādinas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:4576: 05,074.016a tathā narān abhikruddhaṃ nighnantaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhān 05,074.016c draṣṭā māṃ tvaṃ ca lokaś ca vikarṣantaṃ varān varān
GE07mbh_05_u:4577: 05,074.017a na me sīdanti majjāno na mamodvepate manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4578: 05,074.017c sarvalokād abhikruddhān na bhayaṃ vidyate mama
GE07mbh_05_u:4579: 05,074.018a kiṃ tu sauhṛdam evaitat kṛpayā madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4580: 05,074.018c sarvāṃs titikṣe saṃkleśān mā sma no bharatā naśan 05,075.001 bhagavān uvāca 05,075.001a bhāvaṃ jijñāsamāno 'haṃ praṇayād idam abruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:4581: 05,075.001c na cākṣepān na pāṇḍityān na krodhān na vivakṣayā 05,075.002a vedāhaṃ tava māhātmyam uta te veda yad balam 05,075.002c uta te veda karmāṇi na tvāṃ paribhavāmy aham 05,075.003a yathā cātmani kalyāṇaṃ saṃbhāvayasi pāṇḍava 05,075.003c sahasraguṇam apy etat tvayi saṃbhāvayāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:4582: 05,075.004a yādṛśe ca kule janma sarvarājābhipūjite 05,075.004c bandhubhiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca bhīma tvam asi tādṛśaḥ 05,075.005a jijñāsanto hi dharmasya saṃdigdhasya vṛkodara 05,075.005c paryāyaṃ na vyavasyanti daivamānuṣayor janāḥ 05,075.006a sa eva hetur bhūtvā hi puruṣasyārthasiddhiṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:4583: 05,075.006c vināśe 'pi sa evāsya saṃdigdhaṃ karma pauruṣam 05,075.007a anyathā paridṛṣṭāni kavibhir doṣadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4584: 05,075.007c anyathā parivartante vegā iva nabhasvataḥ 05,075.008a sumantritaṃ sunītaṃ ca nyāyataś copapāditam 05,075.008c kṛtaṃ mānuṣyakaṃ karma daivenāpi virudhyate 05,075.009a daivam apy akṛtaṃ karma pauruṣeṇa vihanyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4585: 05,075.009c śītam uṣṇaṃ tathā varṣaṃ kṣutpipāse ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4586: 05,075.010a yad anyad diṣṭabhāvasya puruṣasya svayaṃkṛtam 05,075.010c tasmād anavarodhaś ca vidyate tatra lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:4587: 05,075.011a lokasya nānyato vṛttiḥ pāṇḍavānyatra karmaṇaḥ 05,075.011b*0375_01 bāhuśālin mahāvīrya bhīmasena vicakṣaṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:4589: 05,075.011c evaṃbuddhiḥ pravarteta phalaṃ syād ubhayānvayāt 05,075.012a ya evaṃ kṛtabuddhiḥ san karmasv eva pravartate
GE07mbh_05_u:4590: 05,075.012c nāsiddhau vyathate tasya na siddhau harṣam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:4591: 05,075.013a tatreyam arthamātrā me bhīmasena vivakṣitā 05,075.013c naikāntasiddhir mantavyā kurubhiḥ saha saṃyuge 05,075.014a nātipraṇītaraśmiḥ syāt tathā bhavati paryaye 05,075.014c viṣādam arched glāniṃ vā etadarthaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:4592: 05,075.015a śvobhūte dhṛtarāṣṭrasya samīpaṃ prāpya pāṇḍava 05,075.015c yatiṣye praśamaṃ kartuṃ yuṣmadartham ahāpayan 05,075.016a śamaṃ cet te kariṣyanti tato 'nantaṃ yaśo mama 05,075.016c bhavatāṃ ca kṛtaḥ kāmas teṣāṃ ca śreya uttamam 05,075.017a te ced abhinivekṣyanti nābhyupaiṣyanti me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4593: 05,075.017c kuravo yuddham evātra raudraṃ karma bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4594: 05,075.018a asmin yuddhe bhīmasena tvayi bhāraḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4595: 05,075.018c dhūr arjunena dhāryā syād voḍhavya itaro janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4596: 05,075.019a ahaṃ hi yantā bībhatsor bhavitā saṃyuge sati
GE07mbh_05_u:4597: 05,075.019c dhanaṃjayasyaiṣa kāmo na hi yuddhaṃ na kāmaye
GE07mbh_05_u:4599: 05,075.020c tudann aklībayā vācā tejas te samadīpayam
GE07mbh_05_u:4600: 05,076.001 arjuna uvāca 05,076.001a uktaṃ yudhiṣṭhireṇaiva yāvad vācyaṃ janārdana 05,076.001c tava vākyaṃ tu me śrutvā pratibhāti paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:4601: 05,076.002a naiva praśamam atra tvaṃ manyase sukaraṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:4602: 05,076.002c lobhād vā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dainyād vā samupasthitāt
GE07mbh_05_u:4603: 05,076.003a aphalaṃ manyase cāpi puruṣasya parākramam 05,076.003c na cāntareṇa karmāṇi pauruṣeṇa phalodayaḥ 05,076.004a tad idaṃ bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ tathā ca na tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4604: 05,076.004c na caitad evaṃ draṣṭavyam asādhyam iti kiṃ cana 05,076.005a kiṃ caitan manyase kṛcchram asmākaṃ pāpam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4605: 05,076.005c kurvanti teṣāṃ karmāṇi yeṣāṃ nāsti phalodayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4606: 05,076.006a saṃpādyamānaṃ samyak ca syāt karma saphalaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:4607: 05,076.006c sa tathā kṛṣṇa vartasva yathā śarma bhavet paraiḥ 05,076.007a pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca bhavān paramakaḥ suhṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:4608: 05,076.007c surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca yathā vīra prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4609: 05,076.008a kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca pratipatsva nirāmayam 05,076.008c asmaddhitam anuṣṭhātuṃ na manye tava duṣkaram
GE07mbh_05_u:4610: 05,076.009a evaṃ cet kāryatām eti kāryaṃ tava janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4611: 05,076.009c gamanād evam eva tvaṃ kariṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4612: 05,076.010a cikīrṣitam athānyat te tasmin vīra durātmani
GE07mbh_05_u:4613: 05,076.010c bhaviṣyati tathā sarvaṃ yathā tava cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4614: 05,076.011a śarma taiḥ saha vā no 'stu tava vā yac cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4615: 05,076.011c vicāryamāṇo yaḥ kāmas tava kṛṣṇa sa no guruḥ 05,076.012a na sa nārhati duṣṭātmā vadhaṃ sasutabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4616: 05,076.012c yena dharmasute dṛṣṭvā na sā śrīr upamarṣitā
GE07mbh_05_u:4617: 05,076.013a yac cāpy apaśyatopāyaṃ dharmiṣṭhaṃ madhusūdana 05,076.013c upāyena nṛśaṃsena hṛtā durdyūtadevinā
GE07mbh_05_u:4618: 05,076.014a kathaṃ hi puruṣo jātaḥ kṣatriyeṣu dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4620: 05,076.015a adharmeṇa jitān dṛṣṭvā vane pravrajitāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:4622: 05,076.016a na caitad adbhutaṃ kṛṣṇa mitrārthe yac cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_05_u:4623: 05,076.016c kriyā kathaṃ nu mukhyā syān mṛdunā vetareṇa vā 05,076.017a atha vā manyase jyāyān vadhas teṣām anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:4624: 05,076.017c tad eva kriyatām āśu na vicāryam atas tvayā 05,076.018a jānāsi hi yathā tena draupadī pāpabuddhinā
GE07mbh_05_u:4625: 05,076.018c parikliṣṭā sabhāmadhye tac ca tasyāpi marṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4626: 05,076.019a sa nāma samyag varteta pāṇḍaveṣv iti mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:4627: 05,076.019c na me saṃjāyate buddhir bījam uptam ivoṣare
GE07mbh_05_u:4628: 05,076.020a tasmād yan manyase yuktaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca yad dhitam 05,076.020c tad āśu kuru vārṣṇeya yan naḥ kāryam anantaram 05,077.001 bhagavān uvāca 05,077.001a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_05_u:4629: 05,077.001b*0377_01 pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca pratipatsye nirāmayam 05,077.001c sarvaṃ tv idaṃ samāyattaṃ bībhatso karmaṇor dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4630: 05,077.002a kṣetraṃ hi rasavac chuddhaṃ karṣakeṇopapāditam 05,077.002c ṛte varṣaṃ na kaunteya jātu nirvartayet phalam
GE07mbh_05_u:4631: 05,077.003a tatra vai pauruṣaṃ brūyur āsekaṃ yatnakāritam
GE07mbh_05_u:4632: 05,077.003c tatra cāpi dhruvaṃ paśyec choṣaṇaṃ daivakāritam
GE07mbh_05_u:4633: 05,077.004a tad idaṃ niścitaṃ buddhyā pūrvair api mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4634: 05,077.004c daive ca mānuṣe caiva saṃyuktaṃ lokakāraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:4635: 05,077.005a ahaṃ hi tat kariṣyāmi paraṃ puruṣakārataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4636: 05,077.005c daivaṃ tu na mayā śakyaṃ karma kartuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:4637: 05,077.006a sa hi dharmaṃ ca satyaṃ ca tyaktvā carati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4638: 05,077.006c na hi saṃtapyate tena tathārūpeṇa karmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:4639: 05,077.007a tāṃ cāpi buddhiṃ pāpiṣṭhāṃ vardhayanty asya mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4640: 05,077.007c śakuniḥ sūtaputraś ca bhrātā duḥśāsanas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:4641: 05,077.008a sa hi tyāgena rājyasya na śamaṃ samupeṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4642: 05,077.008c antareṇa vadhāt pārtha sānubandhaḥ suyodhanaḥ 05,077.009a na cāpi praṇipātena tyaktum icchati dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:4643: 05,077.009c yācyamānas tu rājyaṃ sa na pradāsyati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4644: 05,077.010a na tu manye sa tad vācyo yad yudhiṣṭhiraśāsanam 05,077.010c uktaṃ prayojanaṃ tatra dharmarājena bhārata 05,077.011a tathā pāpas tu tat sarvaṃ na kariṣyati kauravaḥ 05,077.011c tasmiṃś cākriyamāṇe 'sau lokavadhyo bhaviṣyati 05,077.012a mama cāpi sa vadhyo vai jagataś cāpi bhārata 05,077.012c yena kaumārake yūyaṃ sarve viprakṛtās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:4645: 05,077.013a vipraluptaṃ ca vo rājyaṃ nṛśaṃsena durātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:4646: 05,077.013c na copaśāmyate pāpaḥ śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_05_u:4647: 05,077.014a asakṛc cāpy ahaṃ tena tvatkṛte pārtha bheditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4648: 05,077.014c na mayā tad gṛhītaṃ ca pāpaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam 05,077.015a jānāsi hi mahābāho tvam apy asya paraṃ matam 05,077.015c priyaṃ cikīrṣamāṇaṃ ca dharmarājasya mām api
GE07mbh_05_u:4649: 05,077.016a sa jānaṃs tasya cātmānaṃ mama caiva paraṃ matam 05,077.016c ajānann iva cākasmād
GE07mbh_05_u:4650: 05,077.017a yac cāpi paramaṃ divyaṃ tac cāpy avagataṃ tvayā 05,077.017c vidhānavihitaṃ pārtha kathaṃ śarma bhavet paraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4651: 05,077.018a yat tu vācā mayā śakyaṃ karmaṇā cāpi pāṇḍava 05,077.018c kariṣye tad ahaṃ pārtha na tv āśaṃse śamaṃ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4652: 05,077.019a kathaṃ goharaṇe brūyād icchañ śarma tathāvidham
GE07mbh_05_u:4654: 05,077.020a tadaiva te parābhūtā yadā saṃkalpitās tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:4655: 05,077.020c lavaśaḥ kṣaṇaśaś cāpi na ca tuṣṭaḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4656: 05,077.021a sarvathā tu mayā kāryaṃ dharmarājasya śāsanam
GE07mbh_05_u:4657: 05,077.021c vibhāvyaṃ tasya bhūyaś ca karma pāpaṃ durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4658: 05,078.001 nakula uvāca 05,078.001a uktaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vākyaṃ dharmarājena mādhava 05,078.001c dharmajñena vadānyena dharmayuktaṃ ca tattvataḥ 05,078.002a matam ājñāya rājñaś ca bhīmasenena mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:4659: 05,078.002c saṃśamo bāhuvīryaṃ ca khyāpitaṃ mādhavātmanaḥ 05,078.003a tathaiva phalgunenāpi yad uktaṃ tat tvayā śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:4660: 05,078.003c ātmanaś ca mataṃ vīra kathitaṃ bhavatāsakṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:4661: 05,078.004a sarvam etad atikramya śrutvā paramataṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:4662: 05,078.004c yat prāptakālaṃ manyethās tat kuryāḥ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_05_u:4663: 05,078.005a tasmiṃs tasmin nimitte hi mataṃ bhavati keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:4664: 05,078.005c prāptakālaṃ manuṣyeṇa svayaṃ kāryam ariṃdama 05,078.006a anyathā cintito hy arthaḥ punar bhavati so 'nyathā
GE07mbh_05_u:4666: 05,078.007a anyathā buddhayo hy āsann asmāsu vanavāsiṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:4667: 05,078.007c adṛśyeṣv anyathā kṛṣṇa dṛśyeṣu punar anyathā
GE07mbh_05_u:4668: 05,078.008a asmākam api vārṣṇeya vane vicaratāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:4669: 05,078.008c na tathā praṇayo rājye yathā saṃprati vartate
GE07mbh_05_u:4670: 05,078.009a nivṛttavanavāsān naḥ śrutvā vīra samāgatāḥ 05,078.009c akṣauhiṇyo hi saptemās tvatprasādāj janārdana 05,078.010a imān hi puruṣavyāghrān acintyabalapauruṣān
GE07mbh_05_u:4671: 05,078.010c āttaśastrān raṇe dṛṣṭvā na vyathed iha kaḥ pumān 05,078.011a sa bhavān kurumadhye taṃ sāntvapūrvaṃ bhayānvitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4672: 05,078.011c brūyād vākyaṃ yathā mando na vyatheta suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4674: 05,078.012c sahadevaṃ ca māṃ caiva tvāṃ ca rāmaṃ ca keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:4675: 05,078.013a sātyakiṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ virāṭaṃ ca sahātmajam
GE07mbh_05_u:4676: 05,078.013c drupadaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_05_u:4677: 05,078.014a kāśirājaṃ ca vikrāntaṃ dhṛṣṭaketuṃ ca cedipam
GE07mbh_05_u:4678: 05,078.014c māṃsaśoṇitabhṛn martyaḥ pratiyudhyeta ko yudhi 05,078.015a sa bhavān gamanād eva sādhayiṣyaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:4679: 05,078.015c iṣṭam arthaṃ mahābāho dharmarājasya kevalam 05,078.016a viduraś caiva bhīṣmaś ca droṇaś ca sahabāhlikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4680: 05,078.016c śreyaḥ samarthā vijñātum ucyamānaṃ tvayānagha 05,078.017a te cainam anuneṣyanti dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ janādhipam 05,078.017c taṃ ca pāpasamācāraṃ sahāmātyaṃ suyodhanam 05,078.018a śrotā cārthasya viduras tvaṃ ca vaktā janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4681: 05,078.018c kam ivārthaṃ vivartantaṃ sthāpayetāṃ na vartmani
GE07mbh_05_u:4682: 05,079.001 sahadeva uvāca 05,079.001a yad etat kathitaṃ rājñā dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4683: 05,079.001c yathā tu yuddham eva syāt tathā kāryam ariṃdama 05,079.002a yadi praśamam iccheyuḥ kuravaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:4684: 05,079.002c tathāpi yuddhaṃ dāśārha yojayethāḥ sahaiva taiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4685: 05,079.003a kathaṃ nu dṛṣṭvā pāñcālīṃ tathā kliṣṭāṃ sabhāgatām
GE07mbh_05_u:4686: 05,079.003c avadhena praśāmyeta mama manyuḥ suyodhane 05,079.004a yadi bhīmārjunau kṛṣṇa dharmarājaś ca dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4687: 05,079.004c dharmam utsṛjya tenāhaṃ yoddhum icchāmi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:4688: 05,079.004d*0378_01 brūhi madvacanaṃ kṛṣṇa suyodhanam apaṇḍitam 05,079.004d*0378_02 kṛcchre vane vā vastavyaṃ pure vā nāgasāhvaye
GE07mbh_05_u:4689: 05,079.005 sātyakir uvāca 05,079.005a satyam āha mahābāho sahadevo mahāmatiḥ 05,079.005c duryodhanavadhe śāntis tasya kopasya me bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:4690: 05,079.006a jānāsi hi yathā dṛṣṭvā cīrājinadharān vane
GE07mbh_05_u:4691: 05,079.006c tavāpi manyur udbhūto duḥkhitān prekṣya pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:4692: 05,079.007a tasmān mādrīsutaḥ śūro yad āha puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4693: 05,079.007c vacanaṃ sarvayodhānāṃ tan mataṃ puruṣottama 05,079.008 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,079.008a evaṃ vadati vākyaṃ tu yuyudhāne mahāmatau
GE07mbh_05_u:4695: 05,079.009a sarve hi sarvato vīrās tad vacaḥ pratyapūjayan
GE07mbh_05_u:4696: 05,079.009c sādhu sādhv iti śaineyaṃ harṣayanto yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4697: 05,080.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,080.001a rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4698: 05,080.001c kṛṣṇā dāśārham āsīnam abravīc chokakarṣitā 05,080.002a sutā drupadarājasya
GE07mbh_05_u:4699: 05,080.002c saṃpūjya sahadevaṃ ca sātyakiṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_05_u:4700: 05,080.003a bhīmasenaṃ ca saṃśāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadurmanāḥ 05,080.003c aśrupūrṇekṣaṇā vākyam uvācedaṃ manasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:4701: 05,080.004a viditaṃ te mahābāho dharmajña madhusūdana 05,080.004c yathā nikṛtim āsthāya bhraṃśitāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sukhāt
GE07mbh_05_u:4703: 05,080.005c yathā ca saṃjayo rājñā mantraṃ rahasi śrāvitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4704: 05,080.006a yudhiṣṭhireṇa dāśārha tac cāpi viditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:4705: 05,080.006c yathoktaḥ saṃjayaś caiva tac ca sarvaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā 05,080.007a pañca nas tāta dīyantāṃ grāmā iti mahādyute
GE07mbh_05_u:4707: 05,080.008a avasānaṃ mahābāho kiṃ cid eva tu pañcamam
GE07mbh_05_u:4708: 05,080.008c iti duryodhano vācyaḥ suhṛdaś cāsya keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:4709: 05,080.009a tac cāpi nākarod vākyaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4710: 05,080.009c yudhiṣṭhirasya dāśārha hrīmataḥ saṃdhim icchataḥ 05,080.010a apradānena rājyasya yadi kṛṣṇa suyodhanaḥ 05,080.010c saṃdhim icchen na kartavyas tatra gatvā kathaṃ cana 05,080.011a śakṣyanti hi mahābāho pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:4712: 05,080.012a na hi sāmnā na dānena śakyo 'rthas teṣu kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:4713: 05,080.012c tasmāt teṣu na kartavyā kṛpā te madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4714: 05,080.013a sāmnā dānena vā kṛṣṇa ye na śāmyanti śatravaḥ 05,080.013c moktavyas teṣu daṇḍaḥ syāj jīvitaṃ parirakṣatā
GE07mbh_05_u:4715: 05,080.014a tasmāt teṣu mahādaṇḍaḥ kṣeptavyaḥ kṣipram acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:4716: 05,080.014c tvayā caiva mahābāho pāṇḍavaiḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4717: 05,080.015a etat samarthaṃ pārthānāṃ tava caiva yaśaskaram
GE07mbh_05_u:4718: 05,080.015c kriyamāṇaṃ bhavet kṛṣṇa kṣatrasya ca sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_05_u:4719: 05,080.016a kṣatriyeṇa hi hantavyaḥ kṣatriyo lobham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4720: 05,080.016c akṣatriyo vā dāśārha svadharmam anutiṣṭhatā 05,080.017a anyatra brāhmaṇāt tāta sarvapāpeṣv avasthitāt 05,080.017c gurur hi sarvavarṇānāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ prasṛtāgrabhuk 05,080.018a yathāvadhye bhaved doṣo vadhyamāne janārdana 05,080.018c sa vadhyasyāvadhe dṛṣṭa iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4721: 05,080.019a yathā tvāṃ na spṛśed eṣa doṣaḥ kṛṣṇa tathā kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:4722: 05,080.019c pāṇḍavaiḥ saha dāśārha sṛñjayaiś ca sasainikaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4723: 05,080.020a punar uktaṃ ca vakṣyāmi viśrambheṇa janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4724: 05,080.020c kā nu sīmantinī mādṛk pṛthivyām asti keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:4726: 05,080.021c dhṛṣṭadyumnasya bhaginī tava kṛṣṇa priyā sakhī
GE07mbh_05_u:4727: 05,080.022a ājamīḍhakulaṃ prāptā snuṣā pāṇḍor mahātmanaḥ 05,080.022c mahiṣī pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:4728: 05,080.023a sutā me pañcabhir vīraiḥ pañca jātā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4729: 05,080.023c abhimanyur yathā kṛṣṇa tathā te tava dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4730: 05,080.024a sāhaṃ keśagrahaṃ prāptā parikliṣṭā sabhāṃ gatā
GE07mbh_05_u:4731: 05,080.024c paśyatāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ tvayi jīvati keśava 05,080.025a jīvatsu kauraveyeṣu pāñcāleṣv atha vṛṣṇiṣu 05,080.025c dāsībhūtāsmi pāpānāṃ sabhāmadhye vyavasthitā
GE07mbh_05_u:4733: 05,080.026c trāhi mām iti govinda manasā kāṅkṣito 'si me
GE07mbh_05_u:4734: 05,080.027a yatra māṃ bhagavān rājā śvaśuro vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:4735: 05,080.027c varaṃ vṛṇīṣva pāñcāli varārhāsi matāsi me
GE07mbh_05_u:4736: 05,080.028a adāsāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ santu sarathāḥ sāyudhā iti
GE07mbh_05_u:4737: 05,080.028c mayokte yatra nirmuktā vanavāsāya keśava 05,080.029a evaṃvidhānāṃ duḥkhānām abhijño 'si janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4739: 05,080.030a nanv ahaṃ kṛṣṇa bhīṣmasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4740: 05,080.030c snuṣā bhavāmi dharmeṇa sāhaṃ dāsīkṛtābhavam 05,080.031a dhig balaṃ bhīmasenasya dhik pārthasya dhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_05_u:4741: 05,080.031c yatra duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa muhūrtam api jīvati
GE07mbh_05_u:4742: 05,080.032a yadi te 'ham anugrāhyā yadi te 'sti kṛpā mayi 05,080.032c dhārtarāṣṭreṣu vai kopaḥ sarvaḥ kṛṣṇa vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:4743: 05,080.033a ity uktvā mṛdusaṃhāraṃ vṛjināgraṃ sudarśanam 05,080.033c sunīlam asitāpāṅgī
GE07mbh_05_u:4744: 05,080.034a sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ mahābhujagavarcasam 05,080.034c keśapakṣaṃ varārohā gṛhya savyena pāṇinā 05,080.035a padmākṣī puṇḍarīkākṣam upetya gajagāminī
GE07mbh_05_u:4745: 05,080.035c aśrupūrṇekṣaṇā kṛṣṇā kṛṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt 05,080.036a ayaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa
GE07mbh_05_u:4746: 05,080.036c smartavyaḥ sarvakāleṣu pareṣāṃ saṃdhim icchatā 05,080.037a yadi bhīmārjunau kṛṣṇa kṛpaṇau saṃdhikāmukau 05,080.037c pitā me yotsyate vṛddhaḥ saha putrair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4747: 05,080.038a pañca caiva mahāvīryāḥ putrā me madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:4748: 05,080.038c abhimanyuṃ puraskṛtya yotsyanti kurubhiḥ saha 05,080.039a duḥśāsanabhujaṃ śyāmaṃ saṃchinnaṃ pāṃsuguṇṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4749: 05,080.039c yady ahaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
GE07mbh_05_u:4750: 05,080.040a trayodaśa hi varṣāṇi pratīkṣantyā gatāni me
GE07mbh_05_u:4751: 05,080.040c nidhāya hṛdaye manyuṃ pradīptam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_05_u:4755: 05,080.042c ruroda kṛṣṇā sotkampaṃ sasvaraṃ bāṣpagadgadam 05,080.043a stanau pīnāyataśroṇī sahitāv abhivarṣatī

GE07mbh_05_u:4931: 05,083.002c duryodhanaṃ ca sāmātyaṃ hṛṣṭaromābravīd idam 05,083.003a adbhutaṃ mahad āścaryaṃ śrūyate kurunandana 05,083.003c striyo bālāś ca vṛddhāś ca kathayanti gṛhe gṛhe 05,083.004a satkṛtyācakṣate cānye tathaivānye samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4932: 05,083.004c pṛthagvādāś ca vartante catvareṣu sabhāsu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4934: 05,083.005c sa no mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca sarvathā madhusūdanaḥ 05,083.006a tasmin hi yātrā lokasya bhūtānām īśvaro hi saḥ 05,083.006c tasmin dhṛtiś ca vīryaṃ ca prajñā caujaś ca mādhave
GE07mbh_05_u:4935: 05,083.007a sa mānyatāṃ naraśreṣṭhaḥ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4936: 05,083.007c pūjito hi sukhāya syād asukhaḥ syād apūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4937: 05,083.008a sa cet tuṣyati dāśārha upacārair ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4938: 05,083.008c kṛtsnān sarvān abhiprāyān prāpsyāmaḥ sarvarājasu 05,083.009a tasya pūjārtham adyaiva saṃvidhatsva paraṃtapa 05,083.009c sabhāḥ pathi vidhīyantāṃ sarvakāmasamāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4939: 05,083.010a yathā prītir mahābāho tvayi jāyeta tasya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:4940: 05,083.010c tathā kuruṣva gāndhāre kathaṃ vā bhīṣma manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:4941: 05,083.011a tato bhīṣmādayaḥ sarve dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ janādhipam 05,083.011c ūcuḥ paramam ity evaṃ pūjayanto 'sya tad vacaḥ 05,083.012a teṣām anumataṃ jñātvā rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:4943: 05,083.013a tato deśeṣu deśeṣu ramaṇīyeṣu bhāgaśaḥ 05,083.013c sarvaratnasamākīrṇāḥ sabhāś cakrur anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4944: 05,083.014a āsanāni vicitrāṇi yuktāni vividhair guṇaiḥ 05,083.014c striyo gandhān alaṃkārān sūkṣmāṇi vasanāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4945: 05,083.015a guṇavanty annapānāni bhojyāni vividhāni ca 05,083.015c mālyāni ca sugandhīni tāni rājā dadau tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4946: 05,083.016a viśeṣataś ca vāsārthaṃ sabhāṃ grāme vṛkasthale
GE07mbh_05_u:4947: 05,083.016c vidadhe kauravo rājā bahuratnāṃ manoramām 05,083.017a etad vidhāya vai sarvaṃ devārham atimānuṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:4948: 05,083.017c ācakhyau dhṛtarāṣṭrāya rājā duryodhanas tadā 05,083.018a tāḥ sabhāḥ keśavaḥ sarvā ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4949: 05,083.018c asamīkṣyaiva dāśārha upāyāt kurusadma tat 05,084.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,084.001a upaplavyād iha kṣattar upayāto janārdanaḥ 05,084.001c vṛkasthale nivasati sa ca prātar iheṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4952: 05,084.003a sphītasya vṛṣṇivaṃśasya bhartā goptā ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4953: 05,084.003c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ bhagavān prapitāmahaḥ 05,084.004a vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ sumanaso yasya prajñām upāsate 05,084.004c ādityā vasavo rudrā yathā buddhiṃ bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4954: 05,084.005a tasmai pūjāṃ prayokṣyāmi dāśārhāya mahātmane 05,084.005c pratyakṣaṃ tava dharmajña tan me kathayataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_05_u:4956: 05,084.006c caturyuktān rathāṃs tasmai raukmān dāsyāmi ṣoḍaśa
GE07mbh_05_u:4958: 05,084.007c aṣṭānucaram ekaikam aṣṭau dāsyāmi keśave 05,084.008a dāsīnām aprajātānāṃ śubhānāṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:4959: 05,084.008c śatam asmai pradāsyāmi dāsānām api tāvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4960: 05,084.009a āvikaṃ bahu susparśaṃ pārvatīyair upāhṛtam 05,084.009c tad apy asmai pradāsyāmi sahasrāṇi daśāṣṭa ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4962: 05,084.010c tāny apy asmai pradāsyāmi yāvad arhati keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4963: 05,084.011a divā rātrau ca bhāty eṣa sutejā vimalo maṇiḥ 05,084.011c tam apy asmai pradāsyāmi tam apy arhati keśavaḥ 05,084.012a ekenāpi pataty ahnā yojanāni caturdaśa 05,084.012c yānam aśvatarīyuktaṃ dāsye tasmai tad apy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:4964: 05,084.013a yāvanti vāhanāny asya yāvantaḥ puruṣāś ca te
GE07mbh_05_u:4965: 05,084.013c tato 'ṣṭaguṇam apy asmai bhojyaṃ dāsyāmy ahaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:4966: 05,084.014a mama putrāś ca pautrāś ca sarve duryodhanād ṛte 05,084.014c pratyudyāsyanti dāśārhaṃ rathair mṛṣṭair alaṃkṛtāḥ 05,084.015a svalaṃkṛtāś ca kalyāṇyaḥ pādair eva sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4968: 05,084.016a nagarād api yāḥ kāś cid gamiṣyanti janārdanam
GE07mbh_05_u:4969: 05,084.016c draṣṭuṃ kanyāś ca kalyāṇyas tāś ca yāsyanty anāvṛtāḥ 05,084.017a sastrīpuruṣabālaṃ hi nagaraṃ madhusūdanam
GE07mbh_05_u:4970: 05,084.017c udīkṣate mahātmānaṃ bhānumantam iva prajāḥ 05,084.018a mahādhvajapatākāś ca kriyantāṃ sarvatodiśam
GE07mbh_05_u:4971: 05,084.018c jalāvasikto virajāḥ panthās tasyeti cānvaśāt 05,084.019a duḥśāsanasya ca gṛhaṃ duryodhanagṛhād varam 05,084.019c tad asya kriyatāṃ kṣipraṃ susaṃmṛṣṭam alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:4972: 05,084.020a etad dhi rucirākāraiḥ prāsādair upaśobhitam 05,084.020c śivaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca sarvartu sumahādhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:4973: 05,084.021a sarvam asmin gṛhe ratnaṃ mama duryodhanasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4974: 05,084.021c yad yad arhet sa vārṣṇeyas tat tad deyam asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:4975: 05,085.001 vidura uvāca 05,085.001a rājan bahumataś cāsi trailokyasyāpi sattamaḥ 05,085.001c saṃbhāvitaś ca lokasya saṃmataś cāsi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4976: 05,085.002a yat tvam evaṃgate brūyāḥ paścime vayasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4977: 05,085.002c śāstrād vā supratarkād vā susthiraḥ sthaviro hy asi 05,085.003a lekhāśmanīva bhāḥ sūrye mahormir iva sāgare
GE07mbh_05_u:4978: 05,085.003c dharmas tvayi mahān rājann iti vyavasitāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4979: 05,085.004a sadaiva bhāvito loko guṇaughais tava pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:4980: 05,085.004c guṇānāṃ rakṣaṇe nityaṃ prayatasva sabāndhavaḥ 05,085.005a ārjavaṃ pratipadyasva mā bālyād bahudhā naśīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4981: 05,085.005c rājyaṃ putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca suhṛdaś cāpi supriyān 05,085.006a yat tvaṃ ditsasi kṛṣṇāya rājann atithaye bahu
GE07mbh_05_u:4982: 05,085.006c etad anyac ca dāśārhaḥ pṛthivīm api cārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:4983: 05,085.007a na tu tvaṃ dharmam uddiśya tasya vā priyakāraṇāt 05,085.007c etad icchasi kṛṣṇāya satyenātmānam ālabhe 05,085.008a māyaiṣātattvam evaitac chadmaitad bhūridakṣiṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:4984: 05,085.008c jānāmi te mataṃ rājan gūḍhaṃ bāhyena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:4985: 05,085.009a pañca pañcaiva lipsanti grāmakān pāṇḍavā nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:4986: 05,085.009c na ca ditsasi tebhyas tāṃs tac chamaṃ kaḥ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4987: 05,085.010a arthena tu mahābāhuṃ vārṣṇeyaṃ tvaṃ jihīrṣasi
GE07mbh_05_u:4989: 05,085.011a na ca vittena śakyo 'sau nodyamena na garhayā
GE07mbh_05_u:4990: 05,085.011c anyo dhanaṃjayāt kartum etat tattvaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:4991: 05,085.012a veda kṛṣṇasya māhātmyaṃ vedāsya dṛḍhabhaktitām 05,085.012c atyājyam asya jānāmi prāṇais tulyaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:4992: 05,085.013a anyat kumbhād apāṃ pūrṇād anyat pādāvasecanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:4994: 05,085.014a yat tv asya priyam ātithyaṃ mānārhasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4995: 05,085.014c tad asmai kriyatāṃ rājan mānārho hi janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4996: 05,085.015a āśaṃsamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ kurūn abhyeti keśavaḥ 05,085.015c yenaiva rājann arthena tad evāsmā upākuru
GE07mbh_05_u:4997: 05,085.016a śamam icchati dāśārhas tava duryodhanasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4998: 05,085.016c pāṇḍavānāṃ ca rājendra tad asya vacanaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:4999: 05,085.017a pitāsi rājan putrās te vṛddhas tvaṃ śiśavaḥ pare 05,085.017c vartasva pitṛvat teṣu vartante te hi putravat
GE07mbh_05_u:5000: 05,085.017d*0392_01 nirvairān matsyapāñcālān pāṇḍavān kurubhiḥ saha 05,085.017d*0392_02 kṛtvā sukhaṃ yathādharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca samavāpnuhi
GE07mbh_05_u:5001: 05,086.001 duryodhana uvāca 05,086.001a yad āha viduraḥ kṛṣṇe sarvaṃ tat satyam ucyate 05,086.001c anurakto hy asaṃhāryaḥ pārthān prati janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5002: 05,086.002a yat tu satkārasaṃyuktaṃ deyaṃ vasu janārdane
GE07mbh_05_u:5003: 05,086.002c anekarūpaṃ rājendra na tad deyaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:5004: 05,086.003a deśaḥ kālas tathāyukto na hi nārhati keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5005: 05,086.003c maṃsyaty adhokṣajo rājan bhayād arcati mām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:5006: 05,086.004a avamānaś ca yatra syāt kṣatriyasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:5007: 05,086.004c na tat kuryād budhaḥ kāryam iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5008: 05,086.005a sa hi pūjyatamo devaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kamalalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5009: 05,086.005c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ viditaṃ mama sarvathā
GE07mbh_05_u:5010: 05,086.006a na tu tasmin pradeyaṃ syāt tathā kāryagatiḥ prabho 05,086.006c vigrahaḥ samupārabdho na hi śāmyaty avigrahāt
GE07mbh_05_u:5011: 05,086.007 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,086.007a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhīṣmaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5012: 05,086.007c vaicitravīryaṃ rājānam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 05,086.008a satkṛto 'satkṛto vāpi na krudhyeta janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5014: 05,086.009a yat tu kāryaṃ mahābāho manasā kāryatāṃ gatam
GE07mbh_05_u:5015: 05,086.009c sarvopāyair na tac chakyaṃ kena cit kartum anyathā 05,086.010a sa yad brūyān mahābāhus tat kāryam aviśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_05_u:5016: 05,086.010c vāsudevena tīrthena kṣipraṃ saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ 05,086.011a dharmyam arthyaṃ sa dharmātmā dhruvaṃ vaktā janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5017: 05,086.011c tasmin vācyāḥ priyā vāco bhavatā bāndhavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:5018: 05,086.012 duryodhana uvāca 05,086.012a na paryāyo 'sti yad rājañ śriyaṃ niṣkevalām aham 05,086.012c taiḥ sahemām upāśnīyāṃ jīvañ jīvaiḥ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_05_u:5019: 05,086.013a idaṃ tu sumahat kāryaṃ śṛṇu me yat samarthitam 05,086.013b*0393_01 na bhedasyāntaraṃ dātuṃ prayāṇāyāsya vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5021: 05,086.014a tasmin baddhe bhaviṣyanti vṛṣṇayaḥ pṛthivī tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:5022: 05,086.014c pāṇḍavāś ca vidheyā me sa ca prātar iheṣyati 05,086.015a atropāyaṃ yathā samyaṅ na budhyeta janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5023: 05,086.015c na cāpāyo bhavet kaś cit tad bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_05_u:5024: 05,086.016 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,086.016a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā ghoraṃ kṛṣṇābhisaṃhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:5027: 05,086.017c maivaṃ vocaḥ prajāpāla naiṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5028: 05,086.018a dūtaś ca hi hṛṣīkeśaḥ saṃbandhī ca priyaś ca naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5029: 05,086.018c apāpaḥ kauraveyeṣu kathaṃ bandhanam arhati 05,086.019 bhīṣma uvāca 05,086.019a parīto dhṛtarāṣṭrāyaṃ tava putraḥ sumandadhīḥ 05,086.019c vṛṇoty anarthaṃ na tv arthaṃ yācyamānaḥ suhṛdgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5030: 05,086.020a imam utpathi vartantaṃ pāpaṃ pāpānubandhinam 05,086.020c vākyāni suhṛdāṃ hitvā tvam apy asyānuvartase
GE07mbh_05_u:5032: 05,086.021c tava putraḥ sahāmātyaḥ kṣaṇena na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:5035: 05,086.023 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,086.023a ity uktvā bharataśreṣṭho vṛddhaḥ paramamanyumān 05,086.023c utthāya tasmāt prātiṣṭhad bhīṣmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 05,087.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,087.001a prātar utthāya kṛṣṇas tu kṛtavān sarvam āhnikam
GE07mbh_05_u:5036: 05,087.001c brāhmaṇair abhyanujñātaḥ prayayau nagaraṃ prati 05,087.002a taṃ prayāntaṃ mahābāhum anujñāpya tato nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:5038: 05,087.002d*0394_01 prayayau puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ kurūṇāṃ sadanaṃ prati 05,087.002d*0394_02 ācakramuś ca panthānaṃ grasamānā ivāmbaram 05,087.002d*0394_03 dārukeṇa pracoditā hayās tasya mahātmanaḥ 05,087.002d*0394_04 annāni śayyā vāsāṃsi tathā ratnāni sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5039: 05,087.002d*0394_05 duryodhanena kṛṣṇārthaṃ pathi saṃvihitaṃ bahu 05,087.002d*0394_06 tāḥ sabhāḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo ratnāni ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5041: 05,087.003a dhārtarāṣṭrās tam āyāntaṃ pratyujjagmuḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ 05,087.003c duryodhanam ṛte sarve bhīṣmadroṇakṛpādayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5042: 05,087.004a paurāś ca bahulā rājan hṛṣīkeśaṃ didṛkṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5043: 05,087.004c yānair bahuvidhair anye padbhir eva tathāpare
GE07mbh_05_u:5044: 05,087.005a sa vai pathi samāgamya bhīṣmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā 05,087.005c droṇena dhārtarāṣṭraiś ca tair vṛto nagaraṃ yayau
GE07mbh_05_u:5047: 05,087.007a na sma kaś cid gṛhe rājaṃs tad āsīd bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:5048: 05,087.007c na strī na vṛddho na śiśur vāsudevadidṛkṣayā
GE07mbh_05_u:5049: 05,087.008a rājamārge narā na sma saṃbhavanty avaniṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5050: 05,087.008c tathā hi sumahad rājan hṛṣīkeśapraveśane 05,087.009a āvṛtāni varastrībhir gṛhāṇi sumahānty api 05,087.009c pracalantīva bhāreṇa dṛśyante sma mahītale 05,087.010a tathā ca gatimantas te vāsudevasya vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5052: 05,087.011a sa gṛhaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya prāviśac chatrukarśanaḥ 05,087.011c pāṇḍuraṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ prāsādair upaśobhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:5053: 05,087.012a tisraḥ kakṣyā vyatikramya keśavo rājaveśmanaḥ 05,087.012c vaicitravīryaṃ rājānam abhyagacchad ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5056: 05,087.014a kṛpaś ca somadattaś ca mahārājaś ca bāhlikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5058: 05,087.015a tato rājānam āsādya dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ yaśasvinam 05,087.015c sa bhīṣmaṃ pūjayām āsa vārṣṇeyo vāgbhir añjasā
GE07mbh_05_u:5059: 05,087.015d*0395_01 te svadharmān akurvanta saṃpūjya madhusūdanam 05,087.016a teṣu dharmānupūrvīṃ tāṃ prayujya madhusūdanaḥ 05,087.016c yathāvayaḥ samīyāya rājabhis tatra mādhavaḥ 05,087.017a atha droṇaṃ saputraṃ sa bāhlīkaṃ ca yaśasvinam
GE07mbh_05_u:5060: 05,087.017c kṛpaṃ ca somadattaṃ ca samīyāya janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5061: 05,087.018a tatrāsīd ūrjitaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ kāñcanaṃ mahad āsanam
GE07mbh_05_u:5063: 05,087.019a atha gāṃ madhuparkaṃ cāpy udakaṃ ca janārdane
GE07mbh_05_u:5065: 05,087.020a kṛtātithyas tu govindaḥ sarvān parihasan kurūn
GE07mbh_05_u:5066: 05,087.020c āste saṃbandhakaṃ kurvan kurubhiḥ parivāritaḥ 05,087.021a so 'rcito dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa pūjitaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5068: 05,087.022a taiḥ sametya yathānyāyaṃ kurubhiḥ kurusaṃsadi 05,087.022c vidurāvasathaṃ ramyam upātiṣṭhata mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5070: 05,087.023c arcayām āsa dāśārhaṃ sarvakāmair upasthitam 05,087.023d*0396_01 yā prītiḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa
GE07mbh_05_u:5071: 05,087.024a kṛtātithyaṃ tu govindaṃ viduraḥ sarvadharmavit 05,087.024c kuśalaṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇām apṛcchan madhusūdanam

GE07mbh_05_u:5490: 05,093.025a etān eva purodhāya satkṛtya ca yathā purā

GE07mbh_05_u:5492: 05,093.027a tair evopārjitāṃ bhūmiṃ bhokṣyase ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:5493: 05,093.027c yadi saṃpatsyase putraiḥ sahāmātyair narādhipa 05,093.028a saṃyuge vai mahārāja dṛśyate sumahān kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5494: 05,093.028c kṣaye cobhayato rājan kaṃ dharmam anupaśyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:5495: 05,093.029a pāṇḍavair nihataiḥ saṃkhye putrair vāpi mahābalaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5496: 05,093.029c yad vindethāḥ sukhaṃ rājaṃs tad brūhi bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:5497: 05,093.030a śūrāś ca hi kṛtāstrāś ca sarve yuddhābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5498: 05,093.030c pāṇḍavās tāvakāś caiva tān rakṣa mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:5499: 05,093.031a na paśyema kurūn sarvān pāṇḍavāṃś caiva saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:5500: 05,093.031c kṣīṇān ubhayataḥ śūrān rathebhyo rathibhir hatān
GE07mbh_05_u:5501: 05,093.032a samavetāḥ pṛthivyāṃ hi rājāno rājasattama 05,093.032c amarṣavaśam āpannā nāśayeyur imāḥ prajāḥ 05,093.033a trāhi rājann imaṃ lokaṃ na naśyeyur imāḥ prajāḥ 05,093.033c tvayi prakṛtim āpanne śeṣaṃ syāt kurunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:5502: 05,093.034a śuklā vadānyā hrīmanta āryāḥ puṇyābhijātayaḥ 05,093.034c anyonyasacivā rājaṃs tān pāhi mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:5504: 05,093.035c saha bhuktvā ca pītvā ca pratiyāntu yathāgṛham
GE07mbh_05_u:5505: 05,093.036a suvāsasaḥ sragviṇaś ca satkṛtya bharatarṣabha 05,093.036c amarṣāṃś ca nirākṛtya vairāṇi ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:5506: 05,093.037a hārdaṃ yat pāṇḍaveṣv āsīt prāpte 'sminn āyuṣaḥ kṣaye 05,093.037c tad eva te bhavatv adya śaśvac ca bharatarṣabha 05,093.038a bālā vihīnāḥ pitrā te tvayaiva parivardhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5507: 05,093.038c tān pālaya yathānyāyaṃ putrāṃś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:5508: 05,093.039a bhavataiva hi rakṣyās te vyasaneṣu viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5509: 05,093.039c mā te dharmas tathaivārtho naśyeta bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:5510: 05,093.040a āhus tvāṃ pāṇḍavā rājann abhivādya prasādya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:5511: 05,093.040c bhavataḥ śāsanād duḥkham anubhūtaṃ sahānugaiḥ 05,093.041a dvādaśemāni varṣāṇi vane nirvyuṣitāni naḥ 05,093.041c trayodaśaṃ tathājñātaiḥ sajane parivatsaram
GE07mbh_05_u:5512: 05,093.042a sthātā naḥ samaye tasmin piteti kṛtaniścayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5513: 05,093.042c nāhāsma samayaṃ tāta tac ca no brāhmaṇā viduḥ 05,093.043a tasmin naḥ samaye tiṣṭha sthitānāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:5514: 05,093.043c nityaṃ saṃkleśitā rājan svarājyāṃśaṃ labhemahi 05,093.044a tvaṃ dharmam arthaṃ yuñjānaḥ samyaṅ nas trātum arhasi 05,093.044c gurutvaṃ bhavati prekṣya bahūn kleśāṃs titikṣmahe
GE07mbh_05_u:5515: 05,093.045a sa bhavān mātṛpitṛvad asmāsu pratipadyatām 05,093.045c guror garīyasī vṛttir yā ca śiṣyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:5516: 05,093.045d*0428_01 vartāmahe tvayi ca tāṃ tvaṃ ca vartasva nas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:5517: 05,093.046a pitrā sthāpayitavyā hi vayam utpatham āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5518: 05,093.046c saṃsthāpaya pathiṣv asmāṃs tiṣṭha rājan svavartmani
GE07mbh_05_u:5519: 05,093.047a āhuś cemāṃ pariṣadaṃ putrās te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:5520: 05,093.047c dharmajñeṣu sabhāsatsu neha yuktam asāṃpratam 05,093.048a yatra dharmo hy adharmeṇa satyaṃ yatrānṛtena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:5521: 05,093.048c hanyate prekṣamāṇānāṃ hatās tatra sabhāsadaḥ 05,093.049a viddho dharmo hy adharmeṇa sabhāṃ yatra prapadyate
GE07mbh_05_u:5522: 05,093.049c na cāsya śalyaṃ kṛntanti viddhās tatra sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5523: 05,093.049e dharma etān ārujati yathā nady anukūlajān
GE07mbh_05_u:5524: 05,093.050a ye dharmam anupaśyantas tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate
GE07mbh_05_u:5525: 05,093.050c te satyam āhur dharmaṃ ca nyāyyaṃ ca bharatarṣabha 05,093.051a śakyaṃ kim anyad vaktuṃ te dānād anyaj janeśvara 05,093.051c bruvantu vā mahīpālāḥ sabhāyāṃ ye samāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:5526: 05,093.051e dharmārthau saṃpradhāryaiva yadi satyaṃ bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:5528: 05,093.052c praśāmya bharataśreṣṭha mā manyuvaśam anvagāḥ 05,093.053a pitryaṃ tebhyaḥ pradāyāṃśaṃ pāṇḍavebhyo yathocitam 05,093.053c tataḥ saputraḥ siddhārtho bhuṅkṣva bhogān paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:5529: 05,093.054a ajātaśatruṃ jānīṣe sthitaṃ dharme satāṃ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:5530: 05,093.054c saputre tvayi vṛttiṃ ca vartate yāṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:5531: 05,093.055a dāhitaś ca nirastaś ca tvām evopāśritaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5533: 05,093.056a sa tatra nivasan sarvān vaśam ānīya pārthivān
GE07mbh_05_u:5534: 05,093.056c tvanmukhān akarod rājan na ca tvām atyavartata
GE07mbh_05_u:5536: 05,093.057c rāṣṭrāṇi dhanadhānyaṃ ca prayuktaḥ paramopadhiḥ 05,093.058a sa tām avasthāṃ saṃprāpya kṛṣṇāṃ prekṣya sabhāgatām
GE07mbh_05_u:5538: 05,093.059a ahaṃ tu tava teṣāṃ ca śreya icchāmi bhārata 05,093.059c dharmād arthāt sukhāc caiva mā rājan nīnaśaḥ prajāḥ 05,093.060a anartham arthaṃ manvānā arthaṃ vānartham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5540: 05,093.061a sthitāḥ śuśrūṣituṃ pārthāḥ sthitā yoddhum ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5541: 05,093.061c yat te pathyatamaṃ rājaṃs tasmiṃs tiṣṭha paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:5542: 05,093.062a tad vākyaṃ pārthivāḥ sarve hṛdayaiḥ samapūjayan
GE07mbh_05_u:5543: 05,093.062c na tatra kaś cid vaktuṃ hi vācaṃ prākrāmad agrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5544: 05,094.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,094.001a tasminn abhihite vākye keśavena mahātmanā 05,094.001c stimitā hṛṣṭaromāṇa āsan sarve sabhāsadaḥ 05,094.002a kaḥ svid uttaram etasmād vaktum utsahate pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:5545: 05,094.002c iti sarve manobhis te cintayanti sma pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5546: 05,094.003a tathā teṣu ca sarveṣu tūṣṇīṃbhūteṣu rājasu
GE07mbh_05_u:5547: 05,094.003c jāmadagnya idaṃ vākyam abravīt kurusaṃsadi 05,094.004a imām ekopamāṃ rājañ śṛṇu satyām aśaṅkitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5548: 05,094.004c tāṃ śrutvā śreya ādatsva yadi sādhv iti manyase 05,094.005a rājā dambhodbhavo nāma sārvabhaumaḥ purābhavat 05,094.005c akhilāṃ bubhuje sarvāṃ pṛthivīm iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:5549: 05,094.006a sa sma nityaṃ niśāpāye prātar utthāya vīryavān
GE07mbh_05_u:5550: 05,094.006c brāhmaṇān kṣatriyāṃś caiva pṛcchann āste mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5551: 05,094.007a asti kaś cid viśiṣṭo vā madvidho vā bhaved yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:5552: 05,094.007c śūdro vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyo vā brāhmaṇo vāpi śastrabhṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:5553: 05,094.008a iti bruvann anvacarat sa rājā pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:5554: 05,094.008c darpeṇa mahatā mattaḥ kaṃ cid anyam acintayan
GE07mbh_05_u:5555: 05,094.009a taṃ sma vaidyā akṛpaṇā brāhmaṇāḥ sarvato 'bhayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5556: 05,094.009c pratyaṣedhanta rājānaṃ ślāghamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ 05,094.010a pratiṣidhyamāno 'py asakṛt pṛcchaty eva sa vai dvijān
GE07mbh_05_u:5557: 05,094.010c abhimānī śriyā mattas tam ūcur brāhmaṇās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:5562: 05,094.012c tayos tvaṃ na samo rājan bhavitāsi kadā cana 05,094.013a evam uktaḥ sa rājā tu punaḥ papraccha tān dvijān
GE07mbh_05_u:5563: 05,094.013c kva tau vīrau kvajanmānau kiṃkarmāṇau ca kau ca tau
GE07mbh_05_u:5564: 05,094.014 brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ 05,094.014a naro nārāyaṇaś caiva tāpasāv iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:5565: 05,094.014c āyātau mānuṣe loke tābhyāṃ yudhyasva pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:5566: 05,094.015a śrūyate tau mahātmānau naranārāyaṇāv ubhau 05,094.015c tapo ghoram anirdeśyaṃ tapyete gandhamādane 05,094.016 rāma uvāca 05,094.016a sa rājā mahatīṃ senāṃ yojayitvā ṣaḍaṅginīm
GE07mbh_05_u:5567: 05,094.016c amṛṣyamāṇaḥ saṃprāyād yatra tāv aparājitau 05,094.017a sa gatvā viṣamaṃ ghoraṃ parvataṃ gandhamādanam
GE07mbh_05_u:5569: 05,094.018a tau dṛṣṭvā kṣutpipāsābhyāṃ kṛśau dhamanisaṃtatau 05,094.018c śītavātātapaiś caiva karśitau puruṣottamau
GE07mbh_05_u:5571: 05,094.019a tam arcitvā mūlaphalair āsanenodakena ca 05,094.019c nyamantrayetāṃ rājānaṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:5572: 05,094.019d*0430_01 tatas tām ānupūrvīṃ sa punar evānvakīrtayat

GE07mbh_05_u:5575: 05,094.020e ātithyaṃ dīyatām etat kāṅkṣitaṃ me ciraṃ prati

GE07mbh_05_u:5578: 05,094.022 rāma uvāca 05,094.022a ucyamānas tathāpi sma bhūya evābhyabhāṣata 05,094.022c punaḥ punaḥ kṣamyamāṇaḥ sāntvyamānaś ca bhārata

GE07mbh_05_u:5581: 05,094.023c abravīd ehi yudhyasva yuddhakāmuka kṣatriya 05,094.024a sarvaśastrāṇi cādatsva yojayasva ca vāhinīm 05,094.024c ahaṃ hi te vineṣyāmi yuddhaśraddhām itaḥ param
GE07mbh_05_u:5582: 05,094.024d*0431_01 saṃnahyasva ca varmāṇi yāni cānyāni santi te
GE07mbh_05_u:5583: 05,094.024d*0431_02 yad āhvayasi darpeṇa brāhmaṇapramukhāñ janān 05,094.025 dambhodbhava uvāca 05,094.025a yady etad astram asmāsu yuktaṃ tāpasa manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:5584: 05,094.025c etenāpi tvayā yotsye yuddhārthī hy aham āgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5585: 05,094.026 rāma uvāca 05,094.026a ity uktvā śaravarṣeṇa sarvataḥ samavākirat 05,094.026c dambhodbhavas tāpasaṃ taṃ jighāṃsuḥ sahasainikaḥ 05,094.027a tasya tān asyato ghorān iṣūn paratanucchidaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5586: 05,094.027c kadarthīkṛtya sa munir iṣīkābhir apānudat 05,094.028a tato 'smai prāsṛjad ghoram aiṣīkam aparājitaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:5588: 05,094.029c nimittavedhī sa munir iṣīkābhiḥ samarpayat 05,094.030a sa dṛṣṭvā śvetam ākāśam iṣīkābhiḥ samācitam
GE07mbh_05_u:5589: 05,094.030c pādayor nyapatad rājā svasti me 'stv iti cābravīt 05,094.031a tam abravīn naro rājañ śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇaiṣiṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:5590: 05,094.031c brahmaṇyo bhava dharmātmā mā ca smaivaṃ punaḥ kṛthāḥ 05,094.031d*0432_01 naitādṛk puruṣo rājan kṣatradharmam anusmaran 05,094.031d*0432_02 manasā nṛpaśārdūla bhavet purapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5591: 05,094.032a mā ca darpasamāviṣṭaḥ kṣepsīḥ kāṃś cit kadā cana 05,094.032c alpīyāṃsaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ vā tat te rājan paraṃ hitam 05,094.033a kṛtaprajño vītalobho nirahaṃkāra ātmavān
GE07mbh_05_u:5592: 05,094.033c dāntaḥ kṣānto mṛduḥ kṣemaḥ prajāḥ pālaya pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:5593: 05,094.033d*0433_01 mā sma bhūyaḥ kṣipeḥ kaṃ cid aviditvā balābalam 05,094.034a anujñātaḥ svasti gaccha maivaṃ bhūyaḥ samācareḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5594: 05,094.034c kuśalaṃ brāhmaṇān pṛccher āvayor vacanād bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:5595: 05,094.035a tato rājā tayoḥ pādāv abhivādya mahātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5596: 05,094.035c pratyājagāma svapuraṃ dharmaṃ caivācinod bhṛśam 05,094.036a sumahac cāpi tat karma yan nareṇa kṛtaṃ purā 05,094.036c tato guṇaiḥ subahubhiḥ śreṣṭho nārāyaṇo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_05_u:5597: 05,094.037a tasmād yāvad dhanuḥśreṣṭhe gāṇḍīve 'straṃ na yujyate 05,094.037c tāvat tvaṃ mānam utsṛjya gaccha rājan dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:5598: 05,094.038a kākudīkaṃ śukaṃ nākam akṣisaṃtarjanaṃ tathā 05,094.038c saṃtānaṃ nartanaṃ ghoram āsyamodakam aṣṭamam 05,094.039a etair viddhāḥ sarva eva maraṇaṃ yānti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5599: 05,094.039b*0434_01 kāmakrodhau lobhamohau madamānau tathaiva ca 05,094.039b*0434_02 mātsaryāhaṃkṛtī caiva kramād eta udāhṛtāḥ 05,094.039c unmattāś ca viceṣṭante naṣṭasaṃjñā vicetasaḥ 05,094.040a svapante ca plavante ca chardayanti ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5600: 05,094.040c mūtrayante ca satataṃ rudanti ca hasanti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:5601: 05,094.041a asaṃkhyeyā guṇāḥ pārthe tadviśiṣṭo janārdanaḥ 05,094.041c tvam eva bhūyo jānāsi kuntīputraṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:5602: 05,094.042a naranārāyaṇau yau tau tāv evārjunakeśavau 05,094.042c vijānīhi mahārāja pravīrau
GE07mbh_05_u:5604: 05,094.042d*0435_02 yasya nārāyaṇo bandhur arjuno duḥsaho yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:5605: 05,094.042d*0435_03 kas tam utsahate jetuṃ triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:5606: 05,094.042d*0435_04 vīraṃ kapidhvajaṃ jiṣṇuṃ yasya nāsti samo yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:5607: 05,094.043a yady etad evaṃ jānāsi na ca mām atiśaṅkase 05,094.043c āryāṃ matiṃ samāsthāya śāmya bhārata pāṇḍavaiḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:5612: 05,095.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,095.001a jāmadagnyavacaḥ śrutvā kaṇvo 'pi bhagavān ṛṣiḥ 05,095.001c duryodhanam idaṃ vākyam abravīt kurusaṃsadi 05,095.002a akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ 05,095.002c tathaiva bhagavantau tau naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī 05,095.003a ādityānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ viṣṇur ekaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5613: 05,095.003c ajayyaś cāvyayaś caiva śāśvataḥ prabhur īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5614: 05,095.004a nimittamaraṇās tv anye candrasūryau mahī jalam
GE07mbh_05_u:5615: 05,095.004c vāyur agnis tathākāśaṃ grahās tārāgaṇās tathā
