GE07mbh_05_u:5617: 05,095.005c kṣayaṃ gacchanti vai sarve sṛjyante ca punaḥ punaḥ 05,095.006a muhūrtamaraṇās tv anye mānuṣā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ 05,095.006c tiryagyonyaś ca ye cānye jīvalokacarāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5618: 05,095.007a bhūyiṣṭhena tu rājānaḥ śriyaṃ bhuktvāyuṣaḥ kṣaye
GE07mbh_05_u:5620: 05,095.008a sa bhavān dharmaputreṇa śamaṃ kartum ihārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:5621: 05,095.008c pāṇḍavāḥ kuravaś caiva pālayantu vasuṃdharām 05,095.009a balavān aham ity eva na mantavyaṃ suyodhana

GE07mbh_05_u:5925: 05,104.013c sthitaḥ sthāṇur ivābhyāśe niśceṣṭo mārutāśanaḥ 05,104.014a tasya śuśrūṣaṇe yatnam akarod gālavo muniḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5926: 05,104.014c gauravād bahumānāc ca hārdena priyakāmyayā 05,104.015a atha varṣaśate pūrṇe dharmaḥ punar upāgamat
GE07mbh_05_u:5927: 05,104.015c vāsiṣṭhaṃ veṣam āsthāya kauśikaṃ bhojanepsayā 05,104.016a sa dṛṣṭvā śirasā bhaktaṃ dhriyamāṇaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:5929: 05,104.017a pratigṛhya tato dharmas tathaivoṣṇaṃ tathā navam
GE07mbh_05_u:5930: 05,104.017c bhuktvā prīto 'smi viprarṣe tam uktvā sa munir gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5932: 05,104.018c dharmasya vacanāt prīto viśvāmitras tadābhavat 05,104.019a viśvāmitras tu śiṣyasya gālavasya tapasvinaḥ 05,104.019c śuśrūṣayā ca bhaktyā ca prītimān ity uvāca tam 05,104.019e anujñāto mayā vatsa yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:5933: 05,104.020a ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ gālavo munisattamam 05,104.020c prīto madhurayā vācā viśvāmitraṃ mahādyutim 05,104.021a dakṣiṇāṃ kāṃ prayacchāmi bhavate gurukarmaṇi 05,104.021c dakṣiṇābhir upetaṃ hi karma sidhyati mānavam
GE07mbh_05_u:5934: 05,104.022a dakṣiṇānāṃ hi sṛṣṭānām apavargeṇa bhujyate 05,104.022c svarge kratuphalaṃ sadbhir dakṣiṇā śāntir ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:5935: 05,104.022e kim āharāmi gurvarthaṃ bravītu bhagavān iti
GE07mbh_05_u:5936: 05,104.023a jānamānas tu bhagavāñ jitaḥ śuśrūṣaṇena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:5937: 05,104.023c viśvāmitras tam asakṛd gaccha gacchety acodayat
GE07mbh_05_u:5938: 05,104.024a asakṛd gaccha gaccheti viśvāmitreṇa bhāṣitaḥ 05,104.024c kiṃ dadānīti bahuśo gālavaḥ pratyabhāṣata 05,104.025a nirbandhatas tu bahuśo gālavasya tapasvinaḥ 05,104.025c kiṃ cid āgatasaṃrambho viśvāmitro 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_05_u:5939: 05,104.026a ekataḥśyāmakarṇānāṃ śatāny aṣṭau dadasva me 05,104.026c hayānāṃ candraśubhrāṇāṃ gaccha gālava māciram 05,105.001 nārada uvāca 05,105.001a evam uktas tadā tena viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_05_u:5940: 05,105.001c nāste na śete nāhāraṃ kurute gālavas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:5943: 05,105.002d*0450_01 gālavo duḥkhito duḥkhād vilalāpa suyodhana 05,105.003a kutaḥ puṣṭāni mitrāṇi kuto 'rthāḥ saṃcayaḥ kutaḥ 05,105.003c hayānāṃ candraśubhrāṇāṃ śatāny aṣṭau kuto mama
GE07mbh_05_u:5944: 05,105.004a kuto me bhojanaśraddhā sukhaśraddhā kutaś ca me
GE07mbh_05_u:5945: 05,105.004c śraddhā me jīvitasyāpi chinnā kiṃ jīvitena me
GE07mbh_05_u:5946: 05,105.005a ahaṃ pāraṃ samudrasya pṛthivyā vā paraṃ parāt
GE07mbh_05_u:5947: 05,105.005c gatvātmānaṃ vimuñcāmi kiṃ phalaṃ jīvitena me
GE07mbh_05_u:5949: 05,105.006c ṛṇaṃ dhārayamāṇasya kutaḥ sukham anīhayā 05,105.007a suhṛdāṃ hi dhanaṃ bhuktvā kṛtvā praṇayam īpsitam
GE07mbh_05_u:5950: 05,105.007c pratikartum aśaktasya jīvitān maraṇaṃ varam 05,105.008a pratiśrutya kariṣyeti kartavyaṃ tad akurvataḥ 05,105.008c mithyāvacanadagdhasya iṣṭāpūrtaṃ praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_05_u:5951: 05,105.009a na rūpam anṛtasyāsti nānṛtasyāsti saṃtatiḥ 05,105.009c nānṛtasyādhipatyaṃ ca kuta eva gatiḥ śubhā
GE07mbh_05_u:5952: 05,105.010a kutaḥ kṛtaghnasya yaśaḥ kutaḥ sthānaṃ kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:5953: 05,105.010c aśraddheyaḥ kṛtaghno hi kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5954: 05,105.011a na jīvaty adhanaḥ pāpaḥ kutaḥ pāpasya tantraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:5955: 05,105.011c pāpo dhruvam avāpnoti vināśaṃ nāśayan kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:5956: 05,105.012a so 'haṃ pāpaḥ kṛtaghnaś ca kṛpaṇaś cānṛto 'pi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:5957: 05,105.012c guror yaḥ kṛtakāryaḥ saṃs tat karomi na bhāṣitam 05,105.012e so 'haṃ prāṇān vimokṣyāmi kṛtvā yatnam anuttamam 05,105.013a arthanā na mayā kā cit kṛtapūrvā divaukasām
GE07mbh_05_u:5958: 05,105.013c mānayanti ca māṃ sarve tridaśā yajñasaṃstare
GE07mbh_05_u:5959: 05,105.014a ahaṃ tu vibudhaśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ tribhuvaneśvaram 05,105.014c viṣṇuṃ gacchāmy ahaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ gatiṃ gatimatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:5960: 05,105.015a bhogā yasmāt pratiṣṭhante vyāpya sarvān surāsurān
GE07mbh_05_u:5961: 05,105.015c prayato draṣṭum icchāmi mahāyoginam avyayam 05,105.016a evam ukte sakhā tasya garuḍo vinatātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5962: 05,105.016c darśayām āsa taṃ prāha saṃhṛṣṭaḥ priyakāmyayā
GE07mbh_05_u:5963: 05,105.017a suhṛd bhavān mama mataḥ suhṛdāṃ ca mataḥ suhṛt 05,105.017c īpsitenābhilāṣeṇa yoktavyo vibhave sati
GE07mbh_05_u:5964: 05,105.018a vibhavaś cāsti me vipra vāsavāvarajo dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:5965: 05,105.018c pūrvam uktas tvadarthaṃ ca kṛtaḥ kāmaś ca tena me
GE07mbh_05_u:5966: 05,105.019a sa bhavān etu gacchāva nayiṣye tvāṃ yathāsukham
GE07mbh_05_u:5967: 05,105.019c deśaṃ pāraṃ pṛthivyā vā gaccha gālava māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:5968: 05,106.001 suparṇa uvāca 05,106.001a anuśiṣṭo 'smi devena gālavājñātayoninā 05,106.001c brūhi kām anusaṃyāmi draṣṭuṃ prathamato diśam
GE07mbh_05_u:5969: 05,106.002a pūrvāṃ vā dakṣiṇāṃ vāham atha vā paścimāṃ diśam 05,106.002c uttarāṃ vā dvijaśreṣṭha kuto gacchāmi gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:5971: 05,106.003c savitā yatra saṃdhyāyāṃ sādhyānāṃ vartate tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5972: 05,106.004a yasyāṃ pūrvaṃ matir jātā yayā vyāptam idaṃ jagat 05,106.004c cakṣuṣī yatra dharmasya yatra caiṣa pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5973: 05,106.005a hutaṃ yatomukhair havyaṃ sarpate sarvatodiśam 05,106.005c etad dvāraṃ dvijaśreṣṭha divasasya tathādhvanaḥ 05,106.006a yatra pūrvaṃ prasūtā vai dākṣāyaṇyaḥ prajāḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5974: 05,106.006c yasyāṃ diśi pravṛddhāś ca kaśyapasyātmasaṃbhavāḥ 05,106.007a yatomūlā surāṇāṃ śrīr yatra śakro 'bhyaṣicyata
GE07mbh_05_u:5975: 05,106.007c surarājyena viprarṣe devaiś cātra tapaś citam
GE07mbh_05_u:5976: 05,106.008a etasmāt kāraṇād brahman pūrvety eṣā dig ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:5977: 05,106.008c yasmāt pūrvatare kāle pūrvam eṣāvṛtā suraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5978: 05,106.009a ata eva ca pūrveṣāṃ pūrvām āśām avekṣatām
GE07mbh_05_u:5979: 05,106.009c pūrvakāryāṇi kāryāṇi daivāni sukham īpsatā 05,106.010a atra vedāñ jagau pūrvaṃ bhagavāṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5981: 05,106.011a atra dattāni sūryeṇa yajūṃṣi dvijasattama 05,106.011c atra labdhavaraiḥ somaḥ suraiḥ kratuṣu pīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:5982: 05,106.012a atra tṛptā hutavahāḥ svāṃ yonim upabhuñjate
GE07mbh_05_u:5983: 05,106.012c atra pātālam āśritya varuṇaḥ śriyam āpa ca
GE07mbh_05_u:5984: 05,106.013a atra pūrvaṃ vasiṣṭhasya paurāṇasya dvijarṣabha 05,106.013c sūtiś caiva pratiṣṭhā ca nidhanaṃ ca prakāśate
GE07mbh_05_u:5985: 05,106.014a oṃkārasyātra jāyante sūtayo daśatīr daśa 05,106.014c pibanti munayo yatra havirdhāne sma somapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5986: 05,106.015a prokṣitā yatra bahavo varāhādyā mṛgā vane
GE07mbh_05_u:5987: 05,106.015c śakreṇa yatra bhāgārthe daivateṣu prakalpitāḥ 05,106.016a atrāhitāḥ kṛtaghnāś ca mānuṣāś cāsurāś ca ye
GE07mbh_05_u:5988: 05,106.016c udayaṃs tān hi sarvān vai krodhād dhanti vibhāvasuḥ 05,106.017a etad dvāraṃ trilokasya svargasya ca sukhasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:5989: 05,106.017c eṣa pūrvo diśābhāgo viśāvainaṃ yadīcchasi 05,106.018a priyaṃ kāryaṃ hi me tasya yasyāsmi vacane sthitaḥ 05,106.018c brūhi gālava yāsyāmi śṛṇu cāpy aparāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_05_u:5990: 05,107.001 suparṇa uvāca 05,107.001a iyaṃ vivasvatā pūrvaṃ śrautena vidhinā kila
GE07mbh_05_u:5991: 05,107.001c gurave dakṣiṇā dattā dakṣiṇety ucyate 'tha dik
GE07mbh_05_u:5993: 05,107.002c atroṣmapānāṃ devānāṃ nivāsaḥ śrūyate dvija 05,107.003a atra viśve sadā devāḥ pitṛbhiḥ sārdham āsate
GE07mbh_05_u:5994: 05,107.003c ijyamānāḥ sma lokeṣu saṃprāptās tulyabhāgatām 05,107.004a etad dvitīyaṃ dharmasya dvāram ācakṣate dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:5995: 05,107.004c truṭiśo lavaśaś cātra gaṇyate kālaniścayaḥ 05,107.005a atra devarṣayo nityaṃ pitṛlokarṣayas tathā 05,107.005c tathā rājarṣayaḥ sarve nivasanti gatavyathāḥ 05,107.006a atra dharmaś ca satyaṃ ca karma cātra niśāmyate 05,107.006c gatir eṣā dvijaśreṣṭha karmaṇātmāvasādinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5996: 05,107.007a eṣā dik sā dvijaśreṣṭha yāṃ sarvaḥ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_05_u:5997: 05,107.007c vṛtā tv anavabodhena sukhaṃ tena na gamyate
GE07mbh_05_u:5998: 05,107.008a nairṛtānāṃ sahasrāṇi bahūny atra dvijarṣabha 05,107.008c sṛṣṭāni pratikūlāni draṣṭavyāny akṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6000: 05,107.009c gandharvā gānti gāthā vai cittabuddhiharā dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:6001: 05,107.010a atra sāmāni gāthābhiḥ śrutvā gītāni raivataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6002: 05,107.010c gatadāro gatāmātyo gatarājyo vanaṃ gataḥ 05,107.011a atra sāvarṇinā caiva yavakrītātmajena ca 05,107.011c maryādā sthāpitā brahman yāṃ sūryo nātivartate
GE07mbh_05_u:6005: 05,107.013a atra vṛttena vṛtro 'pi śakraśatrutvam īyivān 05,107.013c atra sarvāsavaḥ prāptāḥ punar gacchanti pañcadhā
GE07mbh_05_u:6006: 05,107.014a atra duṣkṛtakarmāṇo narāḥ pacyanti gālava 05,107.014c atra vaitaraṇī nāma nadī vitaraṇair vṛtā
GE07mbh_05_u:6007: 05,107.014e atra gatvā sukhasyāntaṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ prapadyate 05,107.015a atrāvṛtto dinakaraḥ kṣarate surasaṃ payaḥ 05,107.015c kāṣṭhāṃ cāsādya dhāniṣṭhāṃ himam utsṛjate punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6008: 05,107.016a atrāhaṃ gālava purā kṣudhārtaḥ paricintayan 05,107.016c labdhavān yudhyamānau dvau bṛhantau gajakacchapau 05,107.017a atra śakradhanur nāma sūryāj jāto mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6009: 05,107.017c vidur yaṃ kapilaṃ devaṃ yenāttāḥ sagarātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6010: 05,107.018a atra siddhāḥ śivā nāma brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6011: 05,107.018c adhītya sakhilān vedān ālabhante yamakṣayam 05,107.019a atra bhogavatī nāma purī vāsukipālitā 05,107.019c takṣakeṇa ca nāgena tathaivairāvatena ca 05,107.020a atra niryāṇakāleṣu tamaḥ saṃprāpyate mahat 05,107.020c abhedyaṃ bhāskareṇāpi svayaṃ vā kṛṣṇavartmanā 05,107.021a eṣa tasyāpi te mārgaḥ paritāpasya gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:6012: 05,107.021c brūhi me yadi gantavyaṃ pratīcīṃ śṛṇu vā mama 05,108.001 suparṇa uvāca 05,108.001a iyaṃ dig dayitā rājño varuṇasya tu gopateḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6013: 05,108.001c sadā salilarājasya pratiṣṭhā cādir eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:6014: 05,108.002a atra paścād ahaḥ sūryo visarjayati bhāḥ svayam
GE07mbh_05_u:6015: 05,108.002c paścimety abhivikhyātā dig iyaṃ dvijasattama 05,108.003a yādasām atra rājyena salilasya ca guptaye
GE07mbh_05_u:6016: 05,108.003c kaśyapo bhagavān devo varuṇaṃ smābhyaṣecayat 05,108.004a atra pītvā samastān vai varuṇasya rasāṃs tu ṣaṭ 05,108.004c jāyate taruṇaḥ somaḥ śuklasyādau tamisrahā 05,108.005a atra paścāt kṛtā daityā vāyunā saṃyatās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:6017: 05,108.005c niḥśvasanto mahānāgair arditāḥ suṣupur dvija 05,108.006a atra sūryaṃ praṇayinaṃ pratigṛhṇāti parvataḥ 05,108.006c asto nāma yataḥ saṃdhyā paścimā pratisarpati
GE07mbh_05_u:6018: 05,108.007a ato rātriś ca nidrā ca nirgatā divasakṣaye
GE07mbh_05_u:6019: 05,108.007c jāyate jīvalokasya hartum ardham ivāyuṣaḥ 05,108.008a atra devīṃ ditiṃ suptām ātmaprasavadhāriṇīm 05,108.008c vigarbhām akaroc chakro yatra jāto marudgaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6020: 05,108.009a atra mūlaṃ himavato mandaraṃ yāti śāśvatam
GE07mbh_05_u:6023: 05,108.010c udadhes tīram āsādya surabhiḥ kṣarate payaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6024: 05,108.011a atra madhye samudrasya kabandhaḥ pratidṛśyate 05,108.011c svarbhānoḥ sūryakalpasya somasūryau jighāṃsataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6027: 05,108.013a atra dhvajavatī nāma kumārī harimedhasaḥ 05,108.013c ākāśe tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti tasthau sūryasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:6028: 05,108.014a atra vāyus tathā vahnir āpaḥ khaṃ caiva gālava 05,108.014c āhnikaṃ caiva naiśaṃ ca duḥkhasparśaṃ vimuñcati
GE07mbh_05_u:6029: 05,108.014e ataḥ prabhṛti sūryasya tiryag āvartate gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6030: 05,108.015a atra jyotīṃṣi sarvāṇi viśanty ādityamaṇḍalam 05,108.015c aṣṭāviṃśatirātraṃ ca caṅkramya saha bhānunā 05,108.015e niṣpatanti punaḥ sūryāt somasaṃyogayogataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6031: 05,108.016a atra nityaṃ sravantīnāṃ prabhavaḥ sāgarodayaḥ 05,108.016c atra lokatrayasyāpas tiṣṭhanti varuṇāśrayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6036: 05,108.019a eṣa te paścimo mārgo digdvāreṇa prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6037: 05,108.019c brūhi gālava gacchāvo buddhiḥ kā dvijasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:6038: 05,108.019d*0451_01 diktrayaṃ te śrutaṃ brahmañ śṛṇu cāpy uttarāṃ diśam 05,109.001 suparṇa uvāca 05,109.001a yasmād uttāryate pāpād yasmān niḥśreyaso 'śnute
GE07mbh_05_u:6039: 05,109.001c tasmād uttāraṇaphalād uttarety ucyate budhaiḥ 05,109.002a uttarasya hiraṇyasya parivāpasya gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:6040: 05,109.002c mārgaḥ paścimapūrvābhyāṃ digbhyāṃ vai madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6041: 05,109.003a asyāṃ diśi variṣṭhāyām uttarāyāṃ dvijarṣabha 05,109.003c nāsaumyo nāvidheyātmā nādharmyo vasate janaḥ 05,109.004a atra nārāyaṇaḥ kṛṣṇo jiṣṇuś caiva narottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6042: 05,109.004c badaryām āśramapade tathā brahmā ca śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6043: 05,109.005a atra vai himavatpṛṣṭhe nityam āste maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6045: 05,109.005b*0452_02 na sa dṛśyo munigaṇais tathā devaiḥ savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6048: 05,109.005b*0452_05 sahasraśirasaḥ śrīmān ekaḥ paśyati māyayā 05,109.005c atra rājyena viprāṇāṃ candramāś cābhyaṣicyata 05,109.006a atra gaṅgāṃ mahādevaḥ patantīṃ gaganāc cyutām
GE07mbh_05_u:6049: 05,109.006c pratigṛhya dadau loke mānuṣe brahmavittama 05,109.007a atra devyā tapas taptaṃ maheśvaraparīpsayā 05,109.007c atra kāmaś ca roṣaś ca śailaś comā ca saṃbabhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6050: 05,109.008a atra rākṣasayakṣāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ ca gālava 05,109.008c ādhipatyena kailāse dhanado 'py abhiṣecitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6051: 05,109.009a atra caitrarathaṃ ramyam atra vaikhānasāśramaḥ 05,109.009c atra mandākinī caiva mandaraś ca dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:6053: 05,109.010c śāḍvalaṃ kadalīskandham atra saṃtānakā nagāḥ 05,109.011a atra saṃyamanityānāṃ siddhānāṃ svairacāriṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:6055: 05,109.012a atra te ṛṣayaḥ sapta devī cārundhatī tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:6056: 05,109.012c atra tiṣṭhati vai svātir atrāsyā udayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6057: 05,109.013a atra yajñaṃ samāruhya dhruvaṃ sthātā pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6058: 05,109.013c jyotīṃṣi candrasūryau ca parivartanti nityaśaḥ 05,109.014a atra gāyantikādvāraṃ rakṣanti dvijasattamāḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:6524: 05,122.038d*0474_01 amitro nātikartavyo nātideyaḥ kadā cana 05,122.038d*0474_02 jīvitaṃ hy api duḥkhārtā na tyajanti kadā cana 05,122.039a na tasya hi matiṃ chindyād yasya necchet parābhavam 05,122.039c avicchinnasya dhīrasya kalyāṇe dhīyate matiḥ 05,122.040a tyaktātmānaṃ na bādheta triṣu lokeṣu bhārata

GE07mbh_05_u:6536: 05,122.047c ayaṃ bhīṣmas tathā droṇaḥ karṇaś cāyaṃ tathā kṛpaḥ 05,122.048a bhūriśravāḥ saumadattir aśvatthāmā jayadrathaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:6553: 05,123.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,123.001a tataḥ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmo duryodhanam amarṣaṇam 05,123.001c keśavasya vacaḥ śrutvā provāca bharatarṣabha 05,123.002a kṛṣṇena vākyam ukto 'si suhṛdāṃ śamam icchatā

GE07mbh_05_u:6564: 05,123.009c amarṣavaśam āpannaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ 05,123.010a dharmārthayuktaṃ vacanam āha tvāṃ tāta keśavaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:6581: 05,123.023c ādatsva śivam atyantaṃ yogakṣemavad avyayam 05,123.024a anena hi sahāyena kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇā

GE07mbh_05_u:6583: 05,123.027a śamaṃ ced yācamānaṃ tvaṃ pratyākhyāsyasi keśavam

GE07mbh_05_u:6603: 05,124.014c upaviṣṭasya pṛṣṭhaṃ te pāṇinā parimārjatu 05,124.015a śālaskandho mahābāhus tvāṃ svajāno vṛkodaraḥ 05,124.015c sāmnābhivadatāṃ cāpi śāntaye bharatarṣabha

GE07mbh_05_u:6609: 05,125.002a prasamīkṣya bhavān etad vaktum arhati keśava

GE07mbh_05_u:6621: 05,125.009c ajeyā jayatāṃ śreṣṭha pārthāḥ pravrājitā vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:6623: 05,125.010c aśaktāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇa prahṛṣṭāḥ pratyamitravat 05,125.011a kim asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ teṣāṃ kasmin vā punar āgasi 05,125.011c dhārtarāṣṭrāñ jighāṃsanti pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ saha 05,125.012a na cāpi vayam ugreṇa karmaṇā vacanena vā
GE07mbh_05_u:6624: 05,125.012c vitrastāḥ praṇamāmeha bhayād api śatakratoḥ 05,125.013a na ca taṃ kṛṣṇa paśyāmi kṣatradharmam anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:6625: 05,125.013c utsaheta yudhā jetuṃ yo naḥ śatrunibarhaṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:6626: 05,125.014a na hi bhīṣmakṛpadroṇāḥ sagaṇā madhusūdana 05,125.014c devair api yudhā jetuṃ śakyāḥ kim uta pāṇḍavaiḥ 05,125.015a svadharmam anutiṣṭhanto yadi mādhava saṃyuge 05,125.015c śastreṇa nidhanaṃ kāle prāpsyāmaḥ svargam eva tat
GE07mbh_05_u:6627: 05,125.016a mukhyaś caivaiṣa no dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:6628: 05,125.016c yac chayīmahi saṃgrāme śaratalpagatā vayam 05,125.017a te vayaṃ vīraśayanaṃ prāpsyāmo yadi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:6629: 05,125.017c apraṇamyaiva śatrūṇāṃ na nas tapsyati mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:6630: 05,125.018a kaś ca jātu kule jātaḥ kṣatradharmeṇa vartayan
GE07mbh_05_u:6631: 05,125.018c bhayād vṛttiṃ samīkṣyaivaṃ praṇamed iha kasya cit
GE07mbh_05_u:6632: 05,125.019a udyacched eva na named udyamo hy eva pauruṣam 05,125.019c apy aparvaṇi bhajyeta na named iha kasya cit 05,125.020a iti mātaṅgavacanaṃ parīpsanti hitepsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6633: 05,125.020c dharmāya caiva praṇamed brāhmaṇebhyaś ca madvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6634: 05,125.021a acintayan kaṃ cid anyaṃ yāvajjīvaṃ tathācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:6635: 05,125.021c eṣa dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ matam etac ca me sadā 05,125.022a rājyāṃśaś cābhyanujñāto yo me pitrā purābhavat
GE07mbh_05_u:6636: 05,125.022c na sa labhyaḥ punar jātu mayi jīvati keśava 05,125.023a yāvac ca rājā dhriyate dhṛtarāṣṭro janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:6637: 05,125.023c nyastaśastrā vayaṃ te vāpy upajīvāma mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:6638: 05,125.024a yady adeyaṃ purā dattaṃ rājyaṃ paravato mama
GE07mbh_05_u:6639: 05,125.024c ajñānād vā bhayād vāpi mayi bāle janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:6640: 05,125.025a na tad adya punar labhyaṃ pāṇḍavair vṛṣṇinandana
GE07mbh_05_u:6641: 05,125.025c dhriyamāṇe mahābāho mayi saṃprati keśava 05,125.026a yāvad dhi sūcyās tīkṣṇāyā vidhyed agreṇa mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:6642: 05,125.026c tāvad apy aparityājyaṃ bhūmer naḥ pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:6643: 05,126.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,126.001a tataḥ prahasya dāśārhaḥ krodhaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6644: 05,126.001c duryodhanam idaṃ vākyam abravīt kurusaṃsadi 05,126.002a lapsyase vīraśayanaṃ kāmam etad avāpsyasi 05,126.002c sthiro bhava sahāmātyo vimardo bhavitā mahān
GE07mbh_05_u:6645: 05,126.003a yac caivaṃ manyase mūḍha na me kaś cid vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6646: 05,126.003c pāṇḍaveṣv iti tat sarvaṃ nibodhata narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6648: 05,126.004c tvayā durmantritaṃ dyūtaṃ saubalena ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:6649: 05,126.005a kathaṃ ca jñātayas tāta śreyāṃsaḥ sādhusaṃmatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6652: 05,126.006c asatāṃ tatra jāyante bhedāś ca vyasanāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:6653: 05,126.007a tad idaṃ vyasanaṃ ghoraṃ tvayā dyūtamukhaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:6655: 05,126.008a kaś cānyo jñātibhāryāṃ vai viprakartuṃ tathārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:6656: 05,126.008c ānīya ca sabhāṃ vaktuṃ yathoktā draupadī tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:6658: 05,126.009c mahiṣī pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ tathā vinikṛtā tvayā 05,126.010a jānanti kuravaḥ sarve yathoktāḥ kurusaṃsadi 05,126.010c duḥśāsanena kaunteyāḥ pravrajantaḥ paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6660: 05,126.011c sveṣu bandhuṣu kaḥ sādhuś cared evam asāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:6661: 05,126.012a nṛśaṃsānām anāryāṇāṃ paruṣāṇāṃ ca bhāṣaṇam 05,126.012c karṇaduḥśāsanābhyāṃ ca tvayā ca bahuśaḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:6662: 05,126.013a saha mātrā pradagdhuṃ tān bālakān vāraṇāvate
GE07mbh_05_u:6663: 05,126.013c āsthitaḥ paramaṃ yatnaṃ na samṛddhaṃ ca tat tava 05,126.014a ūṣuś ca suciraṃ kālaṃ pracchannāḥ pāṇḍavās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:6665: 05,126.015a viṣeṇa sarpabandhaiś ca yatitāḥ pāṇḍavās tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:6666: 05,126.015c sarvopāyair vināśāya na samṛddhaṃ ca tat tava
GE07mbh_05_u:6667: 05,126.015d*0478_01 evaṃvṛttaḥ kathaṃ rājye sthātum arhasi pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:6668: 05,126.015d*0478_02 sa rājyāc ca sukhāc caiva hāsyase kulapāṃsana
GE07mbh_05_u:6669: 05,126.016a evaṃbuddhiḥ pāṇḍaveṣu mithyāvṛttiḥ sadā bhavān 05,126.016c kathaṃ te nāparādho 'sti pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu 05,126.016d*0479_01 yac caibhyo yācamānebhyaḥ pitryam aṃśaṃ na ditsasi
GE07mbh_05_u:6670: 05,126.016d*0479_02 tac ca pāpa pradātāsi bhraṣṭaiśvaryo nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6671: 05,126.017a kṛtvā bahūny akāryāṇi pāṇḍaveṣu nṛśaṃsavat 05,126.017c mithyāvṛttir anāryaḥ sann adya vipratipadyase 05,126.018a mātāpitṛbhyāṃ bhīṣmeṇa droṇena vidureṇa ca 05,126.018c śāmyeti muhur ukto 'si na ca śāmyasi pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:6672: 05,126.019a śame hi sumahān arthas tava pārthasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6673: 05,126.019c na ca rocayase rājan kim anyad buddhilāghavāt
GE07mbh_05_u:6674: 05,126.020a na śarma prāpsyase rājann utkramya suhṛdāṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6675: 05,126.020c adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca kriyate pārthiva tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:6676: 05,126.021a evaṃ bruvati dāśārhe duryodhanam amarṣaṇam 05,126.021c duḥśāsana idaṃ vākyam abravīt kurusaṃsadi 05,126.022a na cet saṃdhāsyase rājan svena kāmena pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6677: 05,126.022c baddhvā kila tvāṃ dāsyanti kuntīputrāya kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6678: 05,126.023a vaikartanaṃ tvāṃ ca māṃ ca trīn etān manujarṣabha 05,126.023c pāṇḍavebhyaḥ pradāsyanti bhīṣmo droṇaḥ pitā ca te
GE07mbh_05_u:6679: 05,126.024a bhrātur etad vacaḥ śrutvā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6680: 05,126.024c kruddhaḥ prātiṣṭhatotthāya mahānāga iva śvasan 05,126.025a viduraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca mahārājaṃ ca bāhlikam
GE07mbh_05_u:6681: 05,126.025c kṛpaṃ ca somadattaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ janārdanam
GE07mbh_05_u:6682: 05,126.026a sarvān etān anādṛtya durmatir nirapatrapaḥ 05,126.026c aśiṣṭavad amaryādo mānī
GE07mbh_05_u:6683: 05,126.027a taṃ prasthitam abhiprekṣya bhrātaro manujarṣabham 05,126.027c anujagmuḥ sahāmātyā rājānaś cāpi sarvaśaḥ 05,126.028a sabhāyām utthitaṃ kruddhaṃ prasthitaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:6686: 05,126.029c hasanti vyasane tasya durhṛdo nacirād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:6689: 05,126.031a kālapakvam idaṃ manye sarvakṣatraṃ janārdana 05,126.031c sarve hy anusṛtā mohāt pārthivāḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6690: 05,126.032a bhīṣmasyātha vacaḥ śrutvā dāśārhaḥ puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ 05,126.032c bhīṣmadroṇamukhān sarvān abhyabhāṣata vīryavān
GE07mbh_05_u:6691: 05,126.033a sarveṣāṃ kuruvṛddhānāṃ mahān ayam atikramaḥ 05,126.033c prasahya mandam aiśvarye na niyacchata yan nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:6692: 05,126.034a tatra kāryam ahaṃ manye prāptakālam ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6693: 05,126.034c kriyamāṇe bhavec chreyas tat sarvaṃ śṛṇutānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6694: 05,126.035a pratyakṣam etad bhavatāṃ yad vakṣyāmi hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6695: 05,126.035c bhavatām ānukūlyena yadi roceta bhāratāḥ 05,126.036a bhojarājasya vṛddhasya durācāro hy anātmavān 05,126.036c jīvataḥ pitur aiśvaryaṃ hṛtvā manyuvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6696: 05,126.037a ugrasenasutaḥ kaṃsaḥ parityaktaḥ sa bāndhavaiḥ 05,126.037c jñātīnāṃ hitakāmena mayā śasto mahāmṛdhe 05,126.038a āhukaḥ punar asmābhir jñātibhiś cāpi satkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6698: 05,126.039a kaṃsam ekaṃ parityajya kulārthe sarvayādavāḥ 05,126.039c saṃbhūya sukham edhante
GE07mbh_05_u:6699: 05,126.040a api cāpy avadad rājan parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6700: 05,126.040c vyūḍhe devāsure yuddhe 'bhyudyateṣv āyudheṣu ca 05,126.041a dvaidhībhūteṣu lokeṣu vinaśyatsu ca bhārata 05,126.041c abravīt sṛṣṭimān devo bhagavāṃl lokabhāvanaḥ 05,126.042a parābhaviṣyanty asurā daiteyā dānavaiḥ saha 05,126.042c ādityā vasavo rudrā bhaviṣyanti divaukasaḥ 05,126.043a devāsuramanuṣyāś ca gandharvoragarākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6701: 05,126.043c asmin yuddhe susaṃyattā haniṣyanti parasparam 05,126.043d*0480_01 vartamānaṃ jagat sarvaṃ muhūrtān na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:6702: 05,126.043d*0480_02 anyanāśena jagato lokasya ca paraṃtapa 05,126.044a iti matvābravīd dharmaṃ parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ 05,126.044c varuṇāya prayacchaitān baddhvā daiteyadānavān
GE07mbh_05_u:6703: 05,126.045a evam uktas tato dharmo niyogāt parameṣṭhinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6704: 05,126.045c varuṇāya dadau sarvān baddhvā daiteyadānavān 05,126.046a tān baddhvā dharmapāśaiś ca svaiś ca pāśair jaleśvaraḥ 05,126.046c varuṇaḥ sāgare yatto nityaṃ rakṣati dānavān
GE07mbh_05_u:6705: 05,126.047a tathā duryodhanaṃ karṇaṃ śakuniṃ cāpi saubalam
GE07mbh_05_u:6706: 05,126.047c baddhvā duḥśāsanaṃ cāpi pāṇḍavebhyaḥ prayacchata 05,126.048a tyajet kulārthe puruṣaṃ grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_05_u:6707: 05,126.048c grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet 05,126.049a rājan duryodhanaṃ baddhvā tataḥ saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6708: 05,126.049c tvatkṛte na vinaśyeyuḥ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabha 05,127.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,127.001a kṛṣṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ 05,127.001c viduraṃ sarvadharmajñaṃ tvaramāṇo 'bhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_05_u:6709: 05,127.002a gaccha tāta mahāprājñāṃ gāndhārīṃ dīrghadarśinīm 05,127.002c ānayeha tayā sārdham anuneṣyāmi durmatim 05,127.003a yadi sāpi durātmānaṃ śamayed duṣṭacetasam 05,127.003c api kṛṣṇāya suhṛdas tiṣṭhema vacane vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:6711: 05,127.004c durbuddher duḥsahāyasya samarthaṃ bruvatī vacaḥ 05,127.005a api no vyasanaṃ ghoraṃ duryodhanakṛtaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:6713: 05,127.006a rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā viduro dīrghadarśinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:6714: 05,127.006c ānayām āsa gāndhārīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya śāsanāt 05,127.007 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca 05,127.007a eṣa gāndhāri putras te durātmā śāsanātigaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6715: 05,127.007c aiśvaryalobhād aiśvaryaṃ jīvitaṃ ca prahāsyati 05,127.008a aśiṣṭavad amaryādaḥ pāpaiḥ saha durātmabhiḥ 05,127.008c sabhāyā nirgato mūḍho vyatikramya suhṛdvacaḥ 05,127.009 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,127.009a sā bhartur vacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:6716: 05,127.009c anvicchantī mahac chreyo gāndhārī vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:6717: 05,127.010a ānayeha sutaṃ kṣipraṃ rājyakāmukam āturam 05,127.010c na hi rājyam aśiṣṭena śakyaṃ dharmārthalopinā
GE07mbh_05_u:6718: 05,127.010d*0481_01 āptum āptaṃ tathāpīdam avinītena sarvathā 05,127.011a tvaṃ hy evātra bhṛśaṃ garhyo dhṛtarāṣṭra sutapriyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6719: 05,127.011c yo jānan pāpatām asya tatprajñām anuvartase
GE07mbh_05_u:6720: 05,127.012a sa eṣa kāmamanyubhyāṃ pralabdho moham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6724: 05,127.014a kathaṃ hi svajane bhedam upekṣeta mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6725: 05,127.014c bhinnaṃ hi svajanena tvāṃ prasahiṣyanti śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6726: 05,127.015a yā hi śakyā mahārāja sāmnā dānena vā punaḥ 05,127.015c nistartum āpadaḥ sveṣu daṇḍaṃ kas tatra pātayet
GE07mbh_05_u:6728: 05,127.016c mātuś ca vacanāt kṣattā sabhāṃ prāveśayat punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6729: 05,127.017a sa mātur vacanākāṅkṣī praviveśa sabhāṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6730: 05,127.017c abhitāmrekṣaṇaḥ krodhān niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ 05,127.018a taṃ praviṣṭam abhiprekṣya putram utpatham āsthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:6731: 05,127.018c vigarhamāṇā gāndhārī samarthaṃ vākyam abravīt 05,127.019a duryodhana nibodhedaṃ vacanaṃ mama putraka 05,127.019c hitaṃ te sānubandhasya tathāyatyāṃ sukhodayam 05,127.019d*0482_01 duryodhana yad āha tvāṃ pitā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:6732: 05,127.019d*0482_02 bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ kṣattā suhṛdāṃ kuru tad vacaḥ 05,127.020a bhīṣmasya tu pituś caiva mama cāpacitiḥ kṛtā
GE07mbh_05_u:6733: 05,127.020c bhaved droṇamukhānāṃ ca suhṛdāṃ śāmyatā tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:6734: 05,127.021a na hi rājyaṃ mahāprājña svena kāmena śakyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6735: 05,127.021c avāptuṃ rakṣituṃ vāpi bhoktuṃ vā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:6736: 05,127.022a na hy avaśyendriyo rājyam aśnīyād dīrgham antaram
GE07mbh_05_u:6737: 05,127.022c vijitātmā tu medhāvī sa rājyam abhipālayet
GE07mbh_05_u:6738: 05,127.023a kāmakrodhau hi puruṣam arthebhyo vyapakarṣataḥ 05,127.023c tau tu śatrū vinirjitya rājā vijayate mahīm
GE07mbh_05_u:6739: 05,127.024a lokeśvaraprabhutvaṃ hi mahad etad durātmabhiḥ 05,127.024c rājyaṃ nāmepsitaṃ sthānaṃ na śakyam abhirakṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:6740: 05,127.025a indriyāṇi mahat prepsur niyacched arthadharmayoḥ 05,127.025c indriyair niyatair buddhir vardhate 'gnir ivendhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6741: 05,127.026a avidhyeyāni hīmāni vyāpādayitum apy alam 05,127.026c avidheyā ivādāntā hayāḥ pathi kusārathim 05,127.027a avijitya ya ātmānam amātyān vijigīṣate 05,127.027c ajitātmājitāmātyaḥ so 'vaśaḥ parihīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6742: 05,127.028a ātmānam eva prathamaṃ deśarūpeṇa yo jayet
GE07mbh_05_u:6743: 05,127.028c tato 'mātyān amitrāṃś ca na moghaṃ vijigīṣate 05,127.029a vaśyendriyaṃ jitāmātyaṃ dhṛtadaṇḍaṃ vikāriṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:6744: 05,127.029c parīkṣyakāriṇaṃ dhīram atyantaṃ śrīr niṣevate 05,127.030a kṣudrākṣeṇeva jālena jhaṣāv apihitāv ubhau 05,127.030c kāmakrodhau śarīrasthau prajñānaṃ tau vilumpataḥ 05,127.031a yābhyāṃ hi devāḥ svaryātuḥ svargasyāpidadhur mukham
GE07mbh_05_u:6746: 05,127.032a kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca dambhaṃ darpaṃ ca bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6747: 05,127.032c samyag vijetuṃ yo veda sa mahīm abhijāyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6748: 05,127.033a satataṃ nigrahe yukta indriyāṇāṃ bhaven nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6749: 05,127.033c īpsann arthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca dviṣatāṃ ca parābhavam 05,127.034a kāmābhibhūtaḥ krodhād vā yo mithyā pratipadyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6750: 05,127.034c sveṣu cānyeṣu vā tasya na sahāyā bhavanty uta 05,127.035a ekībhūtair mahāprājñaiḥ śūrair arinibarhaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6751: 05,127.035c pāṇḍavaiḥ pṛthivīṃ tāta bhokṣyase sahitaḥ sukhī
GE07mbh_05_u:6752: 05,127.036a yathā bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo droṇaś cāpi mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6753: 05,127.036c āhatus tāta tat satyam ajeyau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_05_u:6755: 05,127.037c prasanno hi sukhāya syād ubhayor eva keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6756: 05,127.038a suhṛdām arthakāmānāṃ yo na tiṣṭhati śāsane

GE07mbh_05_u:7618: 05,144.017c naivāyaṃ na paro loko vidyate pāpakarmaṇām

GE07mbh_05_u:7620: 05,144.018c balaṃ ca śaktiṃ cāsthāya na vai tvayy anṛtaṃ vade
GE07mbh_05_u:7621: 05,144.019a ānṛśaṃsyam atho vṛttaṃ rakṣan satpuruṣocitam 05,144.019c ato 'rthakaram apy etan na karomy adya te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7622: 05,144.020a na tu te 'yaṃ samārambho mayi mogho bhaviṣyati

GE07mbh_05_u:7625: 05,144.021a arjunena samaṃ yuddhaṃ mama yaudhiṣṭhire bale
GE07mbh_05_u:7626: 05,144.021c arjunaṃ hi nihatyājau saṃprāptaṃ syāt phalaṃ mayā

GE07mbh_05_u:7628: 05,144.022c nirarjunāḥ sakarṇā vā sārjunā vā hate mayi

GE07mbh_05_u:7630: 05,144.023c uvāca putram āśliṣya karṇaṃ dhairyād akampitam

GE07mbh_05_u:7637: 05,145.002c svam evāvasathaṃ śaurir viśrāmārthaṃ jagāma ha

GE07mbh_05_u:7639: 05,145.004a saṃdhyām upāsya dhyāyantas tam eva gatamānasāḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:7641: 05,145.005 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 05,145.005a tvayā nāgapuraṃ gatvā sabhāyāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrajaḥ 05,145.005c kim uktaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa tan naḥ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:7642: 05,145.006 vāsudeva uvāca 05,145.006a mayā nāgapuraṃ gatvā sabhāyāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrajaḥ 05,145.006c tathyaṃ pathyaṃ hitaṃ cokto na ca gṛhṇāti durmatiḥ 05,145.007 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca 05,145.007a tasminn utpatham āpanne kuruvṛddhaḥ pitāmahaḥ 05,145.007c kim uktavān hṛṣīkeśa duryodhanam amarṣaṇam 05,145.007e ācāryo vā mahābāho bhāradvājaḥ kim abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:7643: 05,145.007f*0534_01 pitā vā dhṛtarāṣṭras taṃ gāndhārī vā kim abravīt 05,145.008a pitā yavīyān asmākaṃ kṣattā dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7645: 05,145.009a kiṃ ca sarve nṛpatayaḥ sabhāyāṃ ye samāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:7646: 05,145.009c uktavanto yathātattvaṃ tad brūhi tvaṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7647: 05,145.010a uktavān hi bhavān sarvaṃ vacanaṃ kurumukhyayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7648: 05,145.010b*0535_01 dhārtarāṣṭrasya teṣāṃ hi vacanaṃ kurusaṃsadi 05,145.010b*0536_01 pratikūlam ayuktaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ nopasarpati 05,145.010c kāmalobhābhibhūtasya mandasya prājñamāninaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7649: 05,145.011a apriyaṃ hṛdaye mahyaṃ tan na tiṣṭhati keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:7650: 05,145.011c teṣāṃ vākyāni govinda śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:7651: 05,145.012a yathā ca nābhipadyeta kālas tāta tathā kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:7652: 05,145.012c bhavān hi no gatiḥ kṛṣṇa bhavān nātho bhavān guruḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7653: 05,145.013 vāsudeva uvāca 05,145.013a śṛṇu rājan yathā vākyam ukto rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7654: 05,145.013c madhye kurūṇāṃ rājendra sabhāyāṃ tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_05_u:7655: 05,145.014a mayā vai śrāvite vākye jahāsa dhṛtarāṣṭrajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7656: 05,145.014c atha bhīṣmaḥ susaṃkruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:7657: 05,145.015a duryodhana nibodhedaṃ kulārthe yad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:7658: 05,145.015c tac chrutvā rājaśārdūla svakulasya hitaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:7659: 05,145.016a mama tāta pitā rājañ śaṃtanur lokaviśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7660: 05,145.016c tasyāham eka evāsaṃ putraḥ putravatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7661: 05,145.017a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā dvitīyaḥ syāt kathaṃ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7662: 05,145.017c ekaputram aputraṃ vai pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ 05,145.018a na cocchedaṃ kulaṃ yāyād vistīryeta kathaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7663: 05,145.018c tasyāham īpsitaṃ buddhvā kālīṃ mātaram āvaham
GE07mbh_05_u:7664: 05,145.019a pratijñāṃ duṣkarāṃ kṛtvā pitur arthe kulasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:7665: 05,145.019c arājā cordhvaretāś ca yathā suviditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:7666: 05,145.019e pratīto nivasāmy eṣa pratijñām anupālayan 05,145.020a tasyāṃ jajñe mahābāhuḥ śrīmān kurukulodvahaḥ 05,145.020c vicitravīryo dharmātmā kanīyān mama pārthivaḥ 05,145.021a svaryāte 'haṃ pitari taṃ svarājye saṃnyaveśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:7667: 05,145.021c vicitravīryaṃ rājānaṃ bhṛtyo bhūtvā hy adhaścaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7668: 05,145.022a tasyāhaṃ sadṛśān dārān rājendra samudāvaham 05,145.022c jitvā pārthivasaṃghātam api te bahuśaḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:7669: 05,145.023a tato rāmeṇa samare dvandvayuddham upāgamam 05,145.023c sa hi rāmabhayād ebhir nāgarair vipravāsitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7670: 05,145.023e dāreṣv atiprasaktaś ca yakṣmāṇaṃ samapadyata 05,145.024a yadā tv arājake rāṣṭre na vavarṣa sureśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7671: 05,145.024c tadābhyadhāvan mām eva prajāḥ kṣudbhayapīḍitāḥ 05,145.025 prajā ūcuḥ 05,145.025a upakṣīṇāḥ prajāḥ sarvā rājā bhava bhavāya naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7672: 05,145.025c ītayo nuda bhadraṃ te śaṃtanoḥ kulavardhana
GE07mbh_05_u:7673: 05,145.026a pīḍyante te prajāḥ sarvā vyādhibhir bhṛśadāruṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7674: 05,145.026c alpāvaśiṣṭā gāṅgeya tāḥ paritrātum arhasi 05,145.027a vyādhīn praṇudya vīra tvaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālaya
GE07mbh_05_u:7675: 05,145.027c tvayi jīvati mā rāṣṭraṃ vināśam upagacchatu
GE07mbh_05_u:7676: 05,145.028 bhīṣma uvāca 05,145.028a prajānāṃ krośatīnāṃ vai naivākṣubhyata me manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7677: 05,145.028c pratijñāṃ rakṣamāṇasya sadvṛttaṃ smaratas tathā 05,145.029a tataḥ paurā mahārāja mātā kālī ca me śubhā 05,145.029c bhṛtyāḥ purohitācāryā brāhmaṇāś ca bahuśrutāḥ 05,145.029e mām ūcur bhṛśasaṃtaptā bhava rājeti saṃtatam
GE07mbh_05_u:7678: 05,145.030a pratīparakṣitaṃ rāṣṭraṃ tvāṃ prāpya vinaśiṣyati 05,145.030c sa tvam asmaddhitārthaṃ vai rājā bhava mahāmate
GE07mbh_05_u:7679: 05,145.031a ity uktaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā duḥkhito bhṛśam āturaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7680: 05,145.031c tebhyo nyavedayaṃ putra pratijñāṃ pitṛgauravāt 05,145.031e ūrdhvaretā hy arājā ca kulasyārthe punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7682: 05,145.032c nāmba śaṃtanunā jātaḥ kauravaṃ vaṃśam udvahan
GE07mbh_05_u:7683: 05,145.032e pratijñāṃ vitathāṃ kuryām iti rājan punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7684: 05,145.033a viśeṣatas tvadarthaṃ ca dhuri mā māṃ niyojaya
GE07mbh_05_u:7685: 05,145.033c ahaṃ preṣyaś ca dāsaś ca tavāmba sutavatsale
GE07mbh_05_u:7686: 05,145.034a evaṃ tām anunīyāhaṃ mātaraṃ janam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:7687: 05,145.034c ayācaṃ bhrātṛdāreṣu tadā vyāsaṃ mahāmunim 05,145.035a saha mātrā mahārāja prasādya tam ṛṣiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:7688: 05,145.035c apatyārtham ayācaṃ vai prasādaṃ kṛtavāṃś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7689: 05,145.035e trīn sa putrān ajanayat tadā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:7690: 05,145.036a andhaḥ karaṇahīneti na vai rājā pitā tava
GE07mbh_05_u:7691: 05,145.036c rājā tu pāṇḍur abhavan mahātmā lokaviśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7692: 05,145.037a sa rājā tasya te putrāḥ pitur dāyādyahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7693: 05,145.037c mā tāta kalahaṃ kārṣī rājyasyārdhaṃ pradīyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:7694: 05,145.038a mayi jīvati rājyaṃ kaḥ saṃpraśāset pumān iha
GE07mbh_05_u:7695: 05,145.038c māvamaṃsthā vaco mahyaṃ śamam icchāmi vaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:7696: 05,145.039a na viśeṣo 'sti me putra tvayi teṣu ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:7697: 05,145.039c matam etat pitus tubhyaṃ gāndhāryā vidurasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:7698: 05,145.040a śrotavyaṃ yadi vṛddhānāṃ mātiśaṅkīr vaco mama
GE07mbh_05_u:7699: 05,145.040c nāśayiṣyasi mā sarvam ātmānaṃ pṛthivīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:7700: 05,146.001 vāsudeva uvāca 05,146.001a bhīṣmeṇokte tato droṇo duryodhanam abhāṣata 05,146.001c madhye nṛpāṇāṃ bhadraṃ te vacanaṃ vacanakṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7701: 05,146.002a prātīpaḥ śaṃtanus tāta kulasyārthe yathotthitaḥ 05,146.002c tathā devavrato bhīṣmaḥ kulasyārthe sthito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_05_u:7702: 05,146.003a tataḥ pāṇḍur narapatiḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ 05,146.003c rājā kurūṇāṃ dharmātmā suvrataḥ susamāhitaḥ 05,146.004a jyeṣṭhāya rājyam adadād dhṛtarāṣṭrāya dhīmate 05,146.004c yavīyasas tathā kṣattuḥ kuruvaṃśavivardhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7703: 05,146.005a tataḥ siṃhāsane rājan sthāpayitvainam acyutam 05,146.005c vanaṃ jagāma kauravyo bhāryābhyāṃ sahito 'nagha
GE07mbh_05_u:7704: 05,146.006a nīcaiḥ sthitvā tu vidura upāste sma vinītavat
GE07mbh_05_u:7706: 05,146.007a tataḥ sarvāḥ prajās tāta dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ janeśvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:7707: 05,146.007c anvapadyanta vidhivad yathā pāṇḍuṃ narādhipam 05,146.008a visṛjya dhṛtarāṣṭrāya rājyaṃ sa vidurāya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:7708: 05,146.008c cacāra pṛthivīṃ pāṇḍuḥ sarvāṃ parapuraṃjayaḥ 05,146.009a kośasaṃjanane dāne bhṛtyānāṃ cānvavekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:7709: 05,146.009c bharaṇe caiva sarvasya viduraḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ 05,146.010a saṃdhivigrahasaṃyukto rājñaḥ saṃvāhanakriyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7713: 05,146.012a kathaṃ tasya kule jātaḥ kulabhedaṃ vyavasyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:7714: 05,146.012c saṃbhūya bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhuṅkṣva bhogāñ janādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:7715: 05,146.013a bravīmy ahaṃ na kārpaṇyān nārthahetoḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:7716: 05,146.013c bhīṣmeṇa dattam aśnāmi na tvayā rājasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:7717: 05,146.014a nāhaṃ tvatto 'bhikāṅkṣiṣye vṛttyupāyaṃ janādhipa 05,146.014c yato bhīṣmas tato droṇo yad bhīṣmas tv āha tat kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:7719: 05,146.015c samam ācāryakaṃ tāta tava teṣāṃ ca me sadā 05,146.016a aśvatthāmā yathā mahyaṃ tathā śvetahayo mama
GE07mbh_05_u:7720: 05,146.016c bahunā kiṃ pralāpena yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7722: 05,146.017c vyājahāra tato vākyaṃ viduraḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ 05,146.017e pitur vadanam anvīkṣya parivṛtya ca dharmavit
GE07mbh_05_u:7723: 05,146.018a devavrata nibodhedaṃ vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ 05,146.018c pranaṣṭaḥ kauravo vaṃśas tvayāyaṃ punar uddhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7724: 05,146.019a tan me vilapamānasya vacanaṃ samupekṣase 05,146.019c ko 'yaṃ duryodhano nāma kule 'smin kulapāṃsanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7726: 05,146.020c anāryasyākṛtajñasya lobhopahatacetasaḥ 05,146.020e atikrāmati yaḥ śāstraṃ pitur dharmārthadarśinaḥ 05,146.021a ete naśyanti kuravo duryodhanakṛtena vai 05,146.021c yathā te na praṇaśyeyur mahārāja tathā kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:7727: 05,146.022a māṃ caiva dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pūrvam eva mahādyute
GE07mbh_05_u:7728: 05,146.022c citrakāra ivālekhyaṃ kṛtvā mā sma vināśaya
GE07mbh_05_u:7729: 05,146.022e prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā yathā saṃharate tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:7731: 05,146.023c atha te 'dya matir naṣṭā vināśe pratyupasthite
GE07mbh_05_u:7732: 05,146.023e vanaṃ gaccha mayā sārdhaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa caiva ha
GE07mbh_05_u:7733: 05,146.024a baddhvā vā nikṛtiprajñaṃ dhārtarāṣṭraṃ sudurmatim 05,146.024c sādhv idaṃ rājyam adyāstu pāṇḍavair abhirakṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7734: 05,146.025a prasīda rājaśārdūla vināśo dṛśyate mahān 05,146.025c pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ cāmitatejasām 05,146.026a virarāmaivam uktvā tu viduro dīnamānasaḥ 05,146.026c pradhyāyamānaḥ sa tadā niḥśvasaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7735: 05,146.027a tato 'tha rājñaḥ subalasya putrī; dharmārthayuktaṃ kulanāśabhītā 05,146.027c duryodhanaṃ pāpamatiṃ nṛśaṃsaṃ; rājñāṃ samakṣaṃ sutam āha kopāt 05,146.028a ye pārthivā rājasabhāṃ praviṣṭā; brahmarṣayo ye ca sabhāsado
GE07mbh_05_u:7737: 05,146.028c śṛṇvantu vakṣyāmi tavāparādhaṃ; pāpasya sāmātyaparicchadasya 05,146.029a rājyaṃ kurūṇām anupūrvabhogyaṃ; kramāgato naḥ kuladharma eṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7740: 05,146.030a rājye sthito dhṛtarāṣṭro manīṣī; tasyānujo viduro dīrghadarśī
GE07mbh_05_u:7741: 05,146.030c etāv atikramya kathaṃ nṛpatvaṃ; duryodhana prārthayase 'dya
GE07mbh_05_u:7743: 05,146.031a rājā ca kṣattā ca mahānubhāvau; bhīṣme sthite paravantau
GE07mbh_05_u:7745: 05,146.031c ayaṃ tu dharmajñatayā mahātmā; na rājyakāmo nṛvaro nadījaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7746: 05,146.032a rājyaṃ tu pāṇḍor idam apradhṛṣyaṃ; tasyādya putrāḥ prabhavanti
GE07mbh_05_u:7748: 05,146.032c rājyaṃ tad etan nikhilaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ; paitāmahaṃ putrapautrānugāmi 05,146.033a yad vai brūte kurumukhyo mahātmā; devavrataḥ satyasaṃdho manīṣī
GE07mbh_05_u:7749: 05,146.033c sarvaṃ tad asmābhir ahatya dharmaṃ; grāhyaṃ svadharmaṃ paripālayadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7750: 05,146.034a anujñayā cātha mahāvratasya; brūyān nṛpo yad viduras tathaiva 05,146.034c kāryaṃ bhavet tat suhṛdbhir niyujya; dharmaṃ puraskṛtya sudīrghakālam

GE07mbh_05_u:8163: 05,154.034c tīrthayātrāṃ yayau rāmo nivartya madhusūdanam 05,155.001 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca 05,155.001a etasminn eva kāle tu bhīṣmakasya mahātmanaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:8166: 05,155.003c śiṣyaḥ kṛtsnaṃ dhanurvedaṃ catuṣpādam avāptavān 05,155.004a yo māhendraṃ dhanur lebhe tulyaṃ gāṇḍīvatejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:8167: 05,155.004c śārṅgeṇa ca mahābāhuḥ saṃmitaṃ divyam akṣayam

GE07mbh_05_u:8751: 05,164.015c gacched antaṃ sṛñjayānāṃ priyas tv asya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8752: 05,164.016a naiṣa jātu maheṣvāsaḥ pārtham akliṣṭakāriṇam 05,164.016c hanyād ācāryakaṃ dīptaṃ saṃsmṛtya guṇanirjitam 05,164.017a ślāghaty eṣa sadā vīraḥ pārthasya guṇavistaraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8755: 05,164.018c ekībhūtān api raṇe divyair astraiḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:8756: 05,164.019a pauravo rājaśārdūlas tava rājan mahārathaḥ 05,164.019c mato mama ratho vīra paravīrarathārujaḥ 05,164.020a svena sainyena sahitaḥ pratapañ śatruvāhinīm 05,164.020c pradhakṣyati sa pāñcālān kakṣaṃ kṛṣṇagatir yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:8758: 05,164.021c tava rājan ripubale kālavat pracariṣyati 05,164.022a etasya yodhā rājendra
GE07mbh_05_u:8759: 05,164.022c vicariṣyanti saṃgrāme nighnantaḥ śātravāṃs tava 05,164.023a vṛṣaseno rathāgryas te karṇaputro mahārathaḥ 05,164.023c pradhakṣyati ripūṇāṃ te balāni balināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8760: 05,164.024a jalasaṃdho mahātejā rājan rathavaras tava 05,164.024c tyakṣyate samare prāṇān māgadhaḥ paravīrahā 05,164.025a eṣa yotsyati saṃgrāme gajaskandhaviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8761: 05,164.025c rathena vā mahābāhuḥ kṣapayañ śatruvāhinīm 05,164.026a ratha eṣa mahārāja mato mama nararṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8762: 05,164.026c tvadarthe tyakṣyati prāṇān saha sainyo mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:8763: 05,164.027a eṣa vikrāntayodhī ca citrayodhī ca saṃgare
GE07mbh_05_u:8764: 05,164.027c vītabhīś cāpi te rājañ śātravaiḥ saha yotsyate
GE07mbh_05_u:8766: 05,164.028c mama rājan mato yuddhe śūro vaivasvatopamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8767: 05,164.029a na hy eṣa samaraṃ prāpya nivarteta kathaṃ cana 05,164.029c yathā satatago rājan nābhihatya parān raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:8768: 05,164.030a senāpatir mahārāja satyavāṃs te mahārathaḥ 05,164.030c raṇeṣv adbhutakarmā ca rathaḥ pararathārujaḥ 05,164.031a etasya samaraṃ dṛṣṭvā na vyathāsti kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:8769: 05,164.031c utsmayann abhyupaity eṣa parān rathapathe sthitān
GE07mbh_05_u:8770: 05,164.032a eṣa cāriṣu vikrāntaḥ karma satpuruṣocitam 05,164.032c kartā vimarde sumahat tvadarthe puruṣottamaḥ 05,164.033a alāyudho rākṣasendraḥ krūrakarmā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8771: 05,164.033c haniṣyati parān rājan pūrvavairam anusmaran 05,164.034a eṣa rākṣasasainyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ rathasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8772: 05,164.034c māyāvī dṛḍhavairaś ca samare vicariṣyati 05,164.035a prāgjyotiṣādhipo vīro bhagadattaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:8774: 05,164.036a etena yuddham abhavat purā gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ 05,164.036c divasān subahūn rājann ubhayor jayagṛddhinoḥ 05,164.037a tataḥ sakhāyaṃ gāndhāre mānayan pākaśāsanam 05,164.037c akarot saṃvidaṃ tena pāṇḍavena mahātmanā 05,164.038a eṣa yotsyati saṃgrāme gajaskandhaviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8775: 05,164.038c airāvatagato rājā devānām iva vāsavaḥ 05,165.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,165.001a acalo vṛṣakaś caiva bhrātarau sahitāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:8776: 05,165.001c rathau tava durādharṣau śatrūn vidhvaṃsayiṣyataḥ 05,165.002a balavantau naravyāghrau dṛḍhakrodhau prahāriṇau
GE07mbh_05_u:8778: 05,165.003a sakhā te dayito nityaṃ ya eṣa raṇakarkaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8779: 05,165.003c protsāhayati rājaṃs tvāṃ vigrahe pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:8780: 05,165.004a paruṣaḥ katthano nīcaḥ karṇo vaikartanas tava
GE07mbh_05_u:8781: 05,165.004c mantrī netā ca bandhuś ca mānī cātyantam ucchritaḥ 05,165.005a eṣa naiva rathaḥ pūrṇo nāpy evātiratho nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:8783: 05,165.005e kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca divyābhyāṃ viyuktaḥ satataṃ ghṛṇī
GE07mbh_05_u:8784: 05,165.006a abhiśāpāc ca rāmasya brāhmaṇasya ca bhāṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:8785: 05,165.006c karaṇānāṃ viyogāc ca tena me 'rdharatho mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8786: 05,165.006e naiṣa phalgunam āsādya punar jīvan vimokṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:8787: 05,165.007 saṃjaya uvāca 05,165.007a tato 'bravīn mahābāhur droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8788: 05,165.007c evam etad yathāttha tvaṃ na mithyāstīti kiṃ cana 05,165.008a raṇe raṇe 'timānī ca vimukhaś caiva dṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:8789: 05,165.008c ghṛṇī karṇaḥ pramādī ca tena me 'rdharatho mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8790: 05,165.009a etac chrutvā tu rādheyaḥ krodhād utphullalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8791: 05,165.009c uvāca bhīṣmaṃ rājendra tudan vāgbhiḥ pratodavat
GE07mbh_05_u:8792: 05,165.010a pitāmaha yatheṣṭaṃ māṃ vākśarair upakṛntasi 05,165.010c anāgasaṃ sadā dveṣād evam eva pade pade
GE07mbh_05_u:8793: 05,165.010e marṣayāmi ca tat sarvaṃ duryodhanakṛtena vai
GE07mbh_05_u:8794: 05,165.011a tvaṃ tu māṃ manyase 'śaktaṃ yathā kāpuruṣaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:8795: 05,165.011c bhavān ardharatho mahyaṃ mato nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8796: 05,165.012a sarvasya jagataś caiva gāṅgeya na mṛṣā vade
GE07mbh_05_u:8797: 05,165.012c kurūṇām ahito nityaṃ na ca rājāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_05_u:8798: 05,165.013a ko hi nāma samāneṣu rājasūdāttakarmasu 05,165.013c tejovadham imaṃ kuryād vibhedayiṣur āhave 05,165.013e yathā tvaṃ guṇanirdeśād aparādhaṃ cikīrṣasi 05,165.014a na hāyanair na palitair na vittair na ca bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8799: 05,165.014c mahārathatvaṃ saṃkhyātuṃ śakyaṃ kṣatrasya kaurava 05,165.015a balajyeṣṭhaṃ smṛtaṃ kṣatraṃ mantrajyeṣṭhā dvijātayaḥ 05,165.015c dhanajyeṣṭhāḥ smṛtā vaiśyāḥ śūdrās tu vayasādhikāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8800: 05,165.016a yathecchakaṃ svayaṃgrāhād rathān atirathāṃs tathā 05,165.016c kāmadveṣasamāyukto mohāt prakurute bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:8801: 05,165.017a duryodhana mahābāho sādhu samyag avekṣyatām 05,165.017c tyajyatāṃ duṣṭabhāvo 'yaṃ bhīṣmaḥ kilbiṣakṛt tava
GE07mbh_05_u:8802: 05,165.018a bhinnā hi senā nṛpate duḥsaṃdheyā bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_05_u:8803: 05,165.018c maulāpi puruṣavyāghra kim u nānā samutthitā
GE07mbh_05_u:8804: 05,165.019a eṣāṃ dvaidhaṃ samutpannaṃ yodhānāṃ yudhi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:8805: 05,165.019c tejovadho naḥ kriyate pratyakṣeṇa viśeṣataḥ 05,165.020a rathānāṃ kva ca vijñānaṃ kva ca bhīṣmo 'lpacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8807: 05,165.021a āsādya mām amogheṣuṃ gamiṣyanti diśo daśa
GE07mbh_05_u:8808: 05,165.021c pāṇḍavāḥ sahapañcālāḥ śārdūlaṃ vṛṣabhā iva 05,165.022a kva ca yuddhavimardo vā mantrāḥ suvyāhṛtāni vā
GE07mbh_05_u:8809: 05,165.022c kva ca bhīṣmo gatavayā mandātmā kālamohitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8810: 05,165.023a spardhate hi sadā nityaṃ sarveṇa jagatā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:8811: 05,165.023c na cānyaṃ puruṣaṃ kaṃ cin manyate moghadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8812: 05,165.024a śrotavyaṃ khalu vṛddhānām iti śāstranidarśanam 05,165.024c na tv evāpy ativṛddhānāṃ punar bālā hi te matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8813: 05,165.025a aham eko haniṣyāmi pāṇḍavān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8814: 05,165.025c suyuddhe rājaśārdūla yaśo bhīṣmaṃ gamiṣyati 05,165.026a kṛtaḥ senāpatis tv eṣa tvayā bhīṣmo narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:8815: 05,165.026c senāpatiṃ guṇo gantā na tu yodhān kathaṃ cana 05,165.027a nāhaṃ jīvati gāṅgeye yotsye rājan kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:8816: 05,165.027c hate tu bhīṣme yodhāsmi sarvair eva mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8817: 05,166.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,166.001a samudyato 'yaṃ bhāro me sumahān sāgaropamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8819: 05,166.002a tasminn abhyāgate kāle pratapte lomaharṣaṇe 05,166.002c mithobhedo na me kāryas tena jīvasi sūtaja
GE07mbh_05_u:8820: 05,166.003a na hy ahaṃ nādya vikramya sthaviro 'pi śiśos tava 05,166.003c yuddhaśraddhāṃ raṇe chindyāṃ jīvitasya ca sūtaja
GE07mbh_05_u:8822: 05,166.004c na me vyathābhavat kā cit tvaṃ tu me kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:8824: 05,166.005c vakṣyāmi tu tvāṃ saṃtapto nihīna kulapāṃsana
GE07mbh_05_u:8825: 05,166.006a sametaṃ pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ kāśirājñaḥ svayaṃvare 05,166.006c nirjityaikarathenaiva yat kanyās tarasā hṛtāḥ 05,166.007a īdṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi viśiṣṭānām atho punaḥ 05,166.007c mayaikena nirastāni sasainyāni raṇājire
GE07mbh_05_u:8826: 05,166.008a tvāṃ prāpya vairapuruṣaṃ kurūṇām anayo mahān
GE07mbh_05_u:8827: 05,166.008c upasthito vināśāya yatasva puruṣo bhava 05,166.009a yudhyasva pārthaṃ samare yena vispardhase saha
GE07mbh_05_u:8828: 05,166.009c drakṣyāmi tvāṃ vinirmuktam asmād yuddhāt sudurmate
GE07mbh_05_u:8829: 05,166.010 saṃjaya uvāca 05,166.010a tam uvāca tato rājā dhārtarāṣṭro mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8830: 05,166.010c mām avekṣasva gāṅgeya kāryaṃ hi mahad udyatam
GE07mbh_05_u:8831: 05,166.011a cintyatām idam evāgre mama niḥśreyasaṃ param
GE07mbh_05_u:8832: 05,166.011c ubhāv api bhavantau me mahat karma kariṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8833: 05,166.012a bhūyaś ca śrotum icchāmi pareṣāṃ rathasattamān
GE07mbh_05_u:8834: 05,166.012c ye caivātirathās tatra tathaiva rathayūthapāḥ 05,166.013a balābalam amitrāṇāṃ śrotum icchāmi kaurava 05,166.013c prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ vai idaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:8835: 05,166.014 bhīṣma uvāca 05,166.014a ete rathās te saṃkhyātās tathaivātirathā nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:8836: 05,166.014c ya cāpy ardharathā rājan pāṇḍavānām ataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_05_u:8837: 05,166.015a yadi kautūhalaṃ te 'dya pāṇḍavānāṃ bale nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:8839: 05,166.016a svayaṃ rājā rathodāraḥ pāṇḍavaḥ kuntinandanaḥ 05,166.016c agnivat samare tāta cariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8841: 05,166.017b*0567_01 na tasyāsti samo yuddhe gadayā sāyakair api
GE07mbh_05_u:8842: 05,166.017c nāgāyutabalo mānī tejasā na sa mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8843: 05,166.018a mādrīputrau tu rathinau dvāv eva puruṣarṣabhau
GE07mbh_05_u:8844: 05,166.018c aśvināv iva rūpeṇa tejasā ca samanvitau
GE07mbh_05_u:8845: 05,166.019a ete camūmukhagatāḥ smarantaḥ kleśam ātmanaḥ 05,166.019c rudravat pracariṣyanti tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8846: 05,166.020a sarva eva mahātmānaḥ śālaskandhā ivodgatāḥ 05,166.020c prādeśenādhikāḥ pumbhir anyais te ca pramāṇataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8849: 05,166.022a hrīmantaḥ puruṣavyāghrā vyāghrā iva balotkaṭāḥ 05,166.022c jave prahāre saṃmarde sarva evātimānuṣāḥ 05,166.022e sarve jitamahīpālā digjaye bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:8850: 05,166.023a na caiṣāṃ puruṣāḥ ke cid āyudhāni gadāḥ śarān 05,166.023c viṣahanti sadā kartum adhijyāny api kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:8851: 05,166.023e udyantuṃ vā gadāṃ gurvīṃ śarān vāpi prakarṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:8852: 05,166.024a jave lakṣyasya haraṇe bhojye pāṃsuvikarṣaṇe 05,166.024c bālair api bhavantas taiḥ sarva eva viśeṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8853: 05,166.025a te te sainyaṃ samāsādya vyāghrā iva balotkaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8854: 05,166.025c vidhvaṃsayiṣyanti raṇe mā sma taiḥ saha saṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8855: 05,166.026a ekaikaśas te saṃgrāme hanyuḥ sarvān mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8856: 05,166.026c pratyakṣaṃ tava rājendra rājasūye yathābhavat 05,166.027a draupadyāś ca parikleśaṃ dyūte ca paruṣā giraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8857: 05,166.027c te saṃsmarantaḥ saṃgrāme vicariṣyanti kālavat 05,166.028a lohitākṣo guḍākeśo
GE07mbh_05_u:8858: 05,166.028c ubhayoḥ senayor vīra ratho nāstīha tādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8859: 05,166.029a na hi deveṣu vā pūrvaṃ dānaveṣūrageṣu vā
GE07mbh_05_u:8860: 05,166.029c rākṣaseṣv atha yakṣeṣu nareṣu kuta eva tu
GE07mbh_05_u:8861: 05,166.030a bhūto 'tha vā bhaviṣyo vā rathaḥ kaś cin mayā śrutaḥ 05,166.030c samāyukto mahārāja yathā pārthasya dhīmataḥ 05,166.031a vāsudevaś ca saṃyantā yoddhā caiva dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8862: 05,166.031c gāṇḍīvaṃ ca dhanur divyaṃ te cāśvā vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8863: 05,166.032a abhedyaṃ kavacaṃ divyam akṣayyau ca maheṣudhī
GE07mbh_05_u:8864: 05,166.032c astragrāmaś ca māhendro raudraḥ kaubera eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:8865: 05,166.033a yāmyaś ca vāruṇaś caiva gadāś cograpradarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8866: 05,166.033c vajrādīni ca mukhyāni nānāpraharaṇāni vai 05,166.034a dānavānāṃ sahasrāṇi hiraṇyapuravāsinām
GE07mbh_05_u:8867: 05,166.034c hatāny ekarathenājau kas tasya sadṛśo rathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8868: 05,166.035a eṣa hanyād dhi saṃrambhī balavān satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8869: 05,166.035c tava senāṃ mahābāhuḥ svāṃ caiva paripālayan
GE07mbh_05_u:8870: 05,166.036a ahaṃ cainaṃ pratyudiyām ācāryo vā dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:8871: 05,166.036c na tṛtīyo 'sti rājendra senayor ubhayor api
GE07mbh_05_u:8872: 05,166.036e ya enaṃ śaravarṣāṇi varṣantam udiyād rathī
GE07mbh_05_u:8875: 05,166.037e taruṇaś ca kṛtī caiva jīrṇāv āvām ubhāv api 05,166.038 saṃjaya uvāca 05,166.038a etac chrutvā tu bhīṣmasya rājñāṃ dadhvaṃsire tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:8877: 05,166.039a manobhiḥ saha sāvegaiḥ saṃsmṛtya ca purātanam
GE07mbh_05_u:8879: 05,167.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,167.001a draupadeyā mahārāja sarve pañca mahārathāḥ 05,167.001c vairāṭir uttaraś caiva ratho mama mahān mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8881: 05,167.002c samaḥ pārthena samare vāsudevena vā bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:8882: 05,167.003a laghv astraś citrayodhī ca manasvī dṛḍhavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8883: 05,167.003c saṃsmaran vai parikleśaṃ svapitur vikramiṣyati 05,167.004a sātyakir mādhavaḥ śūro rathayūthapayūthapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8885: 05,167.005a uttamaujās tathā rājan ratho mama mahān mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8886: 05,167.005c yudhāmanyuś ca vikrānto rathodāro nararṣabhaḥ 05,167.006a eteṣāṃ bahusāhasrā rathā nāgā hayās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:8887: 05,167.006c yotsyante te tanuṃ tyaktvā kuntīputrapriyepsayā 05,167.007a pāṇḍavaiḥ saha rājendra tava senāsu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:8889: 05,167.008a ajeyau samare vṛddhau virāṭadrupadāv ubhau 05,167.008c mahārathau mahāvīryau matau me puruṣarṣabhau 05,167.009a vayovṛddhāv api tu tau kṣatradharmaparāyaṇau 05,167.009c yatiṣyete paraṃ śaktyā sthitau vīragate pathi
GE07mbh_05_u:8890: 05,167.010a saṃbandhakena rājendra tau tu vīryabalānvayāt 05,167.010c āryavṛttau maheṣvāsau snehapāśasitāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:8891: 05,167.011a kāraṇaṃ prāpya tu narāḥ sarva eva mahābhujāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8892: 05,167.011c śūrā vā kātarā vāpi bhavanti narapuṃgava
GE07mbh_05_u:8894: 05,167.012c tyaktvā prāṇān paraṃ śaktyā ghaṭitārau narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:8895: 05,167.013a pṛthag akṣauhiṇībhyāṃ tāv ubhau saṃyati dāruṇau
GE07mbh_05_u:8896: 05,167.013c saṃbandhibhāvaṃ rakṣantau mahat karma kariṣyataḥ 05,167.014a lokavīrau maheṣvāsau tyaktātmānau ca bhārata 05,167.014c pratyayaṃ parirakṣantau mahat karma kariṣyataḥ 05,168.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,168.001a pāñcālarājasya suto rājan parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8897: 05,168.001c śikhaṇḍī rathamukhyo me mataḥ pārthasya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:8898: 05,168.002a eṣa yotsyati saṃgrāme nāśayan pūrvasaṃsthitim 05,168.002c paraṃ yaśo viprathayaṃs tava senāsu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:8899: 05,168.003a etasya bahulāḥ senāḥ pāñcālāś ca prabhadrakāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8900: 05,168.003c tenāsau rathavaṃśena mahat karma kariṣyati 05,168.004a dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca senānīḥ sarvasenāsu bhārata 05,168.004c mato me 'tiratho rājan droṇaśiṣyo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8901: 05,168.005a eṣa yotsyati saṃgrāme sūdayan vai parān raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:8902: 05,168.005c bhagavān iva saṃkruddhaḥ pinākī yugasaṃkṣaye 05,168.006a etasya tadrathānīkaṃ kathayanti raṇapriyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8903: 05,168.006c bahutvāt sāgaraprakhyaṃ devānām iva saṃyuge 05,168.007a kṣatradharmā tu rājendra mato me 'rdharatho nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:8906: 05,168.008c dhṛṣṭaketur maheṣvāsaḥ saṃbandhī pāṇḍavasya ha 05,168.009a eṣa cedipatiḥ śūraḥ saha putreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:8909: 05,168.010c kṣatradevas tu rājendra pāṇḍaveṣu rathottamaḥ 05,168.010e jayantaś cāmitaujāś ca satyajic ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8911: 05,168.011c yotsyante samare tāta saṃrabdhā iva kuñjarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8912: 05,168.012a ajo bhojaś ca vikrāntau pāṇḍaveṣu mahārathau
GE07mbh_05_u:8914: 05,168.012c pāṇḍavānāṃ sahāyārthe paraṃ śaktyā yatiṣyataḥ 05,168.012e śīghrāstrau citrayoddhārau kṛtinau dṛḍhavikramau
GE07mbh_05_u:8915: 05,168.013a kekayāḥ pañca rājendra bhrātaro yuddhadurmadāḥ 05,168.013c sarva ete rathodārāḥ sarve lohitakadhvajāḥ 05,168.014a kāśikaḥ sukumāraś ca nīlo yaś cāparo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8916: 05,168.014c sūryadattaś ca śaṅkhaś ca madirāśvaś ca nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8917: 05,168.015a sarva ete rathodārāḥ sarve cāhavalakṣaṇāḥ 05,168.015c sarvāstraviduṣaḥ sarve mahātmāno matā mama 05,168.016a vārdhakṣemir mahārāja ratho mama mahān mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8918: 05,168.016c citrāyudhaś ca nṛpatir mato me rathasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8919: 05,168.016e sa hi saṃgrāmaśobhī ca bhaktaś cāpi kirīṭinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8921: 05,168.017c dvāv imau puruṣavyāghrau rathodārau matau mama
GE07mbh_05_u:8922: 05,168.018a vyāghradattaś ca rājendra candrasenaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:8923: 05,168.018c matau mama rathodārau pāṇḍavānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8924: 05,168.019a senābinduś ca rājendra krodhahantā ca nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8925: 05,168.019c yaḥ samo vāsudevena bhīmasenena cābhibhūḥ 05,168.019e sa yotsyatīha vikramya samare tava sainikaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8926: 05,168.020a māṃ droṇaṃ ca kṛpaṃ caiva yathā saṃmanyate bhavān 05,168.020c tathā sa samaraślāghī mantavyo rathasattamaḥ 05,168.021a kāśyaḥ paramaśīghrāstraḥ ślāghanīyo rathottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8927: 05,168.021c ratha ekaguṇo mahyaṃ mataḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ 05,168.022a ayaṃ ca yudhi vikrānto mantavyo 'ṣṭaguṇo rathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8930: 05,168.023c pāṇḍavānāṃ yaśaskāmaḥ paraṃ karma kariṣyati 05,168.024a anuraktaś ca śūraś ca ratho 'yam aparo mahān 05,168.024c pāṇḍyarājo mahāvīryaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8932: 05,168.025c śreṇimān kauravaśreṣṭha vasudānaś ca pārthivaḥ 05,168.025e ubhāv etāv atirathau matau mama paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:8933: 05,168.025f*0569_01 anyau virāṭasya sutau śaṅkhaśvetau mahārathau 05,168.025f*0569_02 pāṇḍavānāṃ sahāyārthe mahat karma kariṣyataḥ 05,169.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,169.001a rocamāno mahārāja pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8935: 05,169.002a purujit kuntibhojaś ca maheṣvāso mahābalaḥ 05,169.002c mātulo bhīmasenasya sa ca me 'tiratho mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8936: 05,169.003a eṣa vīro maheṣvāsaḥ kṛtī ca nipuṇaś ca ha 05,169.003c citrayodhī ca śaktaś ca mato me rathapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8937: 05,169.004a sa yotsyati hi vikramya maghavān iva dānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8938: 05,169.004c yodhāś cāsya parikhyātāḥ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ 05,169.005a bhāgineyakṛte vīraḥ sa kariṣyati saṃgare 05,169.005c sumahat karma pāṇḍūnāṃ sthitaḥ priyahite nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8941: 05,169.007a yotsyate samare tāta māyābhiḥ samarapriyaḥ 05,169.007c ye cāsya rākṣasāḥ śūrāḥ sacivā vaśavartinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8942: 05,169.008a ete cānye ca bahavo nānājanapadeśvarāḥ 05,169.008c sametāḥ pāṇḍavasyārthe vāsudevapurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8943: 05,169.009a ete prādhānyato rājan pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ 05,169.009c rathāś cātirathāś caiva ye cāpy ardharathā matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8944: 05,169.010a neṣyanti samare senāṃ bhīmāṃ yaudhiṣṭhirīṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:8946: 05,169.011a tair ahaṃ samare vīra tvām āyadbhir jayaiṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8947: 05,169.011c yotsyāmi jayam ākāṅkṣann atha vā nidhanaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:8948: 05,169.012a pārthaṃ ca vāsudevaṃ ca cakragāṇḍīvadhāriṇau 05,169.012c saṃdhyāgatāv ivārkendū sameṣye puruṣottamau
GE07mbh_05_u:8949: 05,169.013a ye caiva te rathodārāḥ pāṇḍuputrasya sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8950: 05,169.013c sahasainyān ahaṃ tāṃś ca pratīyāṃ raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_05_u:8951: 05,169.014a ete rathāś cātirathāś ca tubhyaṃ; yathāpradhānaṃ nṛpa kīrtitā
GE07mbh_05_u:8953: 05,169.014c tathā rājann ardharathāś ca ke cit; tathaiva teṣām api
GE07mbh_05_u:8955: 05,169.015a arjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca ye cānye tatra pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8956: 05,169.015c sarvān āvārayiṣyāmi yāvad drakṣyāmi bhārata 05,169.016a pāñcālyaṃ tu mahābāho nāhaṃ hanyāṃ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_05_u:8958: 05,169.017a lokas tad veda yad ahaṃ pituḥ priyacikīrṣayā
GE07mbh_05_u:8959: 05,169.017c prāptaṃ rājyaṃ parityajya brahmacarye dhṛtavrataḥ 05,169.018a citrāṅgadaṃ kauravāṇām ahaṃ rājye 'bhyaṣecayam
GE07mbh_05_u:8962: 05,169.019c naiva hanyāṃ striyaṃ jātu na strīpūrvaṃ kathaṃ cana 05,169.020a sa hi strīpūrvako rājañ śikhaṇḍī yadi te śrutaḥ 05,169.020c kanyā bhūtvā pumāñ jāto na yotsye tena bhārata 05,169.021a sarvāṃs tv anyān haniṣyāmi pārthivān bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:8963: 05,169.021c yān sameṣyāmi samare na tu kuntīsutān nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:8964: 05,170.001 duryodhana uvāca 05,170.001a kimarthaṃ bharataśreṣṭha na hanyās tvaṃ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_05_u:8965: 05,170.001c udyateṣum atho dṛṣṭvā samareṣv ātatāyinam 05,170.002a pūrvam uktvā mahābāho pāṇḍavān saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8966: 05,170.002c vadhiṣyāmīti gāṅgeya tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_05_u:8967: 05,170.003 bhīṣma uvāca 05,170.003a śṛṇu duryodhana kathāṃ sahaibhir vasudhādhipaiḥ 05,170.003c yadarthaṃ yudhi saṃprekṣya nāhaṃ hanyāṃ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_05_u:8968: 05,170.004a mahārājo mama pitā śaṃtanur bharatarṣabhaḥ 05,170.004c diṣṭāntaṃ prāpa dharmātmā samaye puruṣarṣabha 05,170.005a tato 'haṃ bharataśreṣṭha pratijñāṃ paripālayan
GE07mbh_05_u:8970: 05,170.006a tasmiṃś ca nidhanaṃ prāpte satyavatyā mate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8972: 05,170.007a mayābhiṣikto rājendra yavīyān api dharmataḥ 05,170.007c vicitravīryo dharmātmā mām eva samudaikṣata 05,170.008a tasya dārakriyāṃ tāta cikīrṣur aham apy uta
GE07mbh_05_u:8973: 05,170.008c anurūpād iva kulād iti cintya mano dadhe
GE07mbh_05_u:8974: 05,170.009a tathāśrauṣaṃ mahābāho tisraḥ kanyāḥ svayaṃvare 05,170.009c rūpeṇāpratimāḥ sarvāḥ kāśirājasutās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:8976: 05,170.010a rājānaś ca samāhūtāḥ pṛthivyāṃ bharatarṣabha 05,170.010c ambā jyeṣṭhābhavat tāsām ambikā tv atha madhyamā
GE07mbh_05_u:8977: 05,170.010e ambālikā ca rājendra rājakanyā yavīyasī 05,170.011a so 'ham ekarathenaiva gataḥ kāśipateḥ purīm
GE07mbh_05_u:8978: 05,170.011c apaśyaṃ tā mahābāho tisraḥ kanyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8979: 05,170.011e rājñaś caiva samāvṛttān pārthivān pṛthivīpate 05,170.012a tato 'haṃ tān nṛpān sarvān āhūya samare sthitān
GE07mbh_05_u:8980: 05,170.012c ratham āropayāṃ cakre kanyās tā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:8981: 05,170.013a vīryaśulkāś ca tā jñātvā samāropya rathaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:8982: 05,170.013c avocaṃ pārthivān sarvān ahaṃ tatra samāgatān
GE07mbh_05_u:8983: 05,170.013e bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ kanyā haratīti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8984: 05,170.014a te yatadhvaṃ paraṃ śaktyā sarve mokṣāya pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8985: 05,170.014c prasahya hi nayāmy eṣa miṣatāṃ vo narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8986: 05,170.015a tatas te pṛthivīpālāḥ samutpetur udāyudhāḥ 05,170.015c yogo yoga iti kruddhāḥ sārathīṃś cāpy acodayan
GE07mbh_05_u:8987: 05,170.016a te rathair meghasaṃkāśair gajaiś ca gajayodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8988: 05,170.016c pṛṣṭhyaiś cāśvair mahīpālāḥ samutpetur udāyudhāḥ 05,170.017a tatas te māṃ mahīpālāḥ sarva eva viśāṃ pate 05,170.017c rathavrātena mahatā sarvataḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_05_u:8989: 05,170.018a tān ahaṃ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā pratyavārayam 05,170.018c sarvān nṛpāṃś cāpy ajayaṃ devarāḍ iva dānavān
GE07mbh_05_u:8990: 05,170.019a teṣām āpatatāṃ citrān dhvajān hemapariṣkṛtān 05,170.019c ekaikena hi bāṇena bhūmau pātitavān aham
GE07mbh_05_u:8991: 05,170.020a hayāṃś caiṣāṃ gajāṃś caiva sārathīṃś cāpy ahaṃ raṇe 05,170.020c apātayaṃ śarair dīptaiḥ prahasan puruṣarṣabha 05,170.021a te nivṛttāś ca bhagnāś ca dṛṣṭvā tal lāghavaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:8992: 05,170.021b*0570_01 praṇipetuś ca sarve vai praśaśaṃsuś ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8993: 05,170.021b*0570_02 tata ādāya tāḥ kanyā nṛpatīṃś ca visṛjya tān 05,170.021c athāhaṃ hāstinapuram āyāṃ jitvā mahīkṣitaḥ 05,170.022a ato 'haṃ tāś ca kanyā vai bhrātur arthāya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:8994: 05,170.022c tac ca karma mahābāho satyavatyai nyavedayam
GE07mbh_05_u:8995: 05,171.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,171.001a tato 'haṃ bharataśreṣṭha mātaraṃ vīramātaram
GE07mbh_05_u:8997: 05,171.002a imāḥ kāśipateḥ kanyā mayā nirjitya pārthivān
GE07mbh_05_u:8999: 05,171.003a tato mūrdhany upāghrāya paryaśrunayanā nṛpa 05,171.003c āha satyavatī hṛṣṭā diṣṭyā putra jitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:9000: 05,171.004a satyavatyās tv anumate vivāhe samupasthite 05,171.004c uvāca vākyaṃ savrīḍā jyeṣṭhā kāśipateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_05_u:9001: 05,171.005a bhīṣma tvam asi dharmajñaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ 05,171.005c śrutvā ca dharmyaṃ vacanaṃ mahyaṃ kartum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:9002: 05,171.006a mayā śālvapatiḥ pūrvaṃ manasābhivṛto varaḥ 05,171.006c tena cāsmi vṛtā pūrvaṃ rahasy avidite pituḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9003: 05,171.007a kathaṃ mām anyakāmāṃ tvaṃ rājañ śāstram adhītya vai 05,171.007c vāsayethā gṛhe bhīṣma kauravaḥ san viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9004: 05,171.008a etad buddhyā viniścitya manasā bharatarṣabha 05,171.008c yat kṣamaṃ te mahābāho tad ihārabdhum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:9005: 05,171.009a sa māṃ pratīkṣate vyaktaṃ śālvarājo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:9006: 05,171.009b*0571_01 tasmān māṃ tvaṃ kuruśreṣṭha samanujñātum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:9007: 05,171.009c kṛpāṃ kuru mahābāho mayi dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_05_u:9008: 05,171.009e tvaṃ hi satyavrato vīra pṛthivyām iti naḥ śrutam 05,172.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,172.001a tato 'haṃ samanujñāpya kālīṃ satyavatīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:9009: 05,172.001c mantriṇaś ca dvijāṃś caiva tathaiva ca purohitān
GE07mbh_05_u:9010: 05,172.001e samanujñāsiṣaṃ kanyāṃ jyeṣṭhām ambāṃ narādhipa 05,172.002a anujñātā yayau sā tu kanyā śālvapateḥ puram
GE07mbh_05_u:9011: 05,172.002c vṛddhair dvijātibhir guptā dhātryā cānugatā tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:9012: 05,172.002e atītya ca tam adhvānam āsasāda narādhipam
GE07mbh_05_u:9013: 05,172.003a sā tam āsādya rājānaṃ śālvaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:9014: 05,172.003c āgatāhaṃ mahābāho tvām uddiśya mahādyute 05,172.003d*0572_01 abhinandasva māṃ rājan sadā priyahite ratām
GE07mbh_05_u:9015: 05,172.003d*0572_02 pratipālaya māṃ rājan dharmādīṃś cara dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9016: 05,172.003d*0572_03 tvaṃ hi me manasā dhyātas tvayā cāpy upamantritā 05,172.004a tām abravīc chālvapatiḥ smayann iva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:9018: 05,172.005a gaccha bhadre punas tatra sakāśaṃ bhāratasya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:9019: 05,172.005c nāham icchāmi bhīṣmeṇa gṛhītāṃ tvāṃ prasahya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:9020: 05,172.006a tvaṃ hi nirjitya bhīṣmeṇa nītā prītimatī tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:9022: 05,172.006e nāhaṃ tvayy anyapūrvāyāṃ bhāryārthī varavarṇini 05,172.007a katham asmadvidho rājā parapūrvāṃ praveśayet 05,172.007c nārīṃ viditavijñānaḥ pareṣāṃ dharmam ādiśan 05,172.007e yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ bhadre mā te kālo 'tyagād ayam
GE07mbh_05_u:9023: 05,172.008a ambā tam abravīd rājann anaṅgaśarapīḍitā 05,172.008c maivaṃ vada mahīpāla naitad evaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:9025: 05,172.009c balān nītāsmi rudatī vidrāvya pṛthivīpatīn 05,172.010a bhajasva māṃ śālvapate bhaktāṃ bālām anāgasam
GE07mbh_05_u:9026: 05,172.010c bhaktānāṃ hi parityāgo na dharmeṣu praśasyate
GE07mbh_05_u:9027: 05,172.011a sāham āmantrya gāṅgeyaṃ samareṣv anivartinam 05,172.011c anujñātā ca tenaiva tavaiva gṛham āgatā
GE07mbh_05_u:9028: 05,172.012a na sa bhīṣmo mahābāhur mām icchati viśāṃ pate 05,172.012c bhrātṛhetoḥ samārambho bhīṣmasyeti śrutaṃ mayā 05,172.013a bhaginyau mama ye nīte ambikāmbālike nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:9029: 05,172.013c prādād vicitravīryāya gāṅgeyo hi yavīyase 05,172.014a yathā śālvapate nānyaṃ naraṃ dhyāmi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:9030: 05,172.014c tvām ṛte puruṣavyāghra tathā mūrdhānam ālabhe
GE07mbh_05_u:9031: 05,172.015a na cānyapūrvā rājendra tvām ahaṃ samupasthitā
GE07mbh_05_u:9032: 05,172.015c satyaṃ bravīmi śālvaitat satyenātmānam ālabhe 05,172.016a bhajasva māṃ viśālākṣa svayaṃ kanyām upasthitām
GE07mbh_05_u:9034: 05,172.017a tām evaṃ bhāṣamāṇāṃ tu śālvaḥ kāśipateḥ sutām
GE07mbh_05_u:9035: 05,172.017c atyajad bharataśreṣṭha tvacaṃ jīrṇām ivoragaḥ 05,172.018a evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair yācyamānas tayānagha 05,172.018c nāśraddadhac chālvapatiḥ kanyāyā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:9036: 05,172.019a tataḥ sā manyunāviṣṭā jyeṣṭhā kāśipateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_05_u:9038: 05,172.020a tvayā tyaktā gamiṣyāmi yatra yatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:9039: 05,172.020c tatra me santu gatayaḥ santaḥ satyaṃ yathābruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:9040: 05,172.021a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇāṃ tu nṛśaṃsaḥ śālvarāṭ tadā
