GE07mbh_05_u:9043: 05,172.022c bibhemi bhīṣmāt suśroṇi tvaṃ ca bhīṣmaparigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9044: 05,172.023a evam uktā tu sā tena śālvenādīrghadarśinā
GE07mbh_05_u:9045: 05,172.023c niścakrāma purād dīnā rudatī kurarī yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:9046: 05,173.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,173.001a sā niṣkramantī nagarāc cintayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9047: 05,173.001c pṛthivyāṃ nāsti yuvatir viṣamasthatarā mayā 05,173.001e bāndhavair viprahīnāsmi śālvena ca nirākṛtā 05,173.002a na ca śakyaṃ punar gantuṃ mayā vāraṇasāhvayam
GE07mbh_05_u:9048: 05,173.002c anujñātāsmi bhīṣmeṇa śālvam uddiśya kāraṇam 05,173.003a kiṃ nu garhāmy athātmānam atha bhīṣmaṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_05_u:9049: 05,173.003c āho svit pitaraṃ mūḍhaṃ yo me 'kārṣīt svayaṃvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:9050: 05,173.004a mamāyaṃ svakṛto doṣo yāhaṃ bhīṣmarathāt tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:9051: 05,173.004c pravṛtte vaiśase yuddhe śālvārthaṃ nāpataṃ purā
GE07mbh_05_u:9052: 05,173.004e tasyeyaṃ phalanirvṛttir yad āpannāsmi mūḍhavat 05,173.005a dhig bhīṣmaṃ dhik ca me mandaṃ pitaraṃ mūḍhacetasam 05,173.005c yenāhaṃ vīryaśulkena paṇyastrīvat praveritā
GE07mbh_05_u:9053: 05,173.006a dhiṅ māṃ dhik śālvarājānaṃ dhig dhātāram athāpi ca 05,173.006c yeṣāṃ durnītabhāvena prāptāsmy āpadam uttamām 05,173.007a sarvathā bhāgadheyāni svāni prāpnoti mānavaḥ 05,173.007c anayasyāsya tu mukhaṃ bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo mama
GE07mbh_05_u:9054: 05,173.008a sā bhīṣme pratikartavyam ahaṃ paśyāmi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:9055: 05,173.008c tapasā vā yudhā vāpi duḥkhahetuḥ sa me mataḥ 05,173.008e ko nu bhīṣmaṃ yudhā jetum utsaheta mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9056: 05,173.009a evaṃ sā pariniścitya jagāma nagarād bahiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9058: 05,173.009e tatas tām avasad rātriṃ tāpasaiḥ parivāritā
GE07mbh_05_u:9059: 05,173.010a ācakhyau ca yathā vṛttaṃ sarvam ātmani bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9061: 05,173.010e haraṇaṃ ca visargaṃ ca śālvena ca visarjanam
GE07mbh_05_u:9062: 05,173.011a tatas tatra mahān āsīd brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9063: 05,173.011c śaikhāvatyas tapovṛddhaḥ śāstre cāraṇyake guruḥ 05,173.012a ārtāṃ tām āha sa muniḥ śaikhāvatyo mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9065: 05,173.013a evaṃ gate kiṃ nu bhadre śakyaṃ kartuṃ tapasvibhiḥ 05,173.013c āśramasthair mahābhāgais taponityair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9066: 05,173.014a sā tv enam abravīd rājan kriyatāṃ madanugrahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9067: 05,173.014c pravrājitum ihecchāmi tapas tapsyāmi duścaram 05,173.015a mayaivaitāni karmāṇi pūrvadeheṣu mūḍhayā
GE07mbh_05_u:9068: 05,173.015c kṛtāni nūnaṃ pāpāni teṣām etat phalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:9069: 05,173.016a notsaheyaṃ punar gantuṃ svajanaṃ prati tāpasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9070: 05,173.016c pratyākhyātā nirānandā śālvena ca nirākṛtā 05,173.017a upadiṣṭam ihecchāmi tāpasyaṃ vītakalmaṣāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9071: 05,173.017c yuṣmābhir devasaṃkāśāḥ kṛpā bhavatu vo mayi
GE07mbh_05_u:9072: 05,173.018a sa tām āśvāsayat kanyāṃ dṛṣṭāntāgamahetubhiḥ 05,173.018c sāntvayām āsa kāryaṃ ca pratijajñe dvijaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:9073: 05,174.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,174.001a tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve kāryavanto 'bhavaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:9074: 05,174.001c tāṃ kanyāṃ cintayanto vai kiṃ kāryam iti dharmiṇaḥ 05,174.002a ke cid āhuḥ pitur veśma nīyatām iti tāpasāḥ 05,174.002c ke cid asmadupālambhe matiṃ cakrur dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9075: 05,174.003a ke cic chālvapatiṃ gatvā niyojyam iti menire
GE07mbh_05_u:9076: 05,174.003c neti ke cid vyavasyanti pratyākhyātā hi tena sā 05,174.004a evaṃ gate kiṃ nu śakyaṃ bhadre kartuṃ manīṣibhiḥ 05,174.004c punar ūcuś ca te sarve tāpasāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9077: 05,174.005a alaṃ pravrajiteneha bhadre śṛṇu hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9078: 05,174.005c ito gacchasva bhadraṃ te pitur eva niveśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:9079: 05,174.006a pratipatsyati rājā sa pitā te yad anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:9080: 05,174.006c tatra vatsyasi kalyāṇi sukhaṃ sarvaguṇānvitā 05,174.006e na ca te 'nyā gatir nyāyyā bhaved bhadre yathā pitā
GE07mbh_05_u:9081: 05,174.007a patir vāpi gatir nāryāḥ pitā vā varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:9082: 05,174.007c gatiḥ patiḥ samasthāyā viṣame tu pitā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9083: 05,174.008a pravrajyā hi suduḥkheyaṃ sukumāryā viśeṣataḥ 05,174.008c rājaputryāḥ prakṛtyā ca kumāryās tava bhāmini
GE07mbh_05_u:9084: 05,174.009a bhadre doṣā hi vidyante bahavo varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:9085: 05,174.009c āśrame vai vasantyās te na bhaveyuḥ pitur gṛhe 05,174.010a tatas tu te 'bruvan vākyaṃ brāhmaṇās tāṃ tapasvinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:9086: 05,174.010c tvām ihaikākinīṃ dṛṣṭvā nirjane gahane vane
GE07mbh_05_u:9087: 05,174.010e prārthayiṣyanti rājendrās tasmān maivaṃ manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9089: 05,174.011a na śakyaṃ kāśinagarīṃ punar gantuṃ pitur gṛhān
GE07mbh_05_u:9090: 05,174.011c avajñātā bhaviṣyāmi bāndhavānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ 05,174.012a uṣitā hy anyathā bālye pitur veśmani tāpasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9091: 05,174.012c nāhaṃ gamiṣye bhadraṃ vas tatra yatra pitā mama 05,174.012e tapas taptum abhīpsāmi tāpasaiḥ paripālitā 05,174.013a yathā pare 'pi me loke na syād evaṃ mahātyayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9092: 05,174.013c daurbhāgyaṃ brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhās tasmāt tapsyāmy ahaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9093: 05,174.014 bhīṣma uvāca 05,174.014a ity evaṃ teṣu vipreṣu cintayatsu tathā tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:9094: 05,174.014c rājarṣis tad vanaṃ prāptas tapasvī hotravāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9095: 05,174.014d*0573_01 tāṃ tathā bhāminīṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā codvignamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9096: 05,174.015a tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve pūjayanti sma taṃ nṛpam 05,174.015c pūjābhiḥ svāgatādyābhir āsanenodakena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:9098: 05,174.016c punar eva kathāṃ cakruḥ kanyāṃ prati vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9099: 05,174.017a ambāyās tāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā kāśirājñaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9101: 05,174.017b*0574_02 tāṃ tathāvādinīṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca sa mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9103: 05,174.017c sa vepamāna utthāya mātur asyāḥ pitā tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:9104: 05,174.017e tāṃ kanyām aṅkam āropya paryāśvāsayata prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:9105: 05,174.018a sa tām apṛcchat kārtsnyena vyasanotpattim āditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9106: 05,174.018c sā ca tasmai yathāvṛttaṃ vistareṇa nyavedayat
GE07mbh_05_u:9107: 05,174.019a tataḥ sa rājarṣir abhūd duḥkhaśokasamanvitaḥ 05,174.019c kāryaṃ ca pratipede tan manasā sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9108: 05,174.020a abravīd vepamānaś ca kanyām ārtāṃ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9109: 05,174.020c mā gāḥ pitṛgṛhaṃ bhadre mātus te janako hy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:9110: 05,174.021a duḥkhaṃ chetsyāmi te 'haṃ vai mayi vartasva putrike
GE07mbh_05_u:9111: 05,174.021c paryāptaṃ te manaḥ putri yad evaṃ pariśuṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:9112: 05,174.022a gaccha madvacanād rāmaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ tapasvinam 05,174.022c rāmas tava mahad duḥkhaṃ śokaṃ cāpanayiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:9113: 05,174.022e haniṣyati raṇe bhīṣmaṃ na kariṣyati ced vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9115: 05,174.023c pratiṣṭhāpayitā sa tvāṃ same pathi mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9116: 05,174.024a tatas tu sasvaraṃ bāṣpam utsṛjantī punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9117: 05,174.024c abravīt pitaraṃ mātuḥ sā tadā hotravāhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:9118: 05,174.025a abhivādayitvā śirasā gamiṣye tava śāsanāt 05,174.025c api nāmādya paśyeyam āryaṃ taṃ lokaviśrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:9119: 05,174.026a kathaṃ ca tīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ me haniṣyati sa bhārgavaḥ 05,174.026c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotum atha yāsyāmi tatra vai 05,175.001 hotravāhana uvāca 05,175.001a rāmaṃ drakṣyasi vatse tvaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahāvane
GE07mbh_05_u:9120: 05,175.001c ugre tapasi vartantaṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ mahābalam 05,175.002a mahendre vai giriśreṣṭhe rāmaṃ nityam upāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:9122: 05,175.003a tatra gacchasva bhadraṃ te brūyāś cainaṃ vaco mama 05,175.003c abhivādya pūrvaṃ śirasā tapovṛddhaṃ dṛḍhavratam 05,175.004a brūyāś cainaṃ punar bhadre yat te kāryaṃ manīṣitam 05,175.004c mayi saṃkīrtite rāmaḥ sarvaṃ tat te kariṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:9123: 05,175.005a mama rāmaḥ sakhā vatse prītiyuktaḥ suhṛc ca me 05,175.005c jamadagnisuto vīraḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9124: 05,175.006a evaṃ bruvati kanyāṃ tu pārthive hotravāhane
GE07mbh_05_u:9126: 05,175.007a tatas te munayaḥ sarve samuttasthuḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9127: 05,175.007c sa ca rājā vayovṛddhaḥ sṛñjayo hotravāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9128: 05,175.008a tataḥ pṛṣṭvā yathānyāyam anyonyaṃ te vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9129: 05,175.008c sahitā bharataśreṣṭha niṣeduḥ parivārya tam 05,175.009a tatas te kathayām āsuḥ kathās tās tā manoramāḥ 05,175.009c kāntā divyāś ca rājendra prītiharṣamudā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9130: 05,175.010a tataḥ kathānte rājarṣir mahātmā hotravāhanaḥ 05,175.010c rāmaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ maharṣīṇām apṛcchad akṛtavraṇam 05,175.011a kva saṃprati mahābāho jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān 05,175.011c akṛtavraṇa śakyo vai draṣṭuṃ vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9131: 05,175.012 akṛtavraṇa uvāca 05,175.012a bhavantam eva satataṃ rāmaḥ kīrtayati prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:9132: 05,175.012c sṛñjayo me priyasakho rājarṣir iti pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:9133: 05,175.013a iha rāmaḥ prabhāte śvo bhaviteti matir mama
GE07mbh_05_u:9134: 05,175.013c draṣṭāsy enam ihāyāntaṃ tava darśanakāṅkṣayā 05,175.014a iyaṃ ca kanyā rājarṣe kimarthaṃ vanam āgatā
GE07mbh_05_u:9135: 05,175.014c kasya ceyaṃ tava ca kā bhavatīcchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_05_u:9136: 05,175.015 hotravāhana uvāca 05,175.015a dauhitrīyaṃ mama vibho kāśirājasutā śubhā 05,175.015c jyeṣṭhā svayaṃvare tasthau bhaginībhyāṃ sahānagha 05,175.016a iyam ambeti vikhyātā jyeṣṭhā kāśipateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_05_u:9137: 05,175.016c ambikāmbālike tv anye yavīyasyau tapodhana 05,175.017a sametaṃ pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ kāśipuryāṃ tato 'bhavat
GE07mbh_05_u:9138: 05,175.017c kanyānimittaṃ brahmarṣe tatrāsīd utsavo mahān 05,175.018a tataḥ kila mahāvīryo bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo nṛpān
GE07mbh_05_u:9139: 05,175.018c avākṣipya mahātejās tisraḥ kanyā jahāra tāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9140: 05,175.019a nirjitya pṛthivīpālān atha bhīṣmo gajāhvayam 05,175.019c ājagāma viśuddhātmā kanyābhiḥ saha bhārata 05,175.020a satyavatyai nivedyātha vivāhārtham anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:9142: 05,175.021a tato vaivāhikaṃ dṛṣṭvā kanyeyaṃ samupārjitam 05,175.021c abravīt tatra gāṅgeyaṃ mantrimadhye dvijarṣabha 05,175.022a mayā śālvapatir vīra manasābhivṛtaḥ patiḥ 05,175.022c na mām arhasi dharmajña paracittāṃ pradāpitum
GE07mbh_05_u:9143: 05,175.023a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ bhīṣmaḥ saṃmantrya saha mantribhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9144: 05,175.023c niścitya visasarjemāṃ satyavatyā mate sthitaḥ 05,175.024a anujñātā tu bhīṣmeṇa śālvaṃ saubhapatiṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9145: 05,175.024c kanyeyaṃ muditā vipra kāle vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:9146: 05,175.025a visarjitāsmi bhīṣmeṇa dharmaṃ māṃ pratipādaya 05,175.025c manasābhivṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ mayā tvaṃ pārthivarṣabha 05,175.026a pratyācakhyau ca śālvo 'pi cāritrasyābhiśaṅkitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9148: 05,175.027a mayā ca pratyabhijñātā vaṃśasya parikīrtanāt 05,175.027c asya duḥkhasya cotpattiṃ bhīṣmam eveha manyate
GE07mbh_05_u:9149: 05,175.027d*0575_01 evaṃ bruvati vai rājñi kanyā vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:9151: 05,175.028a bhagavann evam evaitad yathāha pṛthivīpatiḥ 05,175.028c śarīrakartā mātur me sṛñjayo hotravāhanaḥ 05,175.029a na hy utsahe svanagaraṃ pratiyātuṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_05_u:9152: 05,175.029c avamānabhayāc caiva vrīḍayā ca mahāmune 05,175.030a yat tu māṃ bhagavān rāmo vakṣyati dvijasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:9153: 05,175.030c tan me kāryatamaṃ kāryam iti me bhagavan matiḥ 05,176.001 akṛtavraṇa uvāca 05,176.001a duḥkhadvayam idaṃ bhadre katarasya cikīrṣasi 05,176.001c pratikartavyam abale tat tvaṃ vatse bravīhi me
GE07mbh_05_u:9154: 05,176.002a yadi saubhapatir bhadre niyoktavyo mate tava
GE07mbh_05_u:9155: 05,176.002c niyokṣyati mahātmā taṃ rāmas tvaddhitakāmyayā 05,176.003a athāpageyaṃ bhīṣmaṃ taṃ rāmeṇecchasi dhīmatā 05,176.003c raṇe vinirjitaṃ draṣṭuṃ kuryāt tad api bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9156: 05,176.004a sṛñjayasya vacaḥ śrutvā tava caiva śucismite
GE07mbh_05_u:9157: 05,176.004c yad atrānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tad adyaiva vicintyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:9160: 05,176.005c na hi jānāti me bhīṣmo brahmañ śālvagataṃ manaḥ 05,176.006a etad vicārya manasā bhavān eva viniścayam
GE07mbh_05_u:9161: 05,176.006c vicinotu yathānyāyaṃ vidhānaṃ kriyatāṃ tathā 05,176.007a bhīṣme vā kuruśārdūle śālvarāje 'tha vā punaḥ 05,176.007c ubhayor eva vā brahman yad yuktaṃ tat samācara 05,176.008a niveditaṃ mayā hy etad duḥkhamūlaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_05_u:9162: 05,176.008c vidhānaṃ tatra bhagavan kartum arhasi yuktitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9163: 05,176.009 akṛtavraṇa uvāca 05,176.009a upapannam idaṃ bhadre yad evaṃ varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:9164: 05,176.009c dharmaṃ prati vaco brūyāḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama 05,176.010a yadi tvām āpageyo vai na nayed gajasāhvayam
GE07mbh_05_u:9165: 05,176.010c śālvas tvāṃ śirasā bhīru gṛhṇīyād rāmacoditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9166: 05,176.011a tena tvaṃ nirjitā bhadre yasmān nītāsi bhāmini
GE07mbh_05_u:9167: 05,176.011c saṃśayaḥ śālvarājasya tena tvayi sumadhyame 05,176.012a bhīṣmaḥ puruṣamānī ca jitakāśī tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:9168: 05,176.012c tasmāt pratikriyā yuktā bhīṣme kārayituṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:9170: 05,176.013a mamāpy eṣa mahān brahman hṛdi kāmo 'bhivartate
GE07mbh_05_u:9171: 05,176.013c ghātayeyaṃ yadi raṇe bhīṣmam ity eva nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:9172: 05,176.014a bhīṣmaṃ vā śālvarājaṃ vā yaṃ vā doṣeṇa gacchasi 05,176.014c praśādhi taṃ mahābāho yatkṛte 'haṃ suduḥkhitā
GE07mbh_05_u:9173: 05,176.015 bhīṣma uvāca 05,176.015a evaṃ kathayatām eva teṣāṃ sa divaso gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9175: 05,176.016a tato rāmaḥ prādurāsīt prajvalann iva tejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:9176: 05,176.016c śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto rājañ jaṭācīradharo muniḥ 05,176.017a dhanuṣpāṇir adīnātmā khaḍgaṃ bibhrat paraśvadhī 05,176.017c virajā rājaśārdūla so 'bhyayāt sṛñjayaṃ nṛpam 05,176.018a tatas taṃ tāpasā dṛṣṭvā sa ca rājā mahātapāḥ 05,176.018c tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve sā ca kanyā tapasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:9177: 05,176.019a pūjayām āsur avyagrā madhuparkeṇa bhārgavam 05,176.019c arcitaś ca yathāyogaṃ niṣasāda sahaiva taiḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:9224: 05,177.008 bhīṣma uvāca 05,177.008a tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ rājan rāmāmbayos tadā

GE07mbh_05_u:9313: 05,179.008a evam uktvā yayau rāmaḥ kurukṣetraṃ yuyutsayā
GE07mbh_05_u:9314: 05,179.008c praviśya nagaraṃ cāhaṃ satyavatyai nyavedayam 05,179.009a tataḥ kṛtasvastyayano mātrā pratyabhinanditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9315: 05,179.009c dvijātīn vācya puṇyāhaṃ svasti caiva mahādyute
GE07mbh_05_u:9316: 05,179.010a ratham āsthāya ruciraṃ rājataṃ pāṇḍurair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9319: 05,179.011c tat kulīnena vīreṇa hayaśāstravidā nṛpa 05,179.012a yuktaṃ sūtena śiṣṭena bahuśo dṛṣṭakarmaṇā 05,179.012c daṃśitaḥ pāṇḍureṇāhaṃ kavacena vapuṣmatā
GE07mbh_05_u:9320: 05,179.013a pāṇḍuraṃ kārmukaṃ gṛhya prāyāṃ bharatasattama 05,179.013c pāṇḍureṇātapatreṇa dhriyamāṇena mūrdhani
GE07mbh_05_u:9321: 05,179.014a pāṇḍuraiś cāmaraiś cāpi vījyamāno narādhipa 05,179.014c śuklavāsāḥ sitoṣṇīṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9324: 05,179.016a te hayāś coditās tena sūtena paramāhave
GE07mbh_05_u:9325: 05,179.016c avahan māṃ bhṛśaṃ rājan manomārutaraṃhasaḥ 05,179.017a gatvāhaṃ tat kurukṣetraṃ sa ca rāmaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:9326: 05,179.017c yuddhāya sahasā rājan parākrāntau parasparam 05,179.018a tataḥ saṃdarśane 'tiṣṭhaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:9327: 05,179.018c pragṛhya śaṅkhapravaraṃ tataḥ prādhamam uttamam 05,179.019a tatas tatra dvijā rājaṃs tāpasāś ca vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9328: 05,179.019c apaśyanta raṇaṃ divyaṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:9329: 05,179.020a tato divyāni mālyāni prādurāsan muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9330: 05,179.020c vāditrāṇi ca divyāni meghavṛndāni caiva ha
GE07mbh_05_u:9331: 05,179.021a tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve bhārgavasyānuyāyinaḥ 05,179.021c prekṣakāḥ samapadyanta parivārya raṇājiram
GE07mbh_05_u:9332: 05,179.022a tato mām abravīd devī sarvabhūtahitaiṣiṇī 05,179.022c mātā svarūpiṇī rājan kim idaṃ te cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:9333: 05,179.023a gatvāhaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ taṃ prayāciṣye kurūdvaha 05,179.023c bhīṣmeṇa saha mā yotsīḥ śiṣyeṇeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9334: 05,179.024a mā maivaṃ putra nirbandhaṃ kuru vipreṇa pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:9335: 05,179.024c jāmadagnyena samare yoddhum ity avabhartsayat 05,179.025a kiṃ na vai kṣatriyaharo haratulyaparākramaḥ 05,179.025c viditaḥ putra rāmas te yatas tvaṃ yoddhum icchasi 05,179.026a tato 'ham abruvaṃ devīm abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9336: 05,179.026c sarvaṃ tad bharataśreṣṭha yathāvṛttaṃ svayaṃvare 05,179.027a yathā ca rāmo rājendra mayā pūrvaṃ prasāditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9337: 05,179.027c kāśirājasutāyāś ca yathā kāmaḥ purātanaḥ 05,179.028a tataḥ sā rāmam abhyetya jananī me mahānadī
GE07mbh_05_u:9338: 05,179.028c madarthaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ devī kṣamayām āsa bhārgavam
GE07mbh_05_u:9339: 05,179.028e bhīṣmeṇa saha mā yotsīḥ śiṣyeṇeti vaco 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:9340: 05,179.029a sa ca tām āha yācantīṃ bhīṣmam eva nivartaya 05,179.029c na hi me kurute kāmam ity ahaṃ tam upāgamam
GE07mbh_05_u:9341: 05,179.030 saṃjaya uvāca 05,179.030a tato gaṅgā sutasnehād bhīṣmaṃ punar upāgamat
GE07mbh_05_u:9342: 05,179.030c na cāsyāḥ so 'karod vākyaṃ krodhaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ 05,179.031a athādṛśyata dharmātmā bhṛguśreṣṭho mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9343: 05,179.031c āhvayām āsa ca punar yuddhāya dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9344: 05,180.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,180.001a tam ahaṃ smayann iva raṇe pratyabhāṣaṃ vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:9345: 05,180.001c bhūmiṣṭhaṃ notsahe yoddhuṃ bhavantaṃ ratham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9346: 05,180.002a āroha syandanaṃ vīra kavacaṃ ca mahābhuja
GE07mbh_05_u:9347: 05,180.002c badhāna samare rāma yadi yoddhuṃ mayecchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:9348: 05,180.003a tato mām abravīd rāmaḥ smayamāno raṇājire
GE07mbh_05_u:9349: 05,180.003c ratho me medinī bhīṣma vāhā vedāḥ sadaśvavat
GE07mbh_05_u:9350: 05,180.004a sūto me mātariśvā vai kavacaṃ vedamātaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9352: 05,180.005a evaṃ bruvāṇo gāndhāre rāmo māṃ satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9356: 05,180.007a manasā vihite puṇye vistīrṇe nagaropame 05,180.007c divyāśvayuji saṃnaddhe kāñcanena vibhūṣite
GE07mbh_05_u:9359: 05,180.009a sārathyaṃ kṛtavāṃs tatra yuyutsor akṛtavraṇaḥ 05,180.009c sakhā vedavid atyantaṃ dayito bhārgavasya ha
GE07mbh_05_u:9360: 05,180.010a āhvayānaḥ sa māṃ yuddhe mano harṣayatīva me
GE07mbh_05_u:9361: 05,180.010c punaḥ punar abhikrośann abhiyāhīti bhārgavaḥ 05,180.011a tam ādityam ivodyantam anādhṛṣyaṃ mahābalam 05,180.011c kṣatriyāntakaraṃ rāmam ekam ekaḥ samāsadam 05,180.012a tato 'haṃ bāṇapāteṣu triṣu vāhān nigṛhya vai 05,180.012c avatīrya dhanur nyasya padātir ṛṣisattamam 05,180.013a abhyagacchaṃ tadā rāmam arciṣyan dvijasattamam 05,180.013c abhivādya cainaṃ vidhivad abruvaṃ vākyam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:9362: 05,180.014a yotsye tvayā raṇe rāma viśiṣṭenādhikena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:9363: 05,180.014c guruṇā dharmaśīlena jayam āśāssva me vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:9364: 05,180.015 rāma uvāca 05,180.015a evam etat kuruśreṣṭha kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_05_u:9365: 05,180.015c dharmo hy eṣa mahābāho viśiṣṭaiḥ saha yudhyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:9366: 05,180.016a śapeyaṃ tvāṃ na ced evam āgacchethā viśāṃ pate 05,180.016c yudhyasva tvaṃ raṇe yatto dhairyam ālambya kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:9367: 05,180.017a na tu te jayam āśāse tvāṃ hi jetum ahaṃ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9368: 05,180.017c gaccha yudhyasva dharmeṇa prīto 'smi caritena te 05,180.018 bhīṣma uvāca 05,180.018a tato 'haṃ taṃ namaskṛtya ratham āruhya satvaraḥ 05,180.018c prādhmāpayaṃ raṇe śaṅkhaṃ punar hemavibhūṣitam 05,180.019a tato yuddhaṃ samabhavan mama tasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9370: 05,180.020a sa me tasmin raṇe pūrvaṃ prāharat kaṅkapatribhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9371: 05,180.020c ṣaṣṭyā śataiś ca navabhiḥ śarāṇām agnivarcasām
GE07mbh_05_u:9372: 05,180.021a catvāras tena me vāhāḥ sūtaś caiva viśāṃ pate 05,180.021c pratiruddhās tathaivāhaṃ samare daṃśitaḥ sthitaḥ 05,180.022a namaskṛtya ca devebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9373: 05,180.022c tam ahaṃ smayann iva raṇe pratyabhāṣaṃ vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:9374: 05,180.023a ācāryatā mānitā me nirmaryāde hy api tvayi
GE07mbh_05_u:9375: 05,180.023c bhūyas tu śṛṇu me brahman saṃpadaṃ dharmasaṃgrahe
GE07mbh_05_u:9376: 05,180.024a ye te vedāḥ śarīrasthā brāhmaṇyaṃ yac ca te mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:9377: 05,180.024c tapaś ca sumahat taptaṃ na tebhyaḥ praharāmy aham 05,180.025a prahare kṣatradharmasya yaṃ tvaṃ rāma samāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9378: 05,180.025c brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyatvaṃ hi yāti śastrasamudyamāt 05,180.026a paśya me dhanuṣo vīryaṃ paśya bāhvor balaṃ ca me
GE07mbh_05_u:9379: 05,180.026c eṣa te kārmukaṃ vīra dvidhā kurmi sasāyakam
GE07mbh_05_u:9380: 05,180.027a tasyāhaṃ niśitaṃ bhallaṃ prāhiṇvaṃ bharatarṣabha 05,180.027c tenāsya dhanuṣaḥ koṭiś chinnā bhūmim athāgamat
GE07mbh_05_u:9381: 05,180.028a nava cāpi pṛṣatkānāṃ śatāni nataparvaṇām 05,180.028c prāhiṇvaṃ kaṅkapatrāṇāṃ jāmadagnyarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:9382: 05,180.029a kāye viṣaktās tu tadā vāyunābhisamīritāḥ 05,180.029c celuḥ kṣaranto rudhiraṃ nāgā iva ca te śarāḥ 05,180.030a kṣatajokṣitasarvāṅgaḥ kṣaran sa rudhiraṃ vraṇaiḥ 05,180.030c babhau rāmas tadā rājan merur dhātūn ivotsṛjan
GE07mbh_05_u:9383: 05,180.031a hemantānte 'śoka iva raktastabakamaṇḍitaḥ 05,180.031c babhau rāmas tadā rājan kva cit kiṃśukasaṃnibhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9385: 05,180.032c hemapuṅkhān suniśitāñ śarāṃs tān hi vavarṣa saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9386: 05,180.033a te samāsādya māṃ raudrā bahudhā marmabhedinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9389: 05,180.034c śatasaṃkhyaiḥ śaraiḥ kruddhas tadā rāmam avākiram
GE07mbh_05_u:9390: 05,180.035a sa tair agnyarkasaṃkāśaiḥ śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ 05,180.035c śitair abhyardito rāmo mandacetā ivābhavat 05,180.036a tato 'haṃ kṛpayāviṣṭo vinindyātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:9391: 05,180.036c dhig dhig ity abruvaṃ yuddhaṃ kṣatraṃ ca bharatarṣabha 05,180.037a asakṛc cābruvaṃ rājañ śokavegapariplutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9392: 05,180.037c aho bata kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ mayedaṃ kṣatrakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:9393: 05,180.038a gurur dvijātir dharmātmā yad evaṃ pīḍitaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9394: 05,180.038c tato na prāharaṃ bhūyo jāmadagnyāya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9396: 05,180.039c jagāmāstaṃ sahasrāṃśus tato yuddham upāramat 05,181.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,181.001a ātmanas tu tataḥ sūto hayānāṃ ca viśāṃ pate 05,181.001c mama cāpanayām āsa śalyān kuśalasaṃmataḥ 05,181.002a snātopavṛttais turagair labdhatoyair avihvalaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9397: 05,181.002c prabhāta udite sūrye tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_05_u:9398: 05,181.003a dṛṣṭvā māṃ tūrṇam āyāntaṃ daṃśitaṃ syandane sthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:9399: 05,181.003c akarod ratham atyarthaṃ rāmaḥ sajjaṃ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:9402: 05,181.005a abhivādya tathaivāhaṃ ratham āruhya bhārata 05,181.005c yuyutsur jāmadagnyasya pramukhe vītabhīḥ sthitaḥ 05,181.006a tato māṃ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā samavākirat 05,181.006c ahaṃ ca śaravarṣeṇa varṣantaṃ samavākiram 05,181.007a saṃkruddho jāmadagnyas tu punar eva patatriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9403: 05,181.007c preṣayām āsa me rājan dīptāsyān uragān iva
GE07mbh_05_u:9404: 05,181.008a tān ahaṃ niśitair bhallaiḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9405: 05,181.008c acchidaṃ sahasā rājann antarikṣe punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9406: 05,181.009a tatas tv astrāṇi divyāni jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:9407: 05,181.009c mayi pracodayām āsa tāny ahaṃ pratyaṣedhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:9408: 05,181.010a astrair eva mahābāho cikīrṣann adhikāṃ kriyām
GE07mbh_05_u:9409: 05,181.010c tato divi mahān nādaḥ prādurāsīt samantataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9411: 05,181.011c pratyājaghne ca tad rāmo guhyakāstreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9413: 05,181.012c vāruṇenaiva rāmas tad vārayām āsa me vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9414: 05,181.013a evam astrāṇi divyāni rāmasyāham avārayam 05,181.013c rāmaś ca mama tejasvī divyāstravid ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9415: 05,181.014a tato māṃ savyato rājan rāmaḥ kurvan dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9416: 05,181.014c urasy avidhyat saṃkruddho jāmadagnyo mahābalaḥ 05,181.015a tato 'haṃ bharataśreṣṭha saṃnyaṣīdaṃ rathottame
GE07mbh_05_u:9417: 05,181.015c atha māṃ kaśmalāviṣṭaṃ sūtas tūrṇam apāvahat
GE07mbh_05_u:9419: 05,181.016a tato mām apayātaṃ vai bhṛśaṃ viddham acetasam
GE07mbh_05_u:9420: 05,181.016c rāmasyānucarā hṛṣṭāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā pracukruśuḥ 05,181.016e akṛtavraṇaprabhṛtayaḥ kāśikanyā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9421: 05,181.017a tatas tu labdhasaṃjño 'haṃ jñātvā sūtam athābruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:9422: 05,181.017c yāhi sūta yato rāmaḥ sajjo 'haṃ gatavedanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9423: 05,181.018a tato mām avahat sūto hayaiḥ paramaśobhitaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9424: 05,181.018c nṛtyadbhir iva kauravya mārutapratimair gatau 05,181.019a tato 'haṃ rāmam āsādya bāṇajālena kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:9426: 05,181.020a tān āpatata evāsau rāmo bāṇān ajihmagān
GE07mbh_05_u:9427: 05,181.020c bāṇair evācchinat tūrṇam ekaikaṃ tribhir āhave
GE07mbh_05_u:9428: 05,181.021a tatas te mṛditāḥ sarve mama bāṇāḥ susaṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9430: 05,181.022a tataḥ punaḥ śaraṃ dīptaṃ suprabhaṃ kālasaṃmitam
GE07mbh_05_u:9432: 05,181.023a tena tv abhihato gāḍhaṃ bāṇacchedavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9433: 05,181.023c mumoha sahasā rāmo bhūmau ca nipapāta ha
GE07mbh_05_u:9434: 05,181.024a tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ rāme bhūtalam āśrite
GE07mbh_05_u:9436: 05,181.025a tata enaṃ susaṃvignāḥ sarva evābhidudruvuḥ 05,181.025c tapodhanās te sahasā kāśyā ca bhṛgunandanam
GE07mbh_05_u:9437: 05,181.026a ta enaṃ saṃpariṣvajya śanair āśvāsayaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:9438: 05,181.026c pāṇibhir jalaśītaiś ca jayāśīrbhiś ca kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:9439: 05,181.027a tataḥ sa vihvalo vākyaṃ rāma utthāya mābravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:9440: 05,181.027c tiṣṭha bhīṣma hato 'sīti bāṇaṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke
GE07mbh_05_u:9441: 05,181.028a sa mukto nyapatat tūrṇaṃ pārśve savye mahāhave
GE07mbh_05_u:9442: 05,181.028c yenāhaṃ bhṛśasaṃvigno vyāghūrṇita iva drumaḥ 05,181.029a hatvā hayāṃs tato rājañ śīghrāstreṇa mahāhave
GE07mbh_05_u:9443: 05,181.029c avākiran māṃ viśrabdho bāṇais tair lomavāhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9446: 05,181.030e rāmasya mama caivāśu vyomāvṛtya samantataḥ 05,181.031a na sma sūryaḥ pratapati śarajālasamāvṛtaḥ 05,181.031c mātariśvāntare tasmin megharuddha ivānadat
GE07mbh_05_u:9447: 05,181.032a tato vāyoḥ prakampāc ca sūryasya ca marīcibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9448: 05,181.032c abhitāpāt svabhāvāc ca pāvakaḥ samajāyata 05,181.033a te śarāḥ svasamutthena pradīptāś citrabhānunā 05,181.033c bhūmau sarve tadā rājan bhasmabhūtāḥ prapedire
GE07mbh_05_u:9449: 05,181.034a tadā śatasahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca 05,181.034c ayutāny atha kharvāṇi nikharvāṇi ca kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:9450: 05,181.034e rāmaḥ śarāṇāṃ saṃkruddho mayi tūrṇam apātayat
GE07mbh_05_u:9451: 05,181.035a tato 'haṃ tān api raṇe śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ 05,181.035c saṃchidya bhūmau nṛpate 'pātayaṃ pannagān iva 05,181.036a evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ tadā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:9452: 05,181.036c saṃdhyākāle vyatīte tu vyapāyāt sa ca me guruḥ 05,182.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,182.001a samāgatasya rāmeṇa punar evātidāruṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:9453: 05,182.001c anyedyus tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ tadā bharatasattama 05,182.002a tato divyāstravic chūro divyāny astrāṇy anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9454: 05,182.002c ayojayata dharmātmā divase divase vibhuḥ 05,182.003a tāny ahaṃ tatpratīghātair astrair astrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9455: 05,182.003c vyadhamaṃ tumule yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā sudustyajān
GE07mbh_05_u:9456: 05,182.004a astrair astreṣu bahudhā hateṣv atha ca bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9457: 05,182.004c akrudhyata mahātejās tyaktaprāṇaḥ sa saṃyuge 05,182.005a tataḥ śaktiṃ prāhiṇod ghorarūpām; astrai ruddho jāmadagnyo
GE07mbh_05_u:9459: 05,182.005c kālotsṛṣṭāṃ prajvalitām ivolkāṃ; saṃdīptāgrāṃ tejasāvṛtya lokān
GE07mbh_05_u:9460: 05,182.006a tato 'haṃ tām iṣubhir dīpyamānaiḥ; samāyāntīm antakālārkadīptām 05,182.006c chittvā tridhā pātayām āsa bhūmau; tato vavau pavanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9462: 05,182.007a tasyāṃ chinnāyāṃ krodhadīpto 'tha rāmaḥ; śaktīr ghorāḥ prāhiṇod dvādaśānyāḥ 05,182.007c tāsāṃ rūpaṃ bhārata nota śakyaṃ; tejasvitvāl lāghavāc caiva
GE07mbh_05_u:9464: 05,182.008a kiṃ tv evāhaṃ vihvalaḥ saṃpradṛśya; digbhyaḥ sarvās tā maholkā ivāgneḥ 05,182.008c nānārūpās tejasogreṇa dīptā; yathādityā dvādaśa lokasaṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_05_u:9465: 05,182.009a tato jālaṃ bāṇamayaṃ vivṛtya; saṃdṛśya bhittvā śarajālena
GE07mbh_05_u:9467: 05,182.009c dvādaśeṣūn prāhiṇavaṃ raṇe 'haṃ; tataḥ śaktīr vyadhamaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:9469: 05,182.010a tato 'parā jāmadagnyo mahātmā; śaktīr ghorāḥ prākṣipad
GE07mbh_05_u:9471: 05,182.010b*0581_01 rūpaṃ tāsāṃ paśyati tatra lokaḥ 05,182.010b*0581_02 sarvās tā vai tīkṣṇarūpā vikośāḥ 05,182.010c vicitritāḥ kāñcanapaṭṭanaddhā; yathā maholkā jvalitās tathā tāḥ 05,182.011a tāś cāpy ugrāś carmaṇā vārayitvā; khaḍgenājau pātitā me
GE07mbh_05_u:9473: 05,182.011c bāṇair divyair jāmadagnyasya saṃkhye; divyāṃś cāśvān abhyavarṣaṃ sasūtān 05,182.012a nirmuktānāṃ pannagānāṃ sarūpā; dṛṣṭvā śaktīr hemacitrā
GE07mbh_05_u:9475: 05,182.012c prāduścakre divyam astraṃ mahātmā; krodhāviṣṭo haihayeśapramāthī 05,182.013a tataḥ śreṇyaḥ śalabhānām ivogrāḥ; samāpetur viśikhānāṃ pradīptāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9476: 05,182.013c samācinoc cāpi bhṛśaṃ śarīraṃ; hayān sūtaṃ sarathaṃ caiva mahyam 05,182.014a rathaḥ śarair me nicitaḥ sarvato 'bhūt; tathā hayāḥ sārathiś
GE07mbh_05_u:9477: caiva rājan 05,182.014c yugaṃ ratheṣā ca tathaiva cakre; tathaivākṣaḥ śarakṛtto 'tha
GE07mbh_05_u:9479: 05,182.015a tatas tasmin bāṇavarṣe vyatīte; śaraugheṇa pratyavarṣaṃ guruṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:9481: 05,182.015c sa vikṣato mārgaṇair brahmarāśir; dehād ajasraṃ mumuce bhūri raktam 05,182.016a yathā rāmo bāṇajālābhitaptas; tathaivāhaṃ subhṛśaṃ gāḍhaviddhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9482: 05,182.016c tato yuddhaṃ vyaramac cāparāhṇe; bhānāv astaṃ prārthayāne
GE07mbh_05_u:9484: 05,183.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,183.001a tataḥ prabhāte rājendra sūrye vimala udgate
GE07mbh_05_u:9485: 05,183.001c bhārgavasya mayā sārdhaṃ punar yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_05_u:9486: 05,183.002a tato bhrānte rathe tiṣṭhan rāmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9487: 05,183.002c vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi mayi śakra ivācale 05,183.003a tena sūto mama suhṛc charavarṣeṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:9488: 05,183.003c nipapāta rathopasthe mano mama viṣādayan 05,183.004a tataḥ sūtaḥ sa me 'tyarthaṃ kaśmalaṃ prāviśan mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:9489: 05,183.004c pṛthivyāṃ ca śarāghātān nipapāta mumoha ca
GE07mbh_05_u:9490: 05,183.005a tataḥ sūto 'jahāt prāṇān rāmabāṇaprapīḍitaḥ 05,183.005c muhūrtād iva rājendra māṃ ca bhīr āviśat tadā 05,183.006a tataḥ sūte hate rājan kṣipatas tasya me śarān 05,183.006c pramattamanaso rāmaḥ prāhiṇon mṛtyusaṃmitān
GE07mbh_05_u:9491: 05,183.007a tataḥ sūtavyasaninaṃ viplutaṃ māṃ sa bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9492: 05,183.007c śareṇābhyahanad gāḍhaṃ vikṛṣya balavad dhanuḥ 05,183.008a sa me jatrvantare rājan nipatya rudhirāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9493: 05,183.008c mayaiva saha rājendra jagāma vasudhātalam 05,183.009a matvā tu nihataṃ rāmas tato māṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:9494: 05,183.009c meghavad vyanadac coccair jahṛṣe ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9495: 05,183.010a tathā tu patite rājan mayi rāmo mudā yutaḥ 05,183.010c udakrośan mahānādaṃ saha tair anuyāyibhiḥ 05,183.011a mama tatrābhavan ye tu kauravāḥ pārśvataḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9496: 05,183.011c āgatā ye ca yuddhaṃ taj janās tatra didṛkṣavaḥ 05,183.011e ārtiṃ paramikāṃ jagmus te tadā mayi pātite
GE07mbh_05_u:9497: 05,183.012a tato 'paśyaṃ pātito rājasiṃha; dvijān aṣṭau sūryahutāśanābhān
GE07mbh_05_u:9498: 05,183.012c te māṃ samantāt parivārya tasthuḥ; svabāhubhiḥ parigṛhyājimadhye 05,183.013a rakṣyamāṇaś ca tair viprair nāhaṃ bhūmim upāspṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:9499: 05,183.013c antarikṣe sthito hy asmi tair viprair bāndhavair iva 05,183.013e svapann ivāntarikṣe ca jalabindubhir ukṣitaḥ 05,183.014a tatas te brāhmaṇā rājann abruvan parigṛhya mām
GE07mbh_05_u:9500: 05,183.014c mā bhair iti samaṃ sarve svasti te 'stv iti cāsakṛt 05,183.015a tatas teṣām ahaṃ vāgbhis tarpitaḥ sahasotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9501: 05,183.015c mātaraṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhām apaśyaṃ ratham āsthitām
GE07mbh_05_u:9502: 05,183.016a hayāś ca me saṃgṛhītās tayā vai; mahānadyā saṃyati kauravendra
GE07mbh_05_u:9503: 05,183.016c pādau jananyāḥ pratipūjya cāhaṃ; tathārṣṭiṣeṇaṃ ratham abhyaroham
GE07mbh_05_u:9504: 05,183.017a rarakṣa sā mama rathaṃ hayāṃś copaskarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:9505: 05,183.017c tām ahaṃ prāñjalir bhūtvā punar eva vyasarjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:9506: 05,183.018a tato 'haṃ svayam udyamya hayāṃs tān vātaraṃhasaḥ 05,183.018c ayudhyaṃ jāmadagnyena nivṛtte 'hani bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9508: 05,183.019c amuñcaṃ samare bāṇaṃ rāmāya hṛdayacchidam 05,183.020a tato jagāma vasudhāṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:9509: 05,183.020c jānubhyāṃ dhanur utsṛjya rāmo mohavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9510: 05,183.021a tatas tasmin nipatite rāme bhūrisahasrade 05,183.021c āvavrur jaladā vyoma kṣaranto rudhiraṃ bahu
GE07mbh_05_u:9511: 05,183.022a ulkāś ca śataśaḥ petuḥ sanirghātāḥ sakampanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9512: 05,183.022c arkaṃ ca sahasā dīptaṃ svarbhānur abhisaṃvṛṇot
GE07mbh_05_u:9513: 05,183.023a vavuś ca vātāḥ paruṣāś calitā ca vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_05_u:9514: 05,183.023c gṛdhrā baḍāś ca kaṅkāś ca paripetur mudā yutāḥ 05,183.024a dīptāyāṃ diśi gomāyur dāruṇaṃ muhur unnadat
GE07mbh_05_u:9516: 05,183.025a etad autpātikaṃ ghoram āsīd bharatasattama 05,183.025c visaṃjñakalpe dharaṇīṃ gate rāme mahātmani 05,183.025d*0582_01 tato vai sahasotthāya rāmo mām abhyavartata
GE07mbh_05_u:9517: 05,183.025d*0582_02 punar yuddhāya kauravya vihvalaḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ 05,183.025d*0582_03 ādadāno mahābāhuḥ kārmukaṃ tālasaṃmitam
GE07mbh_05_u:9518: 05,183.025d*0582_04 śaraṃ cāpy ṛṣayo 'thainaṃ mā rāmety abruvan vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9521: 05,183.026a tato ravir mandamarīcimaṇḍalo; jagāmāstaṃ pāṃsupuñjāvagāḍhaḥ 05,183.026c niśā vyagāhat sukhaśītamārutā; tato yuddhaṃ pratyavahārayāvaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9522: 05,183.027a evaṃ rājann avahāro babhūva; tataḥ punar vimale 'bhūt sughoram
GE07mbh_05_u:9523: 05,183.027c kālyaṃ kālyaṃ viṃśatiṃ vai dināni; tathaiva cānyāni dināni
GE07mbh_05_u:9525: 05,184.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,184.001a tato 'haṃ niśi rājendra praṇamya śirasā tadā 05,184.001c brāhmaṇānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9526: 05,184.002a naktaṃcarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ rajanyāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:9527: 05,184.002c śayanaṃ prāpya rahite manasā samacintayam 05,184.003a jāmadagnyena me yuddham idaṃ paramadāruṇam 05,184.003c ahāni subahūny adya vartate sumahātyayam 05,184.004a na ca rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ śaknomi raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_05_u:9528: 05,184.004c vijetuṃ samare vipraṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahābalam 05,184.005a yadi śakyo mayā jetuṃ jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:9529: 05,184.005c daivatāni prasannāni darśayantu niśāṃ mama 05,184.006a tato 'haṃ niśi rājendra prasuptaḥ śaravikṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9531: 05,184.007a tato 'haṃ vipramukhyais tair yair asmi patito rathāt
GE07mbh_05_u:9532: 05,184.007c utthāpito dhṛtaś caiva mā bhair iti ca sāntvitaḥ 05,184.008a ta eva māṃ mahārāja svapnadarśanam etya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:9533: 05,184.008c parivāryābruvan vākyaṃ tan nibodha kurūdvaha 05,184.009a uttiṣṭha mā bhair gāṅgeya bhayaṃ te nāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:9534: 05,184.009c rakṣāmahe naravyāghra svaśarīraṃ hi no bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:9535: 05,184.010a na tvāṃ rāmo raṇe jetā jāmadagnyaḥ kathaṃ cana 05,184.010c tvam eva samare rāmaṃ vijetā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:9536: 05,184.011a idam astraṃ sudayitaṃ pratyabhijñāsyate bhavān 05,184.011b*0583_01 upasthāsyati rājendra svayam eva tavānagha 05,184.011b*0583_02 yena śatrūn mahāvīryān praśāsiṣyasi kaurava 05,184.011c viditaṃ hi tavāpy etat pūrvasmin dehadhāraṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:9537: 05,184.012a prājāpatyaṃ viśvakṛtaṃ prasvāpaṃ nāma bhārata 05,184.012c na hīdaṃ veda rāmo 'pi pṛthivyāṃ vā pumān kva cit 05,184.013a tat smarasva mahābāho bhṛśaṃ saṃyojayasva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:9538: 05,184.013c na ca rāmaḥ kṣayaṃ gantā tenāstreṇa narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:9539: 05,184.014a enasā ca na yogaṃ tvaṃ prāpsyase jātu mānada 05,184.014c svapsyate jāmadagnyo 'sau tvadbāṇabalapīḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9540: 05,184.015a tato jitvā tvam evainaṃ punar utthāpayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:9541: 05,184.015c astreṇa dayitenājau bhīṣma saṃbodhanena vai 05,184.016a evaṃ kuruṣva kauravya prabhāte ratham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9542: 05,184.016c prasuptaṃ vā mṛtaṃ vāpi tulyaṃ manyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:9543: 05,184.017a na ca rāmeṇa martavyaṃ kadā cid api pārthiva 05,184.017c tataḥ samutpannam idaṃ prasvāpaṃ yujyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:9544: 05,184.018a ity uktvāntarhitā rājan sarva eva dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9545: 05,184.018c aṣṭau sadṛśarūpās te sarve bhāsvaramūrtayaḥ 05,185.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,185.001a tato rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ pratibuddho 'smi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9546: 05,185.001c taṃ ca saṃcintya vai svapnam avāpaṃ harṣam uttamam 05,185.002a tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ mama tasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9548: 05,185.003a tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vavarṣa mayi bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9549: 05,185.003c nyavārayam ahaṃ taṃ ca śarajālena bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9550: 05,185.004a tataḥ paramasaṃkruddhaḥ punar eva mahātapāḥ 05,185.004c hyastanenaiva kopena śaktiṃ vai prāhiṇon mayi
GE07mbh_05_u:9551: 05,185.005a indrāśanisamasparśāṃ yamadaṇḍopamaprabhām 05,185.005c jvalantīm agnivat saṃkhye lelihānāṃ samantataḥ 05,185.006a tato bharataśārdūla dhiṣṇyam ākāśagaṃ yathā 05,185.006c sā mām abhyahanat tūrṇam aṃsadeśe ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9556: 05,185.009a sa tenābhihato vīro lalāṭe dvijasattamaḥ 05,185.009c aśobhata mahārāja saśṛṅga iva parvataḥ 05,185.010a sa saṃrabdhaḥ samāvṛtya bāṇaṃ kālāntakopamam 05,185.010c saṃdadhe balavat kṛṣya ghoraṃ śatrunibarhaṇam 05,185.011a sa vakṣasi papātograḥ śaro vyāla iva śvasan
GE07mbh_05_u:9557: 05,185.011c mahīṃ rājaṃs tataś cāham agacchaṃ rudhirāvilaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9558: 05,185.012a avāpya tu punaḥ saṃjñāṃ jāmadagnyāya dhīmate
GE07mbh_05_u:9559: 05,185.012c prāhiṇvaṃ vimalāṃ śaktiṃ jvalantīm aśanīm iva
GE07mbh_05_u:9560: 05,185.013a sā tasya dvijamukhyasya nipapāta bhujāntare 05,185.013c vihvalaś cābhavad rājan vepathuś cainam āviśat
GE07mbh_05_u:9561: 05,185.014a tata enaṃ pariṣvajya sakhā vipro mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9562: 05,185.014c akṛtavraṇaḥ śubhair vākyair āśvāsayad anekadhā 05,185.015a samāśvastas tadā rāmaḥ krodhāmarṣasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9563: 05,185.015c prāduścakre tadā brāhmaṃ paramāstraṃ mahāvrataḥ 05,185.016a tatas tatpratighātārthaṃ brāhmam evāstram uttamam 05,185.016c mayā prayuktaṃ jajvāla yugāntam iva darśayat
GE07mbh_05_u:9564: 05,185.017a tayor brahmāstrayor āsīd antarā vai samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9565: 05,185.017c asaṃprāpyaiva rāmaṃ ca māṃ ca bhāratasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:9566: 05,185.018a tato vyomni prādurabhūt teja eva hi kevalam
GE07mbh_05_u:9567: 05,185.018c bhūtāni caiva sarvāṇi jagmur ārtiṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:9568: 05,185.019a ṛṣayaś ca sagandharvā devatāś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9571: 05,185.020c saṃtaptāni ca bhūtāni viṣādaṃ jagmur uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:9572: 05,185.021a prajajvāla nabho rājan dhūmāyante diśo daśa
GE07mbh_05_u:9573: 05,185.021c na sthātum antarikṣe ca śekur ākāśagās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:9575: 05,185.022c idam antaram ity eva yoktukāmo 'smi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:9576: 05,185.023a prasvāpam astraṃ dayitaṃ vacanād brahmavādinām 05,185.023c cintitaṃ ca tad astraṃ me manasi pratyabhāt tadā 05,186.001 bhīṣma uvāca 05,186.001a tato halahalāśabdo divi rājan mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_05_u:9577: 05,186.001c prasvāpaṃ bhīṣma mā srākṣīr iti kauravanandana
GE07mbh_05_u:9578: 05,186.002a ayuñjam eva caivāhaṃ tad astraṃ bhṛgunandane
GE07mbh_05_u:9579: 05,186.002c prasvāpaṃ māṃ prayuñjānaṃ nārado vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:9580: 05,186.003a ete viyati kauravya divi devagaṇāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9581: 05,186.003c te tvāṃ nivārayanty adya prasvāpaṃ mā prayojaya
GE07mbh_05_u:9582: 05,186.004a rāmas tapasvī brahmaṇyo brāhmaṇaś ca guruś ca te 05,186.004c tasyāvamānaṃ kauravya mā sma kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:9583: 05,186.005a tato 'paśyaṃ diviṣṭhān vai tān aṣṭau brahmavādinaḥ 05,186.005c te māṃ smayanto rājendra śanakair idam abruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:9584: 05,186.006a yathāha bharataśreṣṭha nāradas tat tathā kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:9585: 05,186.006c etad dhi paramaṃ śreyo lokānāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:9586: 05,186.007a tataś ca pratisaṃhṛtya tad astraṃ svāpanaṃ mṛdhe
GE07mbh_05_u:9587: 05,186.007c brahmāstraṃ dīpayāṃ cakre tasmin yudhi yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_05_u:9588: 05,186.008a tato rāmo ruṣito rājaputra; dṛṣṭvā tad astraṃ vinivartitaṃ vai 05,186.008c jito 'smi bhīṣmeṇa sumandabuddhir; ity eva vākyaṃ sahasā vyamuñcat 05,186.009a tato 'paśyat pitaraṃ jāmadagnyaḥ; pitus tathā pitaraṃ tasya cānyam 05,186.009c ta evainaṃ saṃparivārya tasthur; ūcuś cainaṃ sāntvapūrvaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:9590: 05,186.010a mā smaivaṃ sāhasaṃ vatsa punaḥ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana 05,186.010c bhīṣmeṇa saṃyugaṃ gantuṃ kṣatriyeṇa viśeṣataḥ 05,186.011a kṣatriyasya tu dharmo 'yaṃ yad yuddhaṃ bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:9591: 05,186.011c svādhyāyo vratacaryā ca brāhmaṇānāṃ paraṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:9592: 05,186.012a idaṃ nimitte kasmiṃś cid asmābhir upamantritam
GE07mbh_05_u:9593: 05,186.012c śastradhāraṇam atyugraṃ tac ca kāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:9594: 05,186.013a vatsa paryāptam etāvad bhīṣmeṇa saha saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:9595: 05,186.013c vimardas te mahābāho vyapayāhi raṇād itaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9596: 05,186.014a paryāptam etad bhadraṃ te tava kārmukadhāraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:9597: 05,186.014c visarjayaitad durdharṣa tapas tapyasva bhārgava 05,186.015a eṣa bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo devaiḥ sarvair nivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9598: 05,186.015c nivartasva raṇād asmād iti caiva pracoditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9599: 05,186.016a rāmeṇa saha mā yotsīr guruṇeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9600: 05,186.016c na hi rāmo raṇe jetuṃ tvayā nyāyyaḥ kurūdvaha 05,186.016e mānaṃ kuruṣva gāṅgeya brāhmaṇasya raṇājire 05,186.017a vayaṃ tu guravas tubhyaṃ tatas tvāṃ vārayāmahe
GE07mbh_05_u:9601: 05,186.017c bhīṣmo vasūnām anyatamo diṣṭyā jīvasi putraka
GE07mbh_05_u:9602: 05,186.018a gāṅgeyaḥ śaṃtanoḥ putro vasur eṣa mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:9603: 05,186.018c kathaṃ tvayā raṇe jetuṃ rāma śakyo nivarta vai 05,186.019a arjunaḥ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭhaḥ puraṃdarasuto balī
